anya-e1102n0:2: Varadaṃ varadaṃ aggaṃ, diccaṃ diccaṃva vanajaṃ;
anya-e1102n0:4: Santaṃ santaṃ sadā vaṭṭaṃ, pajaṃ’bhave sutaṃ;
anya-e1102n0:6: Sutaṃ sutaṃ bhavane yaṃ, natanaṃ natanā’rahaṃ;
anya-e1102n0:10: Vinaye sati ṭhite yaṃ, sāsanaṃ saṇṭhitaṃ bhave;
anya-e1102n0:11: Vinaye sati naṭṭhe yaṃ, vinaṭṭhaṃ sāsanaṃ bhave.
anya-e1102n0:16: Yadi me īdisaṃ cittaṃ, bhaveyyuṃ pāpasaṅkappā;
anya-e1102n0:30: Buddhuppādo hi dullabho, tato pabbajjā ca upasampadā ca, vuttañhetaṃ
anya-e1102n0:31: Buddho ca dullabho loke, saddhammasavanampi ca;
anya-e1102n0:36_0: Imasmiñhi ṭhāne ṭhatvā buddhaguṇapaṭisaṃyuttāya kathāya vuccamānāya sādhūnaṃ cittasampahaṃsanañceva,
anya-e1102n0:36_1: imasseva pakaraṇassa anummattavacanabhāvo ca bhaveyya, anummattavacanatte ca siddhe
anya-e1102n0:36_2: sotabbaṃ maññissanti, tasmā buddhaguṇaṃ vaṇṇayissāma. Amhākaṃ kira bhagavā brahmadevabuddhamādiṃ
anya-e1102n0:36_3: katvā yāva porāṇasakyagotamā manopaṇidhivasena, kaṭṭhavāhanajātakaṃādiṃkatvā yāva
anya-e1102n0:36_5: sabbaṃ sampiṇḍetvā yāva vessantarattabhāvā vīsati asaṅkhyeyyāni pāramiyo pūrentassa
anya-e1102n0:36_6: sabbaññutaññāṇatthāya yeva alaṅkataṃ sīsaṃ chinditvā dentassa sabbaññubodhisattassa
anya-e1102n0:36_7: sīsaṃ jambudīpavāsīnaṃ uddhanatopi bahutaraṃ, añjitanayanaṃ uppāṭetvā dentassa nayanaṃ
anya-e1102n0:36_8: ajaṭākāse gaganatale tārāgaṇatopi bahutaraṃ, hadayamaṃsaṃ vā dakkhiṇabāhuṃ vā chinditvā
anya-e1102n0:36_9: dentassa maṃsaṃ chanahuta aṭṭhasa hassādhikasatasahassapamāṇasinerurājatopi bahutaraṃ,
anya-e1102n0:36_10: lohitaṃ uppāṭetvā dentassa ruhiraṃ catūsu mahāsamuddesu udakatopi bahutaraṃ, maddīsadise
anya-e1102n0:36_11: ca bhariye jālīkaṇhājinasadise ca putte paresaṃ dāsatthāya dentassa gaṇanapathaṃ
anya-e1102n0:39_0: Jātattakīsotattakiyā vuttanayena asūro hutvā buddhattaṃ cintentasseva sattaasaṅkhyeyyāni
anya-e1102n0:39_1: vītivattāni. Atisūro ahutvā vācāmattameva nava asaṅkhyeyyāni vītivattāni. Atisūro
anya-e1102n0:39_2: hutvā kāyaṅgavācaṅgavasena pūrentassa cattāri asaṅkhyeyyāni vītivattāni. Imāni cattāri
anya-e1102n0:39_4: pana ajjhattapāramī pūritāti veditabbā. Vessantarattabhāvena ca sattakamahādānaṃ
anya-e1102n0:39_5: datvā sattakkhattuṃ pathaviṃ kampetvā vaṅkapabbataṃ gantvā nayanasadise dve putte
anya-e1102n0:39_6: brāhmaṇassa dāsatthāya datvā dutiyadivase brāhmaṇavaṇṇena āgatassa sakkassa devarañño
anya-e1102n0:39_7: attasamaṃ maddiṃ nāma bhariyaṃ datvā tasmiṃ bhave aparimeyyāni puññāni katvā tato
anya-e1102n0:39_8: tusitapuraṃ gantvā tattha yāvatāyukaṃ ṭhatvā dasahi cakkavāḷasahassehi āgantvā devatāvisesehi.
anya-e1102n0:42_0: Yāciyamāno kālaṃ dīpañca desañca kulaṃ mātaramevacāti imāni pañca mahāvilokanāni
anya-e1102n0:42_1: viloketvā tusitapurato cavitvā mahāsammatavaṃsajassa okkākarañño puttānaṃ kusalambhedabhayena
anya-e1102n0:42_2: bhaginīhiyeva saddhiṃ āvāhakaraṇaṃ sutvā sakyā vata bho rājakumārāti okkākamahārājena
anya-e1102n0:42_3: vuttavacanaṃ pavattanimittaṃ katvā sakyāti laddhanāmānaṃ rājūnamabbhantare pavattassa
anya-e1102n0:42_4: suddhodanamahārājassa jeṭṭhamahesiyā sirimahāmāyāya kucchimhi nibbattitvā dasamāsaccayena
anya-e1102n0:42_5: devadahanagarassa kapilavatthussa ca majjhe lumbinīvane mātukucchito nikkhamitvā
anya-e1102n0:42_6: jātakkhaṇeyeva uttarābhimukhaṃ sattapadavītihārena gantvā achambhivācaṃ nicchāretvā
anya-e1102n0:42_7: pitaraṃ vandāpetvā anukkamena soḷasavassuddesikakāle rajjasiriṃ anubhavitvā rāhulabhaddassa
anya-e1102n0:42_8: jātadivase nikkhamitvā chabbassāni dukkaracariyaṃ caritvā vesākhapuṇṇamadivase anuttaraṃ
anya-e1102n0:42_9: sammāsambodhiṃ abhisambujjhitvā pañcacattālīsa vassāni devamanussānaṃ ratanadāmaṃ
anya-e1102n0:42_10: ganthento viya dhammaratanavassaṃ vassāpetvā yāva subhaddaparibbājakavinayanā katabuddhakicce
anya-e1102n0:42_11: kusinārāyaupavaṭṭane mallānaṃ sālavane vesākhapuṇṇamadivase paccūsasamaye anupādisesāya
anya-e1102n0:42_13: āvuso mā socittha mā paridevittha, sumuttā mayaṃ tena mahāsamaṇena, upaddutā ca homa’idaṃ
anya-e1102n0:42_14: vo kappati idaṃ vo na kappatī’ti. Idāni pana mayaṃ yaṃ icchissāma taṃ karissāma,
anya-e1102n0:42_15: yaṃ na icchissāma na taṃ karissāmā”ti vuttavacanaṃ sallakkhetvā gaṇapāmokkhānaṃ sattannaṃ
anya-e1102n0:42_16: bhikkhusatasahassānaṃ saṅghatthero āyasmā mahākassapo dhammasaṅgītiṃ katvā parisuddhe
anya-e1102n0:42_17: dhammavinaye tato aparabhāge vassasatassa accayena vesāliyā vajjiputtakā dasavatthūni
anya-e1102n0:42_18: dassetvā sāsanavipattiṃ karonte disvā āyasmatā yasattherena kākaṇḍakaputtena samussāhiyamāno
anya-e1102n0:42_19: dutiyasaṅgītiṃ katvā tato aparabhāge tathāgatassa parinibbānato dvinnaṃ vassasatānaṃ
anya-e1102n0:42_20: upari aṭṭhārasame vasse dhammāsokonāma rājā sakalajambudīpatale ekarajjābhisekaṃ
anya-e1102n0:42_21: pāpuṇitvā buddhasāsane mahantaṃ lābhasakkāraṃ pavattetvā parihīnalābhasakkārā titthiyā
anya-e1102n0:42_22: antamaso ghāsacchādanamattampi alabhantā lābhasakkāraṃ patthayamānā sāsane pabbajitvā
anya-e1102n0:42_23: sakāni sakāni diṭṭhigatāni dīpetvā sāsane mahantaṃ abbudañca malañca pavattesuṃ.
anya-e1102n0:42_24: Tadā dhammāsokarañño pattābhisekato sattarasame vasse saṭṭhisatasahassa bhikkhūsu
anya-e1102n0:42_25: sahassabhikkhuṃ gahetvā moggaliputtatisso nāma saṅghatthero mahāpavāraṇāya parappavādaṃ
anya-e1102n0:42_26: bhinditvā kathāvatthuppakaraṇaṃ desetvā tatiyadhammasaṅgītiṃ katvā parisuddhe dhammavinaye
anya-e1102n0:42_27: sāṭṭhakathebuddhavacane dharanteva pāḷiyaṭṭhakathāsu atthacchāyaṃ gahetvā attano
anya-e1102n0:42_28: mativasena nānāganthavisesāni karonti, tesu attanomativasena atthacchāyaṃ gahetvā
anya-e1102n0:42_29: kāraṇapatirūpakaṃ katvā vuttavacanaṃ sārato sallakkhetvā sutta-suttānulomaācariyavāde
anya-e1102n0:42_30: muñcitvā pāḷiyā aṭṭhakathaṃ, aṭṭhakathāya ca pāḷiṃ tabbivaraṇabhūtaṃ sāratthadīpaniñca
anya-e1102n0:42_31: aññāni ca ganthavisesāni asaṃsanditvā attanomatiyāpi pubbāparaṃ asamānetvā vādappakāsanamattameva
anya-e1102n0:42_32: ṭhapetvā garukalahukesu garukeyeva ṭhātabbepi garuke aṭṭhatvā keci bhikkhū nadiyā
anya-e1102n0:42_33: udakukkhepaṃ akatvā karonti. Evaṃ sāsane dvidhā bhinnā honti. Idañca bhindanaṃ kosambakakkhandhake
anya-e1102n0:42_34: bhinnatopi sataguṇena sahassaguṇena balavatarameva sāsanassa vipattikāraṇattā, tathā
anya-e1102n0:42_35: hi na idaṃ manussaloke bhikkhūnaṃyeva hoti, bhikkhūnaṃ, upāsakamanussānaṃ, ārakkhakadevatānampi,
anya-e1102n0:42_36: tāsaṃ sahāyakānaṃ bhummanissitadevatānampi tāsaṃ sahāyakānaṃ rukkhanissitadevatānampi
anya-e1102n0:42_38: tāsaṃ sahāyakānaṃ tāvatiṃsadevatānampi, evaṃ mittaparamparavasena chakāmāvacaradevatānampi
anya-e1102n0:42_39: tāsaṃ mittānaṃ brahmapārisajjānampīti evaṃ yāvaakaniṭṭhabrahmalokā ariyapuggale ṭhapetvā
anya-e1102n0:42_40: sabbe puthujjanā devamanussā bhinnā honti, tesaṃ bhinnattā bahu ca pāpaṃ pasavati,
anya-e1102n0:42_41: tasmā pāḷiyā aṭṭhakathaṃ, aṭṭhakathāya ca pāḷiṃ saṃsanditvā tāni tāni ganthavisesāni
anya-e1102n0:42_42: ca ekato katvā gaṅgodake na yamunodakaṃ viya missitvā ekībhāvaṃ katvā sīmavisodhaniṃ
anya-e1102n0:42_43: nāma karissāmi, taṃ suṇātha sādhukaṃ manasikarotha dhammarājassa sāvakāti.
anya-e1102n0:43_0: Tattha buddhuppādo dullabho ti buddhassa uppādakālo dullabho tathā hi anuppannakāle
anya-e1102n0:43_1: buddhe buddhoti saddampi asutvā vītivattānaṃ kappānaṃ gaṇanapathaṃ vītivattā. Buddhakāraṇassa
anya-e1102n0:44_0: Tato pabbajā ca upasampadācā tiettha topaccayo lāmakatthe, pañcamyatthe vā. Buddhuppādo
anya-e1102n0:44_1: dullabho, tamanupabbajjā ca upasampadā ca dullabhāyevāti adhippāyo. Yathā ca loke
anya-e1102n0:44_2: kiñcideva mahagghaṃ alabhitabbaṃ labhitvā vā tena sahakārīkāraṇabhūtaṃ appagghampi
anya-e1102n0:44_3: mahagghaṃ mahagghaṃ dullabhaṃ dullabhanti vuccati, evameva atidullabhaṃ buddhuppādaṃ
anya-e1102n0:44_4: āgamma tamanupabbajitampi dullabhanti vuccati, yathā ca nidiyā uparimabhāge sattāhavaṭṭalikādibhāvena
anya-e1102n0:44_5: udakapūraṇe heṭṭhā kismiñci ṭhāne tarituṃ avisahantā idameva ṭhānaṃ dukkaranti vuccati,
anya-e1102n0:44_6: evameva buddhakāraṇassa dukkarabhāve na tamanupabbajjupasampadāpi dukkaraṃ dullabhanti
anya-e1102n0:44_7: vuccati. Aññathā buddhabhagavato pi pabbajjupasampadabhāvoyeva seṭṭho bhaveyya. Athavā
anya-e1102n0:44_8: kāraṇūpacāravasenāpi evaṃ vuttanti daṭṭhabbaṃ, yathā semhoguḷoti tathā hi guḷassa
anya-e1102n0:44_9: pi vanapaccayā semho ussanno, taṃ jano guḷenasemhoti vattabbepi kāraṇasmiṃ guḷe phalabhūtaṃ
anya-e1102n0:44_10: semhaṃ ropetvā semho guḷoti vuccati, evaṃ kāraṇassa dukkarattā dullabhe buddhuppāde
anya-e1102n0:44_11: tamanukriyā pabbajjāpi taṃ mūlakāraṇabhūte buddhuppāde ropetvā dullabhā pabbajjāti
anya-e1102n0:44_12: vuccati. Buddhuppādakālepi buddhadassanaṃ dullabhameva, anuppannakāle pana pageva,
anya-e1102n0:44_14: jāyamānesu vā majjhimadese jāyamānopi micchādiṭṭhibhūtā vā, sammādiṭṭhikule jāyamānāpi
anya-e1102n0:44_15: cakkhusota vikalabhāvena aṅgavikalā vā buddhadassanaṃ na arahanti, dassanampi dassanamattameva.
anya-e1102n0:44_16: Supaṇṇanāgarājādīnaṃ tasmiṃ bhave maggaphalabhāgino na honti, honti cettha.
anya-e1102n0:49_0: Pabbajjā ticettha sāmaññena vuttepi sāmaṇerāva adhippetā, upasampadā cāti visuṃ vuttattā.
anya-e1102n0:49_1: Sāmaṇerā ca nāma buddhaṃ saraṇaṃ gacchāmityādinā tikkhattuṃ vatvā ubhatosuddhivaseneva
anya-e1102n0:49_2: sāmaṇerabhūmiyaṃ tiṭṭhanti. Dasasīlāni pana tesaṃ sikkhāpadamattameva. Tāni pāḷivasena
anya-e1102n0:49_3: asakkonto atthavasena “idañca samādāya vattehī”ti ācikkhitumpi vaṭṭatiyeva. Idha
anya-e1102n0:49_4: vattabbaṃ natthi. Upasampadā pana aṭṭhavidhā honti ehibhikkhūpasampadā, saraṇagamanūpasampadā,
anya-e1102n0:49_6: dūtenūpasampadā, aṭṭhavācikūpasampadā, ñatticatutthūpasampadā cāti. Tattha bhagavā
anya-e1102n0:49_7: ehi bhikkhubhāvāya upanissayasampannaṃ puggalaṃ disvā rattapaṃsukūlantarato suvaṇṇavaṇṇaṃ
anya-e1102n0:49_8: dakkhiṇahatthaṃ nīharitvā brahmaghosaṃ nicchārento “ehi bhikkhu cara brahmacariyaṃ
anya-e1102n0:49_9: sammā dukkhassa antakiriyāyā”ti vadati. Tassānantarameva gihiliṅgaṃ antaradhāyitvā.
anya-e1102n0:50: Ticīvarañca patto ca, vāsi sūcica bandhanaṃ;
anya-e1102n0:52_0: Evaṃ vuttehi aṭṭhahiparikkhārehi sarīre paṭimuttoyeva vassasatikatthero viya iriyāpathasampanno
anya-e1102n0:52_1: buddhācariyako buddhupajjhāyako sammāsambuddhaṃ vandamānova tiṭṭhati. Ayaṃ ehi bhikkhūpasampadā
anya-e1102n0:52_2: nāma. Bhagavā hi paṭhamabodhiyaṃ etasmiṃ kāle ehi bhikkhupasampadāya eva upasampādeti.
anya-e1102n0:54: Eko ca thero sappañño; Sabbe te ehi bhikkhukāti.
anya-e1102n0:55: Ete vinayapiṭake niddiṭṭhaehibhikkhū nāma vinayapiṭake aniddiṭṭhā pana tisataparivāraselabrāhmaṇādayo.
anya-e1102n0:57: Ete hi sabbe saṅkhātā, sabbe te ehibhikkhukāti.
anya-e1102n0:58: Taṃ sabbaṃ sampiṇḍetvā aṭṭhavīsasahassāni chasatāni ekacattālīsuttarāni ca honti. Paṭhamabodhica nāmesā vīsativassāni honti.
anya-e1102n0:59_0: Bhagavā hi anuttaraṃ dhammacakkaṃ pavattetvā aṭṭhārasakoṭibrāhmaṇānaṃ amataṃ pāyetvā
anya-e1102n0:59_1: paṭhamavassaṃ vasi. Dutiyatatiyacatutthavassesu rājagahe veḷuvanavihāre vassaṃ vasi,
anya-e1102n0:59_2: bhagavā hi āsāḷhinakkhattapuṇṇamiyaṃ bārāṇasiyā isipatane migadāye paṭhamavassaṃ
anya-e1102n0:59_3: vasitvā phagguṇamāse phagguṇapuṇṇamiyaṃ rājagahaṃ patvā bimbisāraraññā kārite veḷuvana
anya-e1102n0:59_4: vihāre ekamāsamattaṃ vasitvā citramāse vīsatikhīṇāsavasahassaparivuto kapilavatthuṃ
anya-e1102n0:59_5: gantvā asītiyā ñātisahassānaṃ majjhe vippaṭipannānaṃ rājūnaṃ matthake paṃsurajaṃ
anya-e1102n0:59_6: okiritvā te vandāpetvā pokkharavassañca vassāpetvā tamāgamma asītiyā ñātisahassānaṃ
anya-e1102n0:59_7: vessantara jātakaṃ kathetvā rāhulamātaramāgamma candakinnarījātakañca kathetvā pitaraṃ
anya-e1102n0:59_8: anāgāmiphale patiṭṭhāpetvā rājagahameva āgantvā vāsaṃ kappesi, tena vuttaṃ dutiya
anya-e1102n0:59_9: tatiya catuttha vassesu rājagahe veḷuvanavihāre vassaṃ vasī”ti. Pañcame pana vesāliyaṃ
anya-e1102n0:59_10: ekavāsaṃ vasi. Chaṭṭhe makuḷapabbate ekavāsaṃ vasi. Puṇṇo vā tattha. Tatrāyaṃ anupubbikathā
anya-e1102n0:59_11: sunāparantaraṭṭhe kira ekasmiṃ vāṇijakagāme dve bhātaro. Tesu kadāci jeṭṭho pañcasakaṭasatāni
anya-e1102n0:59_12: gahetvā janapadaṃ gantvā bhaṇḍaṃ āharati, kadāci kaniṭṭho. Imasmiṃ pana samaye kaniṭṭhaṃ
anya-e1102n0:59_13: ghare ṭhapetvā jeṭṭhabhātiko pañca sakaṭasatāni gahetvā janapadacārikaṃ caranto anupubbena
anya-e1102n0:59_14: sāvatthiṃ patvā jetavanassa avidūre pañcasakaṭasatāni ṭhapetvā bhuttapātarāso parijanaparivuto
anya-e1102n0:59_15: phāsukaṭṭhāne nisīdi. Tena ca samayena sāvatthivāsino bhuttapātarāsā uposathaṅgāni
anya-e1102n0:59_16: adhiṭṭhāya suṭṭhuttarāsaṅgā gandhapupphādihatthā yenabuddho, yenadhammo, yenasaṅgho,
anya-e1102n0:59_17: tanninnā tappoṇā tappabbharā hutvā dikkhiṇadvārena nikkhamitvā jetavanaṃ gacchanti.
anya-e1102n0:59_18: So te disvā “kahaṃ ime gacchantī”ti ekaṃ manussaṃ pucchi. Kiṃ tvaṃ ayyo na jānāsi,
anya-e1102n0:59_19: loke buddhadhammasaṅgharatanāni nāma uppannāni, icceva mahājano satthusantike dhammakathaṃ
anya-e1102n0:59_20: sotuṃ gacchatīti. Tassa “buddho”ti vacanaṃ chavicammādīni chinditvā aṭṭhimiñjaṃ āhacca
anya-e1102n0:59_21: aṭṭhāsi. Atha attano parijanaparivuto tāya parisāyasaddhiṃ vihāraṃ gantvā satthāmadhurassarena
anya-e1102n0:59_22: dhammaṃ desentassa parisa pariyante ṭhito dhammaṃ sutvā pabbajjāya cittaṃ uppādesi.
anya-e1102n0:59_23: Atha tathāgatena kālaṃ viditvā parisāya uyyojitāya satthāraṃ upasaṅkamitvā vanditvā
anya-e1102n0:59_24: svātanāya nimantetvā dutiyadivase maṇḍapaṃ karetvā āsanāni paññāpetvā buddhappamukhassa
anya-e1102n0:59_25: saṅghassa mahādānaṃ datvā bhattakiccāvasāne bhagavā anumodanaṃ katvā pakkami. Bhuttapātaraso
anya-e1102n0:59_26: uposathaṅgāni adhiṭṭhāya bhaṇḍāgārikaṃ pakkosāpetvā “ettakaṃ bhaṇḍaṃ vissajjitaṃ
anya-e1102n0:59_27: ettakaṃ pana na vissajjita”nti sabbaṃ ācikkhitvā “imaṃ sāpateyyaṃ mayhaṃ kaniṭṭhassa
anya-e1102n0:59_28: dehī”ti sabbaṃ niyyotetvā satthu santike pabbajitvā kammaṭṭhāna parāyaṇo ahosi. Athassa
anya-e1102n0:59_29: kammaṭṭhānaṃ manasikarontassa kammaṭṭhānaṃ na upaṭṭhāti, tato cintesi “ayaṃ janapado
anya-e1102n0:59_30: mayhaṃ asappāyo, yaṃnūnāhaṃ satthu santike kammaṭṭhānaṃ gahetvā sakaṭṭhānameva gaccheyya”nti.
anya-e1102n0:59_31: Atha pubbaṇhasamaye piṇḍāya caritvā sāyanhasamaye paṭisallānā vuṭṭhito bhagavantaṃ
anya-e1102n0:59_32: upasaṅkamitvā kammaṭṭhānaṃ kathāpetvā satthā sīhanādaṃ naditvā pakkami. Atha kho
anya-e1102n0:59_33: āyasmā puṇṇo sūnāparantaraṭṭhaṃ patvā sammatapabbataṃ nāma pavisitvā vāṇijakagāmaṃ
anya-e1102n0:59_34: piṇḍāya pāvisi. Atha naṃ kaniṭṭhabhātā sagehaṃ netvā bhikkhaṃ datvā “bhante aññattha
anya-e1102n0:59_35: agantvā idheva vasathā”ti paṭiññaṃ kāretvā vasāpesi. Tato samuddagirivihāraṃ nāma
anya-e1102n0:59_36: agamāsi. Tattha samuddavīciyo āgantvā ayakaṇṭapāsāṇesu paharitvā mahāsaddaṃ karonti.
anya-e1102n0:59_37: Thero kammaṭṭhānaṃ manasikaronto na phāsuvihāro hotīti samuddaṃ nisaddaṃ katvā adhiṭṭhāsi.
anya-e1102n0:59_38: Tato mātulagiriṃ nāma āgamāsi. Tattha sakuṇasaṅgho ussanno rattiñca divā ca saddo
anya-e1102n0:59_39: eko baddho hoti. Thero “idaṃ ṭhānaṃ aphāsukanti tato makuḷakārāmavihāraṃ nāma gato.
anya-e1102n0:59_40: So vāṇijagāmassa nātidūro nāccāsanno gamanāgamanasampanno vivitto appasaddo. Thero
anya-e1102n0:59_41: “idaṃ ṭhānaṃ phāsuka”nti tattha rattiṭṭhānadivāṭhāne caṅkamanādīni kāretvā vassaṃ
anya-e1102n0:59_42: upagacchati. Evaṃ catūsu ṭhānesu vihāsi. Athekadivasaṃ tasmiṃyeva antovasse pañca
anya-e1102n0:59_43: vāṇijakasatāni “parasamuddaṃ gacchāmā”ti nāvāya bhaṇḍaṃ pakkhipiṃsu. Nāvārohanadivase
anya-e1102n0:59_44: therassa kaniṭṭhabhātā theraṃ bhojetvā therassa santike sikkhāpadāni gahetvā gacchanto
anya-e1102n0:59_45: “bhante mahāsamuddo nāma assaddheyyo cānekantarāyo ca, amhe āvajjeyyāthā”ti vatvā
anya-e1102n0:59_46: nāvaṃ ārūyhi. Nāvā ūmijavena gacchamānā aññataraṃ dīpaṃ pāpuṇi. Manussā “pātarāsaṃ
anya-e1102n0:59_47: karissāmā”ti dīpake otiṇṇā. Tasmiṃ dīpake aññaṃ kiñci natthi, candanavanameva ahosi.
anya-e1102n0:59_48: Atheko vā siyā rukkhaṃ ākoṭetvā lohitacandanabhāvaṃ ñatvā “bho mayaṃ lābhatthāya
anya-e1102n0:59_49: parasamuddaṃ gacchāma, ito ca uttari lābhā nāma natthi, caturaṅgula mattāpi ghaṭikā
anya-e1102n0:59_50: satasahassaṃ agghati, saṃhāretabbakayuttaṃ bhaṇḍaṃ hāretvā gacchāmā”ti. Te tathā
anya-e1102n0:59_51: kariṃsu candanavane adhivatthā amanussā kujjhitvā imehi amhākaṃ candanavanaṃ nāsitaṃ,
anya-e1102n0:59_52: ghātessāma ne”ti cintetvā na imesu ghāṭitesu sabbaṃ ekakuṇapaṃ bhavissati, samuddamajjhe
anya-e1102n0:59_53: nesaṃ nāvaṃ osīdessāmā”ti āhaṃsu. Atha tesaṃ nāvaṃ ārūyha muhuttaṃ gatakāleyeva uppādikaṃ
anya-e1102n0:59_54: upaṭṭhāpetvā sayampi te amanussā bhayānakāni rūpāni dassayiṃsu. Bhītā manussā attano
anya-e1102n0:59_55: devatā namassanti. Therassa kaniṭṭho cūḷapuṇṇakuṭumbiko “mayhaṃ bhātā avassayo hotū”ti
anya-e1102n0:59_56: therassa namassamāno aṭṭhāsi. Thero pi kira tasmiṃyeva khaṇe āvajjetvā tesaṃ byasanappattiṃ
anya-e1102n0:59_57: ñatvā vehāsaṃ uppatitvā abhimukho aṭṭhāsi. Amanussā theraṃ disvāva “ayyapuṇṇatthero
anya-e1102n0:59_58: ehī” ti pakkamiṃsu. Uppādikaṃ sannisīdi. Thero “mā bhāyathā”ti tesaṃ assāsetvāva
anya-e1102n0:59_59: kahaṃ gantukāmatthā”ti pucchi. “Bhante amhākaṃ sakaṭṭhānameva gacchāmā”ti thero nāvaṃ
anya-e1102n0:59_60: phale akkamitvā “etesaṃ icchitaṭṭhānaṃ gacchatū”ti adhiṭṭhāti. Vāṇijā sakaṭṭhānaṃ
anya-e1102n0:59_61: gantvā taṃ pavattiṃ puttadārassa ārocetvā “etha theraṃ saraṇaṃ gacchāmā”ti pañcasatāni
anya-e1102n0:59_62: attano attano pañcamātugāmasatehi saddhiṃ tīsu saraṇesu patiṭṭhāya upāsakattaṃ paṭivedesuṃ.
anya-e1102n0:59_63: Tato nāvāya bhaṇḍaṃ otāretvā therassa ekaṃ koṭṭhāsaṃ katvā “ayaṃ bhante tumhākaṃ
anya-e1102n0:59_64: koṭṭhāso”ti āhaṃsu. Thero “mayhaṃ visuṃ koṭṭhāsa kiccaṃ natthi”. Satthā pana tumhehi
anya-e1102n0:59_65: diṭṭhapubbo’ti. Na diṭṭhapubbo bhante’ti, tenahi iminā satthu maṇḍalamāḷaṃ karotha.
anya-e1102n0:59_66: Evaṃ satthāraṃ passissathāti te sādhu bhante’ti tena ca koṭṭhāsena attano ca koṭṭhāsena
anya-e1102n0:59_67: maṇḍalamāḷaṃ kātuṃ ārabhiṃsu. Satthā kirassa āraddhakālato paṭṭhāya paribhogaṃ akāsi.
anya-e1102n0:59_68: Tatho manussā rattiṃ obhāsaṃ disvā “mahesakkhā devatā atthī”ti saññaṃkariṃsu. Upāsakā
anya-e1102n0:59_69: maṇḍalamāḷañca bhikkhusaṅghassa senāsanāni ca niṭṭhapetvā dānasambhāraṃ sajjetvā
anya-e1102n0:59_70: “kataṃ bhante amhehi attanokiccaṃ, satthāraṃ pakkosathā”ti therassa ārocesuṃ. Thero
anya-e1102n0:59_71: sāyanhasamaye iddhiyāsāvatthiṃ patvā “bhante vāṇijagāmavāsino tumhe daṭṭhukāmā, tesaṃ
anya-e1102n0:59_72: anukampaṃ karothā”ti. Bhagavā adhivāsesi. Thero bhagavato adhivāsanaṃ viditvā sakaṭṭhānameva
anya-e1102n0:59_73: paccāgato. Bhagavā ānandattheraṃ āmantesi “ānanda sve sūnāparante vāṇijagāme piṇḍāya
anya-e1102n0:59_74: carissāma, tvaṃ ekūnapañcasatānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ salākaṃ dehī”ti. Thero sādhu bhante’ti
anya-e1102n0:59_75: bhikkhusaṅghassa tamatthaṃ ārocetvā “cārikā salākaṃ gaṇhantū”ti āha. Taṃ divasaṃ
anya-e1102n0:59_76: kuṇḍadhānatthero paṭhamaṃ salākaṃ aggahoti. Vāṇijagāmavāsinopi “sve kira satthā āgamissatī”ti
anya-e1102n0:59_77: gāmamajjhe maṇḍapaṃ katvā dānaggaṃ sajjayiṃsu. Bhagavā pātova sarīrapaṭijagganaṃ
anya-e1102n0:59_78: katvā gandhakuṭiṃ pavisitvā phalasamāpattiṃ appetvā nisīdi. Sakkassa paṇḍukambalasilāsanaṃ
anya-e1102n0:59_79: uṇhaṃ ahosi. So kiṃ idanti āvajjetvā satthu sūnāparantagamanaṃ disvā visukammaṃ āmantesi
anya-e1102n0:59_80: “tāta ajja bhagavā tīṇimattāni yojanasatāni piṇḍācāraṃ gamissati, pañca kūṭāgārasatāni
anya-e1102n0:59_81: māpetvā jetavanadvāra koṭṭhamatthake gamanasajjāniṃ katvā ṭhapehī”ti, so tathā akāsi.
anya-e1102n0:59_82: Bhagavato kūṭāgāraṃ catumukhaṃ ahosi, dvinnaṃ aggasāvakānaṃ dvimukhaṃ, sesānaṃ ekamukhaṃ,
anya-e1102n0:59_83: satthā gandhakuṭito nikkhamma paṭipāṭiyā ṭhapita kūṭāgāresu dhurakūṭāgāraṃ pāvisi.
anya-e1102n0:59_84: Dve aggasāvake ādiṃ katvā ekūnapañcabhikkhusatānipi kūṭāgāraṃ gantvā nisinnā ahesuṃ,
anya-e1102n0:59_85: ekaṃ tucchakūṭāgāraṃ ahosi. Pañcapi kūṭāgārasatāni ākāse uppatiṃsu. Satthā saccabandhapabbataṃ
anya-e1102n0:59_86: nāma patvā kūṭāgāraṃ ākāse ṭhapetvā tasmiṃ pabbate saccabandho nāma micchādiṭṭhi,
anya-e1102n0:59_87: so mahājanaṃ micchādiṭṭhiṃ uggaṇhāpento lābhaggayasaggappatto hutvā vasati. Abbhantare
anya-e1102n0:59_88: cassa antocāṭiyaṃ padīpo viya arahattassa upanissayo jalati, taṃ disvā “dhammamassa
anya-e1102n0:59_89: kathessāmī”ti gantvā dhammaṃ deseti. Tāpaso desanāpariyosāne arahattaṃ pāpuṇi. Maggenevassa
anya-e1102n0:59_90: abhiññā āgatā, ehi bhikkhu hutvā iddhimayapattacīvaro kūṭāgāraṃ pāvisi. Bhagavā kūṭāgāragatehi
anya-e1102n0:59_91: pañcahi bhikkhusatehisaddhiṃ vāṇijagāmaṃ gantvā kūṭāgārāni adissamānāni katvā vāṇijagāmaṃ
anya-e1102n0:59_92: pāvisi. Vāṇijā buddhappamukhassa bhikkhusaṅghassa mahādānaṃ datvā sasatthāraṃ makuḷakārāmaṃ
anya-e1102n0:59_93: nayiṃsu. Satthā maṇḍalamāḷaṃ pāvisi. Mahājano yāva satthā bhattadarathaṃ paṭippassambheti,
anya-e1102n0:59_94: tāva pātarāsaṃ katvā uposathaṅgāni samādāya gandhañca pupphañca ādāya dhammasavanatthāya
anya-e1102n0:59_95: ārāmaṃ paccāgamāsi. Satthā dhammaṃ desesi. Mahājanassa bandhanā mokkho jāto, mahanta
anya-e1102n0:59_96: buddhakolāhalaṃ ahosi. Satthā mahājanassa saṅgahatthaṃ katipāhaṃ tattheva vasi, aruṇaṃ
anya-e1102n0:59_97: pana mahāgandhakuṭiyaṃyeva uṭṭhapesi. Tattha katipāhaṃ vasitvā vāṇijagāme piṇḍāya
anya-e1102n0:59_98: caritvā “tvaṃ idheva vasāhī”ti puṇṇattheraṃ nivattetvā antare nammadānadī nāma atthi,
anya-e1102n0:59_99: tassā tīraṃ agamāsi. Nammadānāgarājā satthu paccuggantvā nāgabhavanaṃ pavesetvā tiṇṇaṃ
anya-e1102n0:59_100: ratanānaṃ sakkāraṃ akāsi. Satthā tassa dhammaṃ kathetvā nāgabhavanā nikkhami. So
anya-e1102n0:59_101: “mayhaṃ bhante paricaritabbaṃ dethā”ti yāci. Bhagavā nammadānadītīre padacetiyaṃ
anya-e1102n0:59_102: dassesi. Taṃ vīcīsu āgahāsu pidhiyati vīcīsu gatāsu vivarati, mahāsakkārappattaṃ
anya-e1102n0:59_103: ahosi. Satthā tato nikkhamma saccabandhapabbataṃ gantvā saccabandhaṃ āha “tayā mahājano
anya-e1102n0:59_104: apāyamagge otārito. Tvaṃ idheva vasitvā etesaṃ laddhiṃ vissajjāpetvā nibbānamagge
anya-e1102n0:59_105: patiṭṭhāpehī”ti. Sopi paricaritabbaṃ yāci. Satthā ghanapiṭṭhipāsāṇe allamattikapiṇḍamhi
anya-e1102n0:59_106: lañchanaṃ viya padacetiyaṃ dassesi. Evaṃ sūnāparantaraṭṭheyeva dve cakkaratanacetiyāni
anya-e1102n0:59_107: yāvasāsanantaradhānaṃ patiṭṭhāpesi. Sattame pana vasse sāvatthiyaṃ kaṇḍambarukkhamūle
anya-e1102n0:59_108: titthi maddanaṃ karonto yamakapāṭihāriyaṃ katvā dasahi cakkavāḷa sahassehi āgatānaṃ
anya-e1102n0:59_109: devatānaṃ mātaraṃ kāyasakkhiṃ katvā abhidhammaṃ desente tāvatiṃsabhavane pāricchattakamūle
anya-e1102n0:59_110: paṇḍukambalasilāyaṃ vassaṃ vasi. Aṭṭhame saṃsumāranagare ekavassaṃ vasi. Navame kosambiyaṃ
anya-e1102n0:59_111: ekavassaṃ vasi. Tadā bhaddiyo, kimilo, bhagu, ānando, anuruddho, devadatto, cāti
anya-e1102n0:59_112: cha khattiyā pabbajiṃsu. Tesaṃ vitthāro dhammapade āgato. Dasame pana vasse pālileyyāgāme
anya-e1102n0:59_113: dakkhiṇavanasaṇḍe bhaddasālamūle pālileyyakena hatthinā upaṭṭhiyamāno phāsukaṃ vassāvāsaṃ
anya-e1102n0:59_114: vasi. Ekādasame nālandhabrāhmaṇagāme ekavāsaṃ vasi. Dvādasame verañjāyaṃ ekavāsaṃ
anya-e1102n0:59_115: vasi duccaritassa vipākaṃ anubhavamāno, bhagavatā kira phussassa bhagavato kāle sāvakānaṃ
anya-e1102n0:59_116: vacīduccaritavasena katupacitassa akusalakammassa tadā laddhokāsavasena upaṭṭhitattā
anya-e1102n0:59_117: verañjabrāhmaṇena nimantitopi samāno mārāvaṭṭana vasena asallakkhetvā assavāṇijakānaṃ
anya-e1102n0:59_118: nibaddhavattasaṅkhepena paññattaṃ patthapatthamūlakaṃ yavataṇḍulameva temāsaṃ bhuñjati,
anya-e1102n0:61: Yavaṃ khādatha bhuñjatha, māca bhuñjatha sālino.
anya-e1102n0:64_0: Tena vuttaṃ “dvādasame verañjāyaṃ ekavāsaṃ vasi duccaritassa vipākaṃ anubhavamāno”ti.
anya-e1102n0:64_1: Terasame jāliyapabbate ekavāsaṃ vasi. Catuddasame sāvatthiyaṃ anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme
anya-e1102n0:64_2: jetavanavihāre paṭhamavāsaṃ vasitvā pannarasame vasse ñātijanasaṅgahatthaṃ kapilavatthuṃ
anya-e1102n0:64_3: gantvā ekameva vāsaṃ kappesi. Soḷasame vasse āḷavakayakkhadamanatthaṃ aggāḷavīnagare
anya-e1102n0:64_4: ekavāsaṃ vasi. Sattarasame vasse rājagahameva nivattitvā vāsaṃ kappesi. Aṭṭhārasame
anya-e1102n0:64_5: vasse jāliyapabbatameva nivattitvā vasi. Ekūnavīsatimepi vasse tattheva jāliyapabbatameva
anya-e1102n0:64_6: vasi. Vīsatime vasse rājagahassa avidūre bhīsanake bhesakalavanasaṇḍe vāsaṃ kappesī”ti
anya-e1102n0:64_7: imāni vīsati vassāni paṭhamabodhīti veditabbāni. Etasmiṃ kāle ehibhikkhūpasampadāyaeva
anya-e1102n0:64_8: upasampādesīti yebhuyyena bhagavantaṃyeva uddissa ācariyupajjhāyaṃ katvā ehibhikkhu
anya-e1102n0:64_9: bhāvamāpanne puññavantapuggaleyeva sandhāya vuttaṃ, aññesampi ariyabhāvamanāpannānaṃ
anya-e1102n0:64_10: sudinnādīnaṃ vā yamakapāṭihāriye pasīditvā āyasmato sāriputtattherassa santike pabbajitānaṃ
anya-e1102n0:64_11: pubbe kassapabuddhakāle vaggulibhūtapubbānaṃ pañcannaṃ bhikkhusatānaṃ therasseva
anya-e1102n0:64_12: santike pabbajitabhāvassa dissanato tena vuttaṃ “bhagavā hi paṭhamabodhiyaṃ etasmiṃ
anya-e1102n0:64_13: kāle ehi bhikkhūpasampadāya eva upasampādesī”ti. Ito paresu pana pañcavīsativassesu
anya-e1102n0:64_14: anāthapiṇḍikena kārite jetavanamahāvihāre ekūnavīsativassā vāsaṃ vasi. Visākhāya
anya-e1102n0:64_15: sattavīsati koṭidhanapariccāgena kārite pubbārāme chabbassāni vasi. Dvinnaṃ kulānaṃ
anya-e1102n0:64_16: guṇamahattaṃ paṭicca sāvatthiyaṃ nissāya pañcavīsati vassāni vāsaṃ vasi. Antime pana
anya-e1102n0:64_17: vasse beḷuvagāme vasitvā maraṇantikā vedanā uppajji, āyusaṅkhārossajjanañca tattha
anya-e1102n0:64_18: akāsi. Imāni idha nādhippetāni, bhagavato vassakkamajānanatthaṃyeva vuttanti.
anya-e1102n0:65: Saraṇagamanūpasampadā nāma “buddhaṃ saraṇaṃ gacchāmi”tyādinā tikkhattuṃ vācaṃ bhinditvā vuttehi tīhi saraṇagamanehi upasampanno.
anya-e1102n0:66_0: Ovādapaṭiggahaṇūpasampadā nāma “tasmā tiha te kassapa evaṃ sikkhitabbaṃ tibbameva
anya-e1102n0:66_1: hirottappaṃ paccupaṭṭhitaṃ bhavissati theresu navesu majjhimesu cāti, evañhi te kassapa
anya-e1102n0:66_2: sikkhitabbaṃ tasmā tiha te kassapa evaṃ sikkhitabbaṃ yaṃ kiñci dhammaṃ sossāmi kusalūpasañhitaṃ
anya-e1102n0:66_3: sabbantaṃ aṭṭhiṃ katvā manasikatvā sabbameva cetaso samannāharitvā ohitasoto dhammaṃ
anya-e1102n0:66_4: sossāmīti, evañhi te kassapa sikkhitabbaṃ tasmā tiha te kassapa evaṃ sikkhitabbaṃ
anya-e1102n0:66_5: sātasahagataṃ me kāyagatā satiṃ na jahissatīti, evañhi te kassapa sikkhitabbanti
anya-e1102n0:67_0: Pañhābyākaraṇūpasampadā nāma sopākassa anuññātaupasampadā, bhagavā kira pubbārāme
anya-e1102n0:67_1: anucaṅkamanto sopākasāmaṇeraṃ “uddhumātakasaññāti vā sopāka rūpasaññāti vā ime dhammā
anya-e1102n0:67_2: nānatthā nānābyañjanā, udāhu ekatthā byañjanameva nāna”nti dasaasubhanissite pañhe
anya-e1102n0:67_3: pucchi. So te byākāsi. Bhagavā tassa sādhukāraṃ datvā “kativassosi tvaṃ sopākā”ti
anya-e1102n0:67_4: pucchi. “Sattavasso ahaṃ bhagavā”ti, “sopāka tvaṃ mama sabbaññutaññāṇena saddhiṃ
anya-e1102n0:67_5: saṃsanditvā pañhe byākāsī”ti āraddhacitto upasampadaṃ anujānāti, ayaṃ pañhābyākaraṇūpasampadā.
anya-e1102n0:68_0: Aṭṭhavācikūpasampadā nāma bhikkhuniyā bhikkhunisaṅghato ñatticatutthena bhikkhusaṅghato
anya-e1102n0:68_1: ñatticatutthenāti imehi dvīhi kammehi upasampadā. Ñatticatutthakammūpasampadā nāma
anya-e1102n0:68_2: bhikkhūnaṃ etarahi upasampadā, ayameva idhādhippetā, sampattivipattivasena sambhavato.
anya-e1102n0:68_3: Kasmā hesa upasampanno nāmāti. Samaggena saṅghena ñatticatutthena kammena akuppena
anya-e1102n0:68_4: ṭhānārahena uparibhāvaṃ samāpanno pattoti upasampanno, seṭṭhabhāvaṃ pattotiattho
anya-e1102n0:68_5: tathā hi gihibhāvato sāmaṇerabhāvo seṭṭho nāma, tatopi upasampannabhāvoyeva seṭṭho.
anya-e1102n0:68_6: Tattha samaggena saṅghenāti sabbantimena pariyāyena pañcavaggakaraṇīye kamme yāvatikā
anya-e1102n0:68_7: bhikkhū kammappattā, tesaṃ āgatattā chandārahānaṃ chandassa āhaṭattā, sammukhībhūtānañca
anya-e1102n0:68_8: appaṭikkosanato etasmiṃ kamme samaggabhāvaṃ upagatena. Ñatticatutthenāti tīhi anusāvanāhi
anya-e1102n0:68_9: ekāya ca ñattiyā kattabbena. Ettha ca kiñcāpi ñatti sabbapaṭhamaṃ vuttā, tissannaṃ
anya-e1102n0:68_10: pana anusāvanānaṃ atthabyañjanabhedābhāvato atthabyañjanabhinnā ñatti tāsaṃ catutthanti
anya-e1102n0:68_11: katvā ñatticatutthanti vuccati. Kammenā ti dhammikena kammena, vinayakammenātiattho.
anya-e1102n0:68_12: Akuppenā ti vatthu ñatti anusāvana sīma parisasampatti sampannattā akopetabbataṃ
anya-e1102n0:68_13: appaṭikkositabbatañca upagatena. Ṭhānārahenā ti kāraṇārahena, satthusāsanārahenāti
anya-e1102n0:68_14: attho. Etehi kāraṇehi seṭṭhabhāvamāpannoti attho. Tattha sampattivipattivasena sambhavato
anya-e1102n0:68_16: pañcahi sampattīhi upasampadakammassa sijjhanatoti attho. Tattha vatthu sampattināma
anya-e1102n0:68_17: paripuṇṇavīsativassabhāvo idāni purisattabhāvo ca. Unnavīsativassaṃ, antimavatthuajjhāpannapubbaṃ,
anya-e1102n0:68_18: paṇḍako, theyyasaṃvāsako, titthiyapakkantako, tiracchānagato, mātughātako, pitughātako,
anya-e1102n0:68_20: ti ime terasa puggalā upasampadāya avatthu. Tattha ūnavīsativassanti sāmaññena vuttepi
anya-e1102n0:68_21: mātukucchito nikkhamanato paṭṭhāya ekūnavīsaparipuṇṇo purisapuggalo upasampadāya
anya-e1102n0:68_22: vatthu, tato oraṃ na upasampadāya vatthu tatho hi ekasmiṃ saṃvacchare hemantagimhavassavasena
anya-e1102n0:68_23: tiṇṇaṃ utūnaṃ sambhavattā tayo utū honti, honti cettha.
anya-e1102n0:74_0: Ettha ca kattikassa kāḷapakkhapāṭipadato paṭṭhāya yāva phagguṇapuṇṇamā cattāro māsā
anya-e1102n0:74_1: hemautu nāma. Phagguṇassa kāḷapakkhapāṭipadato paṭṭhāya yāva āsāḷhīpuṇṇamā cattāro
anya-e1102n0:74_2: māsā gimhautu nāma. Asāḷhakāḷapakkhapāṭipadato paṭṭhāya yāva aparakattikapuṇṇamā
anya-e1102n0:74_3: cattāro māsā vassautu nāma. Evaṃ ekasmiṃ saṃvacchare tayo utū honti. Tattha ekasmiṃ
anya-e1102n0:74_4: utumhi pakkhassa tatiyasattamesu dve dve katvā cha catuddasikā, paṭhamadutiyacatutthapañcamachaṭṭhaaṭṭhamesu
anya-e1102n0:74_5: cha cha katvā aṭṭhārasa pannarasikāti evaṃ ekasaṃvacchare catuvīsati uposathā honti.
anya-e1102n0:74_6: Imesu catuvīsatuposathesu cātuddasiyā ekūnatiṃsa divasā hontīti katvā ekasaṃvacchare
anya-e1102n0:74_7: cha ūnā divasā honti. Iminā nayena ekūnavīsatime vasse chamāsādhikāni aṭṭhārasavassāni
anya-e1102n0:74_8: honti. Tasmiṃ mātukucchimhi nibbattakāle dasamāse pakkhipitvā cattāri māsādhikāni
anya-e1102n0:74_9: ekūnavīsavassāni paripuṇṇāni. Rājāno pana tiṇṇaṃ tiṇṇaṃ vassānaṃ accayena māsaṃ ākaḍḍhanti,
anya-e1102n0:74_10: divasena saha māsampi, tasmā aṭṭhārasavasse yeva cha māsādhikāni honti. Taṃ heṭṭhācatumāsādhika
anya-e1102n0:74_11: ekūnavīsatime vasse pakkhipitvā ekamāsādhikāni vīsativassāni sabbaso paripuṇṇāni
anya-e1102n0:74_12: honti. Evaṃ ekūnavīsativassato paṭṭhāya gabbhavīso upasampadāya vatthūti veditabbo.
anya-e1102n0:74_13: Idāni purisattabhāvo ti bhikkhuniyā abhāvato purisapuggalova idāni vaṭṭatīti adhippeto
anya-e1102n0:74_14: tathā hi mātugāmassa pabbajitatthā pañcavassasatāni saddhammo tiṭṭheyya, paññattattā
anya-e1102n0:74_15: pana aparāni pañcavassasatāni ṭhassatīti evaṃ vassasahassameva paṭisambhidāppattasaddhammassa
anya-e1102n0:74_16: patiṭṭhitabhāvo vutto. Mātugāmā ca nāma duppaññā tibbakilesā lāmakā ca. Bhagavatā
anya-e1102n0:74_17: ca paṭhamabodhiyaṃ ādito paṭṭhāyameva mahāpajāpatiyā gotamiyā aṭṭhagarudhammapaṭiggahaṇena
anya-e1102n0:74_18: upasampadatte anuññātepi sāsanassa aciraṭṭhitikabhāvo vutto. Duppaññattā itthiyo
anya-e1102n0:74_19: sāsane ciraṃ na tiṭṭhanti, tibbakilesattā yathā paññatta sikkhāpadānurūpaṃ saṃvarampi
anya-e1102n0:74_20: rakkhituṃ na sakkonti. Lāmakattāpi tā aṭṭhasamāpattiṃ labhantāpi brāhmapārisajjaṃ
anya-e1102n0:74_21: nātikkamanti, evaṃ bhikkhuniyā abhāvato idāni purisapuggaloti vuttaṃ. Imasmiṃ ṭhāne
anya-e1102n0:74_22: ṭhatvā cattāri khettāni veditabbāni tathā hi mātugāmassa pabbajitattā vassasahassameva
anya-e1102n0:74_23: ṭhassatīti cetaṃ paṭisambhidāppattakhīṇāsavavasena vuttaṃ, tato paraṃ uttaripi sukkhavipassakakhīṇāsavavasena
anya-e1102n0:74_24: vassasahassaṃ, anāgāmivasena vassasahassaṃ, sakadāgāmivasena vassasahassaṃ, sotāpannavasena
anya-e1102n0:74_25: vassasahassanti evaṃ pañcavassasahassāni paṭivedhasaddhammo tiṭṭhati. Pariyattisaddhammopi
anya-e1102n0:74_26: tāniyeva na hi pariyattiyā asati paṭivedho atthi. Nāpi pariyattiyā sati paṭivedho
anya-e1102n0:74_27: na hoti. Liṅgaṃ pana pariyattiyā antarahitāya ciraṃ pavattissati, idaṃ khandhakabhāṇakānaṃ
anya-e1102n0:74_28: matena vuttanti veditabbaṃ. Dīghanikāyaṭṭhakathāyaṃ pana evaṃ vuttaṃ “paṭisambhidāppattehi
anya-e1102n0:74_29: vassasahassaṃ aṭṭhāsi, chaḷabhiññehi vassasahassaṃ, tevijjehi vassasahassaṃ, sukkhavipassakehi
anya-e1102n0:74_30: vassasahassaṃ, pātimokkhena vassasahassaṃ aṭṭhāsī”ti. Idampi dīghabhāṇakattherānaṃ
anya-e1102n0:74_31: matena vuttaṃ. Aṅguttaranikāyaṭṭhakathāyampi buddhānaṃ parinibbānato vassasahassameva
anya-e1102n0:74_32: paṭisambhidā nibbattetuṃ sakkonti, tato paraṃ cha abhiññā, tato tāpi asakkontā tisso
anya-e1102n0:74_33: vijjā nibbattanti. Gacchantekāle tānipi nibbattetuṃ asakkontā sukkhavipassakā honti.
anya-e1102n0:74_34: Eteneva upāyena anāgāmino sakadāgimino, sotāpannāti vuttaṃ. Idampi aṅguttaranikāye
anya-e1102n0:74_35: vuttaṃ. Saṃyuttanikāyaṭṭhakathāyaṃ pana paṭhamabodhiyaṃ bhikkhū paṭisambhidāppattā.
anya-e1102n0:74_36: Atha kāle gacchante paṭisambhidā pāpuṇituṃ na sakkhiṃsu, chaḷabhiññā ahesuṃ. Tato
anya-e1102n0:74_37: chapi abhiññā pattuṃ asakkontā tisso vijjā pāpuṇiṃsu. Idāni kāle gacchante tisso
anya-e1102n0:74_38: vijjā pāpuṇituṃ asakkontā āsavakkhayaṃ pāpuṇissanti, tampi asakkontā anāgāmiphalaṃ,
anya-e1102n0:74_39: tampi asakkontā sakadāgāmiphalaṃ, tampi asakkontā sotāpattiphalaṃ. Gacchantekāle
anya-e1102n0:74_40: sotāpattiphalampi pattuṃ na sakkhissantī’ti vuttaṃ. Yasmā ce te ācariyā bhinnavādā,
anya-e1102n0:74_41: tasmā tesaṃ ācariyānaṃ bhāṇakānaṃ matameva buddhaghosācariyena tattha tattha likhitanti
anya-e1102n0:74_42: gahetabbaṃ, aññathā ācariyasseva pubbāparavirodhappasaṅgo siyā ācariyabuddhaghoseneva
anya-e1102n0:74_43: hi sīhaḷabhāsaṃ apanetvā māgadhabhāsāya sāṭṭhakathaṃ buddhavacanaṃ likhitaṃ, na aññena
anya-e1102n0:74_44: ācariyena tasmā aṭṭhakathāya vuttavacanameva pamāṇanti gahetabbaṃ. Nanu cattāropi
anya-e1102n0:74_45: nikāyaṭṭhakathāsaṅgītiṃ ārūḷhā, atha kasmā evaṃ bhinnāti. Saccaṃ, tathāpi kesañci
anya-e1102n0:74_46: therānaṃ vādappakāsanatthaṃ vuttaṃ. Na saṅgāhakattherānaṃ, tasmā aṭṭhakathāvacanameva pamāṇanti vuttaṃ.
anya-e1102n0:75: Antimavatthuajjhāpannapubbanti pārājikabhikkhu, so abhabbo sāsane upasampadakammassa laddhuṃ.
anya-e1102n0:76_0: Paṇḍakoticetta pañcavidho hoti āsittapaṇḍako, ussūyapaṇḍako, opakkamikapaṇḍako, napuṃsako,
anya-e1102n0:76_1: pakkhapaṇḍakoti. Tattha yassa paresaṃ aṅgajātaṃ mukhena gaṇhitvā asucinā āsittassa
anya-e1102n0:76_2: pariḷāho vūpasamati, ayaṃ āsittapaṇḍako nāma. Yassa paresaṃ ajjhācāraṃ passato ussūyāya
anya-e1102n0:76_3: uppannāya pariḷāho vūpasamati, ayaṃ ussūyapaṇḍako nāma. Yassa upakkamena bījāni apanītāni
anya-e1102n0:76_4: honti, ayaṃ opakkamikapaṇḍako nāma. Yo pana paṭisandhiyaṃ yeva abhāvako uppanno hoti,
anya-e1102n0:76_5: ayaṃ napuṃsako nāma. Ekacco pana akusalavipākānubhāvena kāḷapakkhe paṇḍako hoti,
anya-e1102n0:76_6: juṇhapakkhe panassa pariḷāhovūpasamati, ayaṃ pakkhapaṇḍako nāma, keci pana yo kāḷapakkhe
anya-e1102n0:76_7: itthī hoti, juṇhapakkhe puriso, ayaṃ pakkhapaṇḍakoti vadanti, taṃ tesaṃ matimattameva.
anya-e1102n0:76_8: Etesu āsittapaṇḍakassa ca ussūyapaṇḍakassa ca pabbajjā na vāritā. Opakkamikanapuṃsakapakkhapaṇḍakānaṃ
anya-e1102n0:76_9: pana vāritā. Tesupi pakkhapaṇḍakassa yasmiṃ pakkhe paṇḍako hoti, tasmiṃyeva pabbajjā
anya-e1102n0:76_10: vāritā. Ettha ca apaṇḍakapakkhe pabbajitvā paṇḍakapakkhe nāsetabboti tīsupi gaṇṭhipadesu
anya-e1102n0:76_11: vuttaṃ. Keci pana “apaṇḍakapakkhepabbajito sato kilesakkhayaṃ pāpuṇāti, na nāsetabbo”ti
anya-e1102n0:76_12: vadanti, taṃ tesaṃ matimattameva, paṇḍakassa kilesakkhayā sambhavato khīṇakilesassa
anya-e1102n0:76_13: ca paṇḍakabhāvānupapattito ahetuka paṭisandhikathāyañhi avisesena paṇḍakassa ahetukapaṭisandhi
anya-e1102n0:76_14: katā vuttā, āsitta ussūyapakkhapaṇḍakānañca paṭisandhito paṭṭhāyeva paṇḍakabhāvo,
anya-e1102n0:76_15: na pavattiyaṃyevāti vadanti. Teneva ahetukapaṭisandhiniddese jaccandha-jaccabadhirādayo
anya-e1102n0:76_16: viya paṇḍako jātisaddena visesetvā niddiṭṭho. Catutthapārājikasaṃvaṇṇanāyaṃ pana
anya-e1102n0:76_17: abhabbapuggale dassentena paṇḍakatiracchānagataubhato byañjanakā tayo vatthuvipannā
anya-e1102n0:76_18: ahetukapaṭisandhikā, tesaṃ saggo avāritoti avisesena vuttaṃ, evaṃ pañcavidhā paṇḍakā
anya-e1102n0:76_19: te paṇḍakasāmaññena avisesetvā “paṇḍakāti evameva vatvā paṇḍako bhikkhave na upasampādetabbo”ti
anya-e1102n0:77_0: Theyyasaṃvāsako ti yo sayameva pabbajjāliṅgaṃ gahetvā bhikkhuvassaṃ gaṇetvā bhikkhūti
anya-e1102n0:77_1: paṭiññaṃ sampaṭicchati, yathāvuḍḍhaṃ vandanaṃ sādiyati, so liṅgassa saṃvāsassa ca
anya-e1102n0:77_2: thenattā ubhayatthenako nāma. Yo pana yathāvuḍḍhaṃ vandanaṃ na sādiyati, asuddhacittavasena
anya-e1102n0:77_3: liṅgassathenattāliṅgatthenako nāma. Yo vā pana sāmaṇerabhūmiyaṃ ṭhatvā musāvādena
anya-e1102n0:77_4: bhikkhuti paṭiññaṃ gahetvā bhikkhuvassaggena vandanādiṃ sādiyati, so bhikkhūhi dinnaliṅgattā
anya-e1102n0:77_5: liṅgatthenako na hoti, saṃvāsassa thenattā saṃvāsatthenako nāma. Ettha ca ubhayatthenakopi
anya-e1102n0:77_6: asuddhacittena liṅgatthenakeeva paviṭṭhoti veditabbo. Yopi sāmaṇero vuḍḍhasāmaṇerānaṃ
anya-e1102n0:77_7: vandanaṃ sādiyati, daharabhikkhūpi vuḍḍhabhikkhūnaṃ vandanaṃ sādiyati, sopi theyyasaṃvāsako
anya-e1102n0:77_8: nāpi hoti, athenattā. Yo vā pana bhikkhupārājikamāpannova bhikkhuliṅge ṭhito yāva
anya-e1102n0:77_9: paṭijānāti, tāva attheva tassa bhikkhubhāvo, na so anupasampannasaṅkhyaṃ gacchati,
anya-e1102n0:77_10: tathā hi so saṃvāsaṃ sādiyantopi theyyasaṃvāsako na hoti, so sahaseyyādiāpattimpi
anya-e1102n0:77_11: na janeti, omasavāde pācittiyañca na janeti teneva “asuddho hoti puggalo aññataraṃ
anya-e1102n0:77_12: pārājikaṃ dhammaṃ ajjhāpanno, tañce suddhadiṭṭhi samāno okāsaṃ kārāpetvā akkosādhippāyo
anya-e1102n0:77_13: vadati āpatti omasavādassā”ti omasavāde pācittiyaṃ vuttaṃ. Asati hi bhikkhubhāve
anya-e1102n0:77_14: dukkaṭaṃ vadeyya. Yo pana sāmaṇero sāmaṇeraliṅgeneva pāṇātipātādipañcavidhaṃ silavipattiṃ
anya-e1102n0:77_15: pāpuṇāti, sopi āgato liṅganāsanāya nāsetvā saraṇasīlaṃ dātabbaṃ, athenattā upasampadāya
anya-e1102n0:77_16: avatthubhāvampi na pāpuṇāti. Vikālabhojanādikaṃ karontassa pana “accayo maṃ bhante
anya-e1102n0:77_17: accāgamā”tyādinā saṅghamajjhe accayaṃ desāpetvā vā daṇḍakammaṃ vā katvā sīlaṃ dātabbameva.
anya-e1102n0:78_0: Tiracchānagatoti yokoci amanussabhūto cattāro apāyikāpi upasampadāya avatthuyeva.
anya-e1102n0:78_1: Te paṭisandhiyā lāmakattā abhabbā sāsane pabbajituṃ. Yadi cattāro apāyikā upasampadāya
anya-e1102n0:78_2: avatthu bhaveyya, atha kasmā sese anapadisitvā tiracchānagatova avatthūti vuttanti.
anya-e1102n0:78_3: Sesānaṃ apākaṭavatthuttā, tathā hi sambuddhakāle tiracchānayoniyaṃ nibbatto eko nāgarājā
anya-e1102n0:78_4: nāgayoniyā aṭṭīyati harāyati jigucchati. Athakho tassa nāgassa etadahosi kenanukho
anya-e1102n0:78_5: ahaṃ upāyena nāgayoniyā parimucceyyaṃ khippañca manussattaṃ labheyyanti. Athakho
anya-e1102n0:78_6: tassa nāgassa etadahosi “ime kho samaṇāsakyaputtiyā dhammacārino samacārino brahmacārino
anya-e1102n0:78_7: saccavādino sīlavanto kalyāṇadhammā sace kho ahaṃ samaṇesu sakyaputtiyesu pabbajeyyaṃ,
anya-e1102n0:78_8: evāhaṃ nāgayoniyā parimucceyyaṃ khippañca manussattaṃ paṭilabheyya”nti. Atha kho
anya-e1102n0:78_9: so nāgo māṇavakavaṇṇena bhikkhū upasaṅkamitvā pabbajjaṃ yāci. Taṃ bhikkhū pabbājesuṃ
anya-e1102n0:78_10: upasampādesuṃ. Tena kho pana samayena so nāgo aññatarena bhikkhunā saddhiṃ paccantime
anya-e1102n0:78_11: vihāre paṭivasati. Atha kho so bhikkhu rattiyā paccūsasamayaṃ paccūṭṭhāya ajjhokāse
anya-e1102n0:78_12: caṅkamati. Atha kho so nāgo tassa bhikkhuno nikkhante vissaṭṭho niddaṃ okkamesi.
anya-e1102n0:78_13: Sabbo vihāro ahinā puṇṇo, vātapānehi bhogā nikkhantā honti. Athakho so bhikkhu “vihāraṃ
anya-e1102n0:78_14: pavisissāmī”ti kavāṭaṃ paṇāmento addasa sabbaṃ vihāraṃ ahināpuṇṇaṃ vātapānehi bhoge
anya-e1102n0:78_15: nikkhante. Disvāna bhīto vissaramakāsi. Bhikkhū upadhāvitvā taṃ bhikkhuṃ etadavocuṃ
anya-e1102n0:78_16: “kissa tvaṃ āvuso vissaramakāsī”ti. Ayaṃ āvuso sabbo vihāro ahinā puṇṇo vātapānehi
anya-e1102n0:78_17: bhogā nikkhantāti. Atha kho so nāgo tena saddena pabujjhitvā sake āsane nisīdi. Bhikkhū
anya-e1102n0:78_18: evamāhaṃsu “koci tvaṃ āvuso”ti. “Ahaṃ bhante nāgo”ti. “Kissa pana tvaṃ āvuso evarūpaṃ
anya-e1102n0:78_19: akāsī”ti. Atha kho so nāgo bhikkhūnaṃ etamatthaṃ ārocesī. Bhikkhū bhagavato etamatthaṃ
anya-e1102n0:78_20: ārocesuṃ. Atha kho bhagavā etasmiṃ nidāne etasmiṃ pakaraṇe bhikkhusaṅghaṃ sannipātāpetvā
anya-e1102n0:78_21: taṃ nāgaṃ etadavoca “tumhe khvattha nāgā avirūḷhidhammā imasmiṃ dhammavinaye, gaccha
anya-e1102n0:78_22: tvaṃ nāga, tattheva cātuddase pannarase aṭṭhamiyā ca pakkhassa uposathaṃ upavasa,
anya-e1102n0:78_23: evaṃ tvaṃ nāgayoniyā parimuccissasi khippañca manussattaṃ paṭilabhissasī”ti. Atha
anya-e1102n0:78_24: kho so nāgo “avirūḷhadhammo kirāhaṃ imasmiṃ dhammavinayeti dukkhī dummano assūni
anya-e1102n0:78_25: pavattayamāno vissaraṃ katvā pakkami. Atha kho bhagavā bhikkhū āmantesi “dve me bhikkhave
anya-e1102n0:78_26: paccayā nāgassa sabhāvapātukammāya. Yadā ca sajātiyā methunaṃ dhammaṃ paṭisevati,
anya-e1102n0:78_27: yadā ca vissaṭṭho niddaṃ okkamati. Ime kho bhikkhave dve paccayā nāgassa sabhāva
anya-e1102n0:78_28: pātukammāya. Tiracchānagato bhikkhave na upasampādetabbo, upasampanno nāsetabbo”ti
anya-e1102n0:78_29: evaṃ tiracchānasseva pākaṭavattuttāti. Ettha ca pavattiyaṃ abhiṇhaṃ sabhāvapātukammadassanavasena
anya-e1102n0:78_30: “dve paccayā”ti vuttaṃ. Nāgassa pana pañcasu kālesu sabhāvapātukammaṃ hoti paṭisandhikāle,
anya-e1102n0:78_31: tacapajahananakāle, sajātiyā methunakāle, vissaṭṭha niddokkamanakāle, cutikāleti.
anya-e1102n0:78_32: Nanu ca devāpi upasampadāya avatthuyeva, atha kasmā cattāro apāyikāva upasampadāya
anya-e1102n0:78_33: avatthūti vuttanti. Saccaṃ, tathāpi devānaṃ abhabbattā paṭivedhasāsanassa ṭhitattā
anya-e1102n0:78_34: te abhabbato visuṃ karaṇatthāya evaṃ vuttanti daṭṭhabbaṃ. Vakkhati hi samantapāsādikāya
anya-e1102n0:78_35: vinayaṭṭhakathāya mahāvagge “tiracchānagato bhikkhaveti ettha nāgo vā hotu supaṇṇamāṇavakādīnaṃ
anya-e1102n0:78_36: vā aññataro antamaso sakkaṃ devarājānaṃ upādāya yo koci amanussajātiyo sabbova imasmiṃ
anya-e1102n0:78_37: atthe tiracchānagatoti veditabbo”ti, tena “tiracchānagatoti yokoci amanussabhūto”ti
anya-e1102n0:78_38: vuttanti. Ettha cāha yadi nāgasupaṇṇā paṭisandhiyā lāmakā bhaveyya, atha kasmā vidhurajātake
anya-e1102n0:78_39: cattāro janā nāgasupaṇṇasakkadhanañcayakorabyesu bhavanesu taṃ tadeva ṭhānaṃ patthentā
anya-e1102n0:78_40: dānādīni puññāni karonti, tesu eko āyupariyosāne saputtadāro nāgabhavane nāgarājā
anya-e1102n0:78_41: hutvā nibbatti, eko supaṇṇabhavane simbalivimāne supaṇṇarājā hutvā nibbatti, eko
anya-e1102n0:78_42: tāvatiṃsabhavane sakko hutvā nibbatti, eko dhanañcayakorabyarañño aggamahesiyā kucchimhi
anya-e1102n0:78_43: nibbattīti catunnampi janānaṃ paṭisandhiyaṃ kusalakammeneva pavattabhāvo vutto yadi
anya-e1102n0:78_44: kusalakammena bhaveyya, “kusalā cetanā vipākānaṃ khandhānaṃ kaṭattā ca rūpānaṃ kammapaccayena
anya-e1102n0:78_45: paccayo”ti imissāpi paṭṭhānapāḷiyā ahetukānampi paṭisandhikkhaṇe kammapaccayabhāvo
anya-e1102n0:78_46: vutto bhaveyya, na panevaṃ vattabbaṃ atha kathañcidaṃ paccetabbanti. Vuccate, nikantiyā
anya-e1102n0:78_47: balavattā sattavidhamethunasaṃyogattā ca aparisuddhā tesaṃ kusalacetanā, aparisuddhāyeva
anya-e1102n0:78_48: sugatibhūmiyaṃ janetuṃ na sakkonti. Duggatibhūmiyaṃ pavattamānāpi kammā yūhanakāle
anya-e1102n0:78_49: taṃ taṃ bhūmipatthanā taṇhāsampayuttāpubbabhāgacetanā balena tesu tiracchānabhūmīsu
anya-e1102n0:78_50: nibbattanti, na aññena akusalena. Evañhi patthitapatthanā siddhāpi bhaveyya. Yadi
anya-e1102n0:78_51: aññena akusalakammena bhaveyya, icchitapatthanāpi asiddhāva bhaveyya. Nikantica nāmesā
anya-e1102n0:78_52: balavajhānasampayuttacetanāpi paṭibāhituṃ sakkā tathā hi gopakadevadattassa ācariyasamaṇo
anya-e1102n0:78_53: jhānabalena brahmabhūmīsu anibbattitvā jhānaṃ paṭibāhitvā aññakammena gandhabbadevesuyeva
anya-e1102n0:78_54: uppajjati “sīlavato hi bhikkhave cetopaṇidhi samijjhati visuddhattā”ti tesaṃ vitthāro
anya-e1102n0:78_55: dīghanikāye āgato, atthikehi tattha oloketabbo. Sattavidhamethunasaṃyogavasenāpi
anya-e1102n0:78_56: sattā dukkhato na muccanti vuttañhi bhagavatā “idha brāhmaṇa ekacco samaṇo vā brāhmaṇo
anya-e1102n0:78_57: vā sammā brahmacārī paṭijānamāno na heva kho mātugāmena saddhiṃ dvayaṃdvaya samāpattiṃ
anya-e1102n0:78_58: samāpajjati, api ca kho mātugāmassa ucchādanaṃ nhāpanaṃ parimaddanaṃ sambāhanaṃ sādiyati,
anya-e1102n0:78_59: so tadassādeti taṃ nikāmeti, tenacavittiṃ āpajjati. Idampikho brāhmaṇabrahmacariyassa
anya-e1102n0:78_60: khaṇḍampi chiddampi sabalampi kammāsampi. Ayaṃ vuccati brāhmaṇa aparisuddhaṃ brahmacariyaṃ
anya-e1102n0:78_61: carati. Saṃyutto methunasaṃyogena na parimuccati jātiyā jarāmaraṇena…pe… na parimuccati
anya-e1102n0:78_62: dukkhasmāti vadāmi. Punaca paraṃ brāhmaṇa idhekacco samaṇovā…pe… paṭijānamāno. Na
anya-e1102n0:78_63: heva kho mātugāmenasaddhiṃ dvayaṃdvayasamāpattiṃ samāpajjati, na pi mātugāmassa ucchādanaṃ…pe…
anya-e1102n0:78_64: sādiyati, api ca kho mātugāmena saddhiṃ saṃjagghati saṃkīḷati saṃkeḷāyati, so tadassādeti…pe…
anya-e1102n0:78_65: dukkhasmāti vadāmi. Punaca paraṃ brāhmaṇa idhekacco samaṇo vā…pe… na heva kho mātugāmena
anya-e1102n0:78_66: saddhiṃ samāpajjati. Napi mātugāmassa ucchādanaṃ sādiyati. Napi mātugāmena saddhiṃ
anya-e1102n0:78_67: saṃjagghati saṃkīḷati saṃkeḷāyati. Apica kho mātugāmassa cakkhuṃ upanijjhāyati pekkhati,
anya-e1102n0:78_68: so tadassādeti…pe… dukkhasmāti vadāmi. Punaca paraṃ brāhmaṇa idhekacco samaṇovā brāhmaṇo
anya-e1102n0:78_69: vā…pe… na heva kho mātugāmena, na mātugāmassa, napi mātugāmena pekkhati. Api ca kho
anya-e1102n0:78_70: mātugāmassa saddaṃ suṇāti tirokuṭṭaṃvā tiropākāraṃvā hasantiyā vā bhaṇantiyā vā gāyantiyā
anya-e1102n0:78_71: vā rodantiyā vā, so tadassādeti…pe… dukkhasmāti vadāmi. Punaca paraṃ brāhmaṇa idhekacco
anya-e1102n0:78_72: samaṇo vā brahmaṇo vā…pe… naheva kho mātugāmena, napi mātugāmassa, napi mātugāmena,
anya-e1102n0:78_73: napi mātugāmassa rodantiyā vā…pe… api ca kho yānitāni pubbe mātugāmena saddhiṃ hasitalapitakīḷitāni
anya-e1102n0:78_74: anussarati. So tadassā deti…pe… dukkhasmāti vadāmi. Punaca paraṃ brāhmaṇa idhekacco
anya-e1102n0:78_75: samaṇo vā brahmaṇo vā…pe… na heva kho mātugāmena, napi mātugāmassa…pe… na pi yāni
anya-e1102n0:78_76: tāni pubbe mātugāmena saddhiṃ hasitalapitakīḷitāni anussarati, api ca kho gahapatiṃ
anya-e1102n0:78_77: vā gahapatiputtaṃ vā pañcahi kāmaguṇehi sahitaṃ samaṅgībhūtaṃ paricārayamānaṃ, so
anya-e1102n0:78_78: tadassādeti…pe… dukkhasmāti vadāmi. Punaca paraṃ brāhmaṇa…pe… na heva kho mātugāmena…pe…
anya-e1102n0:78_79: napi anussarati gahapatiṃ vā gahapatiputtaṃ vā paricārayamānaṃ, api ca kho aññataraṃ
anya-e1102n0:78_80: devanikāyaṃ paṇidhāya brahmacariyaṃ carati imināhaṃ sīlena vā vatena vā tapenavā
anya-e1102n0:78_81: brahmacariyena vā devo vā bhavissāmi devaññataro vāti, so tadassādeti, taṃ nikāmeti,
anya-e1102n0:78_82: tena ca vittiṃ āpajjati. Idaṃ kho brāhmaṇa brahmacariyassa khaṇḍampi chiddampi sabalampi
anya-e1102n0:78_83: kammāsampī”ti evaṃ lābhādihetukena bhedena ca sattavidhamethunasaṃyogena khaṇḍādibhāvo
anya-e1102n0:79_0: Mātughātake pana yena manussitthibhūtāpi ajanikā posā vanikā mātā vā mahāmātā vā
anya-e1102n0:79_1: cūḷamātā vā janikāpi amanussitthibhūtā mātā ghātitā, tassa pabbajjā na vāritā, na
anya-e1102n0:79_2: ca anantariko hoti. Tiracchānitthiyopi manussapurisamāgamma manussabhūtaṃ puttaṃ
anya-e1102n0:79_3: vijāyanti kontaputtā dvebhātikattherā viya tepi hi aṇḍajāyeva, tathā hi petaloke
anya-e1102n0:79_4: tiracchāne manusse cāti imesu tīsu bhūmīsu catasso yoniyo sambhavanti. Manussesu
anya-e1102n0:79_5: panettha kecideva opapātikā honti, seyyathāpi mahāpadumakumārādayo. Aṇḍajāpi konta
anya-e1102n0:79_6: puttā dvebhātikattherā viya. Vitthāro pana sīhaḷavatthusmiṃ oloketabbo. Ettha ca
anya-e1102n0:79_7: kontāti kinnarī, tassā puttā kontaputtā, sā hi rañño asokadhammarājassa kāle vanacarakena
anya-e1102n0:79_8: labhitvā manussasaṃvāsamāgamma dve putte vijāyitvā “idāni dārake pahāya na gamissatī”ti
anya-e1102n0:79_9: saññāya vanacarako tassā potthaṃ adāsi, sā potthaṃ labhitvā pakkhanditvā sakaṭṭhānameva
anya-e1102n0:79_10: gatā kinnariyo hi potthaṃ vinā pakkhandituṃ na sakkonti, teneva tāpaso “mā potthaṃ
anya-e1102n0:79_11: assā adāsī”ti āha. Kammapaccaya utusamuṭṭhānañhi tāsaṃ potthaṃ, rañño cakkavattissa
anya-e1102n0:79_12: cakkaratanaṃ viya, tathā hi cakkavattino vehāsagamanādi puññavato iddhināma, na tena
anya-e1102n0:79_13: cakkaratanaṃ vā hatthiassaratanaṃ vā vinā attano sabhāveneva gantuṃ sakkonti. Tattha
anya-e1102n0:79_14: cakkaratanaṃ rañño cakkavattissa kammabalena nibbattattā samuddamajjhe jāyamānampi
anya-e1102n0:79_16: nāma. Pakkhīnaṃ vehāsagamanādikā kammavipākajā iddhi. Kinnariyo pana potthaṃ vinā
anya-e1102n0:79_17: attano sabhāvena pakkhandituṃ na sakkonti, tasmā tāsaṃ potthaṃ kammapaccayautusamuṭṭhānanti
anya-e1102n0:79_18: daṭṭhabbaṃ. Keci pana devānaṃ alaṅkārā viya paṭisandhiyā saha āgatoti vadanti, na
anya-e1102n0:79_19: taṃ paccetabbaṃ, aṇḍajajalābujānaṃ tathā asambhavato. Kecipi pavatti kāle katanti
anya-e1102n0:79_20: vadanti, tampi ayuttameva, saṃsedajāpi padumagabbhevā veḷugabbhe vā nibbattā pokkharasātibrāhmaṇapadumavatīveḷuvatīdevīādayo
anya-e1102n0:79_21: viya. Jalābujā pana pākaṭāyeva. Yena sayaṃ tiracchānabhūtena manussitthibhūtā mātā
anya-e1102n0:79_22: ghātitā, sopi ānantariko na hoti tiracchānagatattā panassa pabbajjā paṭikkhittā,
anya-e1102n0:79_23: kammaṃ panassa bhāriyaṃ hoti, ānantariyaṃ āhacca tiṭṭhati. Manussitthiyopi tiracchānamāgamma
anya-e1102n0:79_24: gabbhaṃ janenti, seyyathāpi bhūridattassa mātā itthiyo hi aṭṭhahi kāraṇehi gabbhaggahaṇaṃ
anya-e1102n0:79_25: hoti - ajjhācārena, kāyasaṃsaggena, coḷaggahaṇena, asucipānena, nābhiparāmasanena,
anya-e1102n0:79_26: rūpadassanena, saddena gandhenāti. Tattha ajjhācārena sudinnassa purāṇadutiyikā gabbhaṃ
anya-e1102n0:79_27: gaṇhitvā pacchimabhavikaṃ suvaṇṇabimbasadisaṃ bījakaṃ nāma puttaṃ vijāyi. Kadāci
anya-e1102n0:79_29: sādiyantiyopi gabbhaṃ gaṇhanti. Evaṃ kāyasaṃsaggena gabbhaggahaṇaṃ hoti. Udāyittherassa
anya-e1102n0:79_30: pana purāṇadutiyikā bhikkhunī taṃ asuciṃ ekadesaṃ mukhena aggahesi, ekadesaṃ coḷakeneva
anya-e1102n0:79_31: saddhiṃ aṅgajāte pakkhipi, sā tena gabbhaṃ gaṇhi. Evaṃ coḷaggahaṇena gabbhaggahaṇaṃ
anya-e1102n0:79_32: hoti. Migasiṅgatāpasassa mātā migī utusamaye tāpasassa passāvaṭṭhānaṃ āgantvā sasambhavaṃ
anya-e1102n0:79_33: pivi, sā tena gabbhaṃ gaṇhitvā migasiṅgaṃ nāma tāpasadārakaṃ vijāyi. Evaṃ asucipānena
anya-e1102n0:79_34: gabbhaggahaṇaṃ hoti. Sāmassa pana bodhisattassa mātā utusamaye nābhiparāmasanena
anya-e1102n0:79_35: gabbhaṃ gaṇhitvā sāmatāpasadārakaṃ vijāyi, evaṃ maṇḍabyassa ca caṇḍapajjo tassa ca
anya-e1102n0:79_36: mātā utusamaye nābhiparāmasanavasena, tattha ca diṭṭhamaṅgalikāya nābhiparāmasanena
anya-e1102n0:79_37: maṇḍabyassa nibbatti ahosi. Caṇḍapajjotassa mātu nābhiyaṃ vicchiko pharitvā gato,
anya-e1102n0:79_38: tena caṇḍapajjotassa nibbatti ahosi. Idhekaccā itthī utusamaye purisasaṃsaggaṃ alabhamānā
anya-e1102n0:79_39: chandarāgavasena antogehegatāva purisaṃ upanijjhāyati, rājorodho viya, sā tena gabbhaṃ
anya-e1102n0:79_40: gaṇhāti. Evaṃ rūpadassanena gabbhaggahaṇaṃ hoti. Balākāsu pana purisonāma natthi,
anya-e1102n0:79_41: tā utusamaye meghasaddaṃ sutvā gabbhaṃ gaṇhanti. Gāvīeva vā kadāci usabhagandhena
anya-e1102n0:79_42: gabbhaṃ gaṇhanti. Evaṃ gandhena gabbhaggahaṇaṃ hoti. Evaṃ aṭṭhahi kāraṇehi itthiyo
anya-e1102n0:79_43: gabbhaṃ gaṇhanti. Ettha ca pitusadisāyeva puttā honti, tasmā bhūridattādayo dhataraṭṭhaṃ
anya-e1102n0:79_44: nāgarājānaṃ paṭicca nāgāyeva honti. Caṇḍapajjotassa pana vicchikaṃ paṭicca manusso
anya-e1102n0:79_45: jāto, sambhavena ajātattā. Pitughātakepi eseva nayo.
anya-e1102n0:80_0: Arahantaghātako pana amanussa arahantadevataṃ vā manussajātiyaṃ vā avasesaṃ ariyapuggalaṃ
anya-e1102n0:80_1: ghātetvā anantariyo na hoti, pabbajjāpissa na vāritā, kammaṃ pana balavaṃ hoti. Tiracchāno
anya-e1102n0:80_2: pana amanussaarahantampi ghātetvā ānantariko na hoti, kammaṃ pana bhāriyaṃ tiracchānagatattā
anya-e1102n0:81_0: Lohituppādako pana yo tathāgatassa abhejjakāyatāya parūpakkamena cammaṃ chinditvā
anya-e1102n0:81_1: lohitaṃ paggharituṃ na sakkoti, sarīrassa pana antoyeva ekasmiṃ ṭhāne lohitaṃ samosarati,
anya-e1102n0:81_2: āghātena patubbanamānaṃ sañcitaṃ hoti, tassa bahu apuññaṃ pasavati, ānantariko ca
anya-e1102n0:81_3: hoti, pabbajjāpissa vāritā, seyyathāpi devadatto. Yo pana jīvako viya rogavūpasamanatthaṃ
anya-e1102n0:81_4: phāletvā pūtimaṃsañca lohitañca nīharitvā phāsuṃ karoti, ayaṃ lohituppādako na hoti,
anya-e1102n0:81_5: bahupuññaṃ pasavati brahmapuññaṃ pasavati, seyyathāpi jīvakokomārabhacco.
anya-e1102n0:82_0: Ubbhatobyañjanako pana itthi-purisavasena duvidho tattha itthiubhatobyañjanakassa
anya-e1102n0:82_1: itthinimittaṃ pākaṭaṃ, purisanimittaṃ paṭicchannaṃ. Purisaubhatobyañjanakassa purisanimittaṃ
anya-e1102n0:82_2: pākaṭaṃ, itthinimittaṃ paṭicchannaṃ. Itthiubhatobyañjanakassa itthīsu purisattaṃ
anya-e1102n0:82_3: karontassa itthinimittaṃ paṭicchannaṃ hoti, purisanimittaṃ pākaṭaṃ hoti. Purisaubhatobyañjanakassa
anya-e1102n0:82_4: purisānaṃ itthibhāvaṃ upagacchantassa purisanimittaṃ paṭicchannaṃ hoti, itthinimittaṃ
anya-e1102n0:82_5: pākaṭaṃ. Itthiubhatobyañjanako sayañca gabbhaṃ gaṇhāti, parañca gaṇhāpeti. Purisa
anya-e1102n0:82_6: ubhato byañjanako pana sayaṃ na gaṇhāti, paraṃ gaṇhāpeti. Idameva tesaṃ nānākaraṇaṃ.
anya-e1102n0:82_7: Ubhatobyañjananti cettha “byañjananti nimittaṃ. Ubhato byañjanaṃ assa atthīti viggahena
anya-e1102n0:82_8: “ubhatobyañja”nti vakkhatha, ekassa dve indriyāni honti, atha ekamevāti. Ekameva
anya-e1102n0:82_9: na dve, “yassa itthindriyaṃ uppajjati, tassa purisindriyaṃ uppajjatīti no. Yassa
anya-e1102n0:82_10: vā pana purisindriyaṃ uppajjati, tassa itthindriyaṃ uppajjatīti noti ekasmiṃ santāne
anya-e1102n0:82_11: indriya dvayassa paṭisevitattā. Tañca kho itthiubhatobyañjanakassa itthindriyaṃ,
anya-e1102n0:82_12: purisaubhatobyañjanakassa purisindriyamevāti. Yadi ekameva indriyaṃ, evaṃ ubhatobyañjanakabhāvo
anya-e1102n0:82_13: kathaṃ siyā. Indriyaṃ byañjanakāraṇanti vuttaṃ, tañca tassa natthīti. Vuccate na
anya-e1102n0:82_14: itthindriyaṃ purisabyañjanassa kāraṇaṃ, tathā purisindriyampi itthibyañjanakassa,
anya-e1102n0:82_15: kasmā sadā abhāvatoti, tathā hi itthi ubhatobyañjanakassa yadā itthiyā rattaṃ hoti,
anya-e1102n0:82_16: tadā purisabyañjanaṃ pākaṭaṃ hoti, itthibyañjanaṃ paṭicchannaṃ tathā purisaubhatobyañjanakassapi.
anya-e1102n0:82_17: Yadi tesaṃ indriyadvayaṃ byañjanānaṃ kāraṇaṃ bhaveyya, sadā byañjana dvayaṃ ekato
anya-e1102n0:82_18: tiṭṭheyya na pana tiṭṭhati, tasmā ekameva indriyanti niṭṭhametthāva gantabbaṃ. Byañjanakāraṇaṃ
anya-e1102n0:82_19: indriyaṃ pahāya rāgacittamevettha byañjanadvayassa kāraṇanti daṭṭhabbaṃ, tasmā itthiubhatobyañjanako
anya-e1102n0:82_20: sayampi gabbhaṃ gaṇhāti, parampi gaṇhāpeti, purisaubhatobyañjanako paraṃ gaṇhāpeti,
anya-e1102n0:82_21: sayaṃ pana na gaṇhāti, itthindriyasamaṅgisseva gabbhasambhavatoti. Kurundiyaṃ pana
anya-e1102n0:82_22: “yadi paṭisandhiyaṃ purisaliṅgaṃ, pavatte itthiliṅgaṃ nibbattati, yadi paṭisandhiyaṃ
anya-e1102n0:82_23: itthiliṅgaṃ, pavatte purisaliṅgaṃ nibbatī”ti paṭisandhiyaṃ liṅgasambhavo vutto, so
anya-e1102n0:82_24: ayuttova. Kasmā, pavattiyaṃyeva itthiliṅgādīni samuṭṭhahanti. Paṭisandhiyameva samuṭṭhāti,
anya-e1102n0:82_25: na liṅgādīni. Indriyameva liṅganti na sakkā vattuṃ, indriyaliṅgānaṃ bhinnasabhāvattā,
anya-e1102n0:82_26: yathā ca bīje sati rukkho sambhavati, nāsati, evameva indriye sati liṅgādīni sambhavanti
anya-e1102n0:82_27: bījasadisañhi indriyaṃ, rukkhasadisāni liṅgādīni evameva tesu puggalesu paṇḍakādayo
anya-e1102n0:82_28: ekādasapuggalā tasmiṃ yeva bhave niyāmaṃ okkamituṃ na arahanti, tasmā abhabbā nāma.
anya-e1102n0:82_29: Ūnavīsati antimavatthuajjhāpannapubbā dve upasampadāya avatthumattameva, upanissaye
anya-e1102n0:82_30: sati tasmiṃyeva bhave niyāmaṃ okkamituṃ arahanti, tasmā bhabbānāma honti.
anya-e1102n0:86: Sambandhaṃ vavatthitaṃ vimuttaṃ, dasadhā byañjanabuddhiyā pabhedo”ti.
anya-e1102n0:87_0: Evaṃ vuttaṃ dasavidhaṃ byañjanaṃ apekkhitvā vā evaṃ asakkontenāpi sithiladhanita
anya-e1102n0:87_1: vimuttaniggahitavasena vuttāni byañjanāni akopetvā vā duruttaṃ vā akatvā vuttaṃ ñattisampatti
anya-e1102n0:87_2: nāma. Ñattivipatti nāma sabbaso ñattiṃ aṭṭhapetvā vā vatthusaṅghapuggalañattīnaṃ
anya-e1102n0:87_3: aparāmasanāni pacchā ñattiṭṭhapanañcāti ime tāva pañca ñattidosā. Tattha ayaṃ itthanāmoti
anya-e1102n0:87_4: upasampadāpekkhassa api akittanaṃ vatthuaparāmasanaṃ nāma. Suṇātu me bhante saṅghoti
anya-e1102n0:87_5: ettha suṇātu me bhanteti vatvā saṅghoti abhaṇanaṃ saṅghaaparāmasanaṃ nāma. Itthannāmassa
anya-e1102n0:87_6: upasampadāpekkhoti upajjhāyassa akittanaṃ puggalaaparāmasanaṃ nāma. Sabbena sabbaṃ
anya-e1102n0:87_7: ñattiyā anuccāraṇaṃ ñattiaparāmasanaṃ nāma. Paṭhamaṃ kammavācaṃ niṭṭhāpetvā esā ñattīti
anya-e1102n0:87_8: vatvā khamati saṅghassāti evaṃ ñatti kittanaṃ pacchā ñattiṭṭhapanaṃ nāma. Iti ime
anya-e1102n0:87_9: pañca ñattidosā ñattivipatti nāma. Imehi dosehi vimuttāya ñattiyā sampannaṃ ñattisampatti nāma.
anya-e1102n0:89_0: Anusāvanasampatti nāma vatthu saṅghapuggalānaṃ aparāmasanāni, sāvanāya hāpanaṃ, akāle
anya-e1102n0:89_1: sāvananti ime pañca anusāvanadose vajjetvā kathanaṃ anusāvanasampatti nāma. Tattha
anya-e1102n0:89_2: vatthādīnaṃ aparāmasanāni ñattiyaṃ vuttasadisāneva. Tīsu pana anusāvanāsu yattha
anya-e1102n0:89_3: katthaci etesaṃ aparāmasanaṃ aparāmasanameva. Sabbena sabbaṃ pana kammavācaṃ avatvā
anya-e1102n0:89_4: catukkhattuṃ ñattikittanameva vā kammavācabbhantarepi cattāri byañjanāni kopetvā
anya-e1102n0:89_5: vā akkharassa vā padassa vā duruccāraṇaṃ vā katvā sāvanaṃ sāvanāya hāpanaṃ nāma,
anya-e1102n0:89_6: tathā hi sithiladhanitavimuttaniggahitavasena cattāri byañjanāni antokammavācāya
anya-e1102n0:89_7: kammaṃ kopenti. Tattha “suṇātu me ti sithile vattabbe suṇāthu me”ti vacanaṃ sithile
anya-e1102n0:89_8: dhanitaṃ nāma. “Bhante”ti vattabbe bhanteti vacanaṃ dhanite sithilaṃ nāma. “Suṇātu
anya-e1102n0:89_9: esā ñattī”ti vattabbe “suṇantu esaṃ ñattī”ti vacanaṃ vimutte niggahitaṃ nāma. “Pattakalla”nti
anya-e1102n0:89_10: vattabbe “pattakallā”ti vacanaṃ niggahite vimuttaṃ nāma. Evaṃ imāni cattāri byañjanāni
anya-e1102n0:89_11: antokammavācāya kammaṃ dūsenti. Imāni cattāri akopetvā vadantenāpi aññasmiṃ akkhare
anya-e1102n0:89_12: vattabbe aññaṃ akkharaṃ vadanto duruttaṃ karoti nāma. Itaresu dīgharassādīsu chasu
anya-e1102n0:89_13: ṭhānesu dīghaṭṭhāne dīghaṃ, rassaṭṭhāne rassamevāti evaṃ yathāṭhāne taṃ tadeva akkharaṃ
anya-e1102n0:89_14: bhāsantena anukkamāgataṃ paveṇiṃ avināsetvā kammavācā kātabbā. Sace pana evaṃ akatvā
anya-e1102n0:89_15: dīghe vattabbe rassaṃ, rasse vattabbe dīghaṃ vadati, tathā garuke vattabbe lahukaṃ,
anya-e1102n0:89_16: lahuke vattabbe garukaṃ vadati. Sambandhe vā vattabbe vavatthitaṃ, vavatthite vā
anya-e1102n0:89_17: vattabbe sambandhaṃ vadati, evampi kammavācā na kuppati. Imāni cha byañjanāni kammaṃ
anya-e1102n0:89_18: na kopenti. Idameva ācariyānaṃ samānakathā. Apare pana idāni byañjanāni antokammavācāya
anya-e1102n0:89_19: kammaṃ dūsentīti vadanti, evaṃ sati anupasampannāva bahutarā bhaveyyuṃ, vīmaṃsitvā
anya-e1102n0:89_20: pana gahetabbaṃ. Suṭṭhutarā vā kammavācā sikkhitabbā. Sāvanāya anokāse paṭhamaṃ ñattiṃ
anya-e1102n0:89_21: aṭṭhapetvā anusāvanaṃ akāle sāvanaṃ nāma. Iti imehi dosehi vimuttāya anusāvanāya
anya-e1102n0:89_22: sampannaṃ anusāvanasampattisampannaṃ nāma. Yadi pattacīvararahitaṃ puggalaṃ upasampādeti,
anya-e1102n0:89_23: “paripuṇṇassa pattacīvara”nti anusāvanāya katattā kammakopo na hoti, kārakasaṅgho
anya-e1102n0:89_24: pana sātisāro tenevāha vimativinodaniyampi pattacīvarānaṃ abhāvepi’paripuṇṇassa pattacīvara’nti
anya-e1102n0:89_25: kammavācāya sāvitattā kammakopaṃ avatvā dukkaṭameva vuttanti. Sace anupajjhāyako
anya-e1102n0:89_26: upasampādeti, “itthannāmassa upasampadāpekkho, itthannāmena upajjhāyenā”ti vā upajjhāyaṃ
anya-e1102n0:89_27: sāveti, sūpasampannova hoti. Upajjhāyaṃ na sāveti nupasampanno. Vakkhati hi vimativinodaniyaṃ
anya-e1102n0:89_28: “kammaṃ na kuppatīti idaṃ upajjhāyābhāvepi itthannāmassa upasampadāpekkho itthannāmena
anya-e1102n0:89_29: upajjhāyenā”ti matassa vā vibbhamantassa vā purāṇaupajjhāyassa vā yassa kassaci avijjamānassāpi
anya-e1102n0:89_30: nāmena sabbattha upajjhāyakittanassa katattā vuttaṃ. Yadi hi upajjhāyakittanaṃ na
anya-e1102n0:89_31: kareyya,’puggalaṃ na parāmasatī’ti vuttakammavipattieva siyā, teneva pāḷiyaṃ “anupajjhāyakanti
anya-e1102n0:89_32: vutta”nti. Sace saṅghupajjhāyena gaṇupajjhāyena upasampādeti, kārakasaṅgho sātisāro,
anya-e1102n0:89_33: kammaṃ pana na kuppati, vakkhati hi vimativinodaniyaṃ “saṅghena upajjhāyenā”ti ayaṃ
anya-e1102n0:89_34: itthannāmo saṅghassa upasampadāpekkho, itthannāmo saṅghaṃ upasampadaṃ yācati. Saṅghena
anya-e1102n0:89_35: upajjhāyenā”ti evaṃ kammavācāya saṅghameva upajjhāyaṃ kittetvāti attho. Evaṃ’gaṇena
anya-e1102n0:89_36: upajjhāyenā’ti etthāpi ayaṃ itthannāmogaṇassa upasampadāpekkho’ti ādinā yojanā veditabbā.
anya-e1102n0:89_37: Evaṃ vuttepi kammaṃ na kuppati eva, dukkaṭasseva vuttattā, aññathā so ca puggalo
anya-e1102n0:89_38: anupasampannoti vadeyyā’ti. Sace paṇḍakādinā anupasampannakena upajjhāyena upasampādeti,
anya-e1102n0:89_39: te vajjetvā pañcavaggādigaṇo hatthapāsaṃ avijahitvā pūrati, kammaṃ na kuppati, kārakasaṅgho
anya-e1102n0:89_40: pana sātisāro tena vuttaṃ vimativinodaniyaṃ “paṇḍakādīhi upajjhāyehi kariyamānesu
anya-e1102n0:89_41: paṇḍakādikena vināva pañcavaggādigaṇo pūrati, kammaṃ na kuppati. Itarathā kuppatī”ti.
anya-e1102n0:89_42: Sace cattāro ācariyā ekato anusāventi, ettha pana kathanti vuccate, sabbaaṭṭhakathāsu
anya-e1102n0:89_43: dvīhi vā tīhi vā ācariyehi visuṃ visuṃ ekena ekassāti ekappahāreneva dve tisso vā
anya-e1102n0:89_44: kammavācā kātabbā. Sace pana nānācariyā nānupajjhāyā honti, tissatthero sumanattherassa
anya-e1102n0:89_45: saddhivihārikaṃ, sumanatthero tissattherassa saddhivihārikaṃ anusāveti, gaṇapūrakā
anya-e1102n0:89_46: honti vaṭṭati. Sace pana nānupajjhāyā honti, eko ācariyo hoti, natveva’nānupajjhāyenā’ti
anya-e1102n0:89_47: paṭikkhittattā na vaṭṭatīti ettakameva vuttaṃ. Catunnaṃ pana janānaṃ vicāraṇakathāya
anya-e1102n0:89_48: nāpi kammavipattichāyā dissati, tathāpi na kattabbameva, sabbaaṭṭhakathāsu avicāritattā.
anya-e1102n0:89_49: Sace vatthālaṅkārādisahitaparūḷhakesamassuṃ upasampādeti, sūpasampannova hoti, pacchā
anya-e1102n0:89_50: kesamassuṃ ohāretvā kāsāyāni vatthāni acchādetuṃ vaṭṭati terasavatthuvimuttattā sampatti
anya-e1102n0:91: Idāni sīmavisodhaniṃ nāma, nānāganthasamāhanti imissā gāthāya saṃvaṇṇanākkamo anuppatto.
anya-e1102n0:95: Yaṃ sīmaṃ anujānāti, tattha pañho pavattati.
anya-e1102n0:96: Dveḷhakā saṃsayā honti, dese sabbattha bhikkhavo;
anya-e1102n0:98: Yadi me īdisaṃ vādaṃ, sutvāvupekkhako bhave;
anya-e1102n0:106: Mā tvaṃ ānanda rodasi, mā tvaṃ ānanda socasi;
anya-e1102n0:116_0: Tattha sīmavisodhani'nti sīmavipattijahanaṃ sīmavipattiṃ pahāya sampattilakkhaṇappakāsakaṃ
anya-e1102n0:116_1: pakaraṇaṃ karissanti attho. Tattha sīmāti pannarasavidhā sīmā. Katame pannarasa.
anya-e1102n0:116_2: Khaṇḍasīmā, upacārasīmā, samānasaṃvāsasīmā, avippavāsasīmā, lābhasīmā, gāmasīmā,
anya-e1102n0:116_3: nigamasīmā, nagarasīmā, abbhantarasīmā, udakukkhepasīmā, janapadasīmā, raṭṭhasīmā,
anya-e1102n0:116_4: rajjasīmā, dīpasīmā, cakkavāḷasīmā’ti. Tattha khaṇḍasīmā nāma pabbajjupasampadādīnaṃ
anya-e1102n0:116_5: saṅghakammānaṃ sukhakaraṇatthaṃ mahāsīmāya vā gāmakhette vā khaṇḍitvā paricchinditvā
anya-e1102n0:116_6: sammatā. Tassāvitthāro ''paṭhamaṃ nimittā kittetabbā''ti ādinā dvāsattatippabhedāya
anya-e1102n0:116_7: samantapāsādikāya vinayaṭṭhakathāya mahāvagge vutto, idha vuttopi tatheva vutto bhaveyya,
anya-e1102n0:116_8: tasmā na vakkhāma, duviññeyyaṭṭhānameva kiñciṭhānaṃ nīharitvā pākaṭaṃ karissāma.
anya-e1102n0:116_9: Tattha sace pana heṭṭhā uparimassa sīmāparicchedassa parato anto leṇaṃ hoti, bahi
anya-e1102n0:116_10: sīmā na otarati. Athāpi uparimassa sīmāparicchedassa orato bahi leṇaṃ hoti, antosīmā
anya-e1102n0:116_11: na otaratīti ime dve ekatthā byañjanameva nānaṃ. Ayañhetthatthouparimassa sīmāparicchedassa
anya-e1102n0:116_12: orimabhāgato heṭṭhā pabbatapāde umaṅgasaṇṭhānena pabbatapasse vijjhitvā leṇaṃ hoti,
anya-e1102n0:116_13: sīmāparicchedassa parato leṇe ca leṇassa bahibhūte heṭṭhā pabbate ca bhūmibhāge sīmā
anya-e1102n0:116_14: na otarati, leṇassa upariyeva sīmā hotīti. Tassa uparimassa sīmāparicchedassa orimabhāgato
anya-e1102n0:116_15: bahibhūte heṭṭhā pabbatapāde umaṅgasaṇṭhānena vijjhitvā pabbatapasse leṇaṃ athāpi
anya-e1102n0:116_16: hoti, leṇe ca leṇassa parabhūte heṭṭhā pabbate ca bhūmibhāge sīmā na otarati, leṇassa
anya-e1102n0:116_17: uparibhāge va sīmā hotīti. Esā ca vicāraṇā vimativinodaniyampi katā. Anto ti pabbatassa
anya-e1102n0:116_18: anto, pabbatamūleti attho. Tameva antosaddaṃ sīmāparicchedena visesetuṃ “uparimassa
anya-e1102n0:116_19: sīmāparicchedassa parato”ti vuttaṃ. Pabbatapādaṃ pana apekkhitvā “orato”ti vattabbepi
anya-e1102n0:116_20: sīmānissayaṃ pabbataggaṃ sandhāya “parato”ti vuttanti daṭṭhabbaṃ teneva bahileṇanti
anya-e1102n0:116_21: ettha bahisaddaṃ visesento “uparimassa sīmāparicchedassa orato”ti āha. Bahi sīmā
anya-e1102n0:116_22: na otaratīti ettha bahī ti pabbatapādeleṇaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ. Leṇassa bahibhūte upari
anya-e1102n0:116_23: sīmāparicchedassa heṭṭhābhāge sīmā na otaratīti attho. Antosīmāti leṇassa ca pabbatapādassa
anya-e1102n0:116_24: ca anto attano otaraṇārahaṭṭhāne na otaratīti attho. Bahi sīmā na otaratīti attho,
anya-e1102n0:116_25: sīmā na otaratī ti cettha attano otaraṇārahaṭṭhāne leṇabhāvena sīmā sabbathā “anotaraṇameva
anya-e1102n0:116_26: dassitanti gahetabbaṃ. Tattha pi anotaraṇanti uparieva sīmā hotī”ti vimativinodanī.
anya-e1102n0:116_27: Keci pana veḷususiro viya susirameva leṇanti vadanti, taṃ ayuttaṃ.
anya-e1102n0:117_0: Upacārasīmā nāma gāmāraññanigamādivasā yāva brahmalokā tesaṃ tesaṃ sattānaṃ nivāsagehassa
anya-e1102n0:117_1: vā devavimānakapparukkhādīnaṃ vā upacārārahaṭṭhānameva upacārasīmā te idha nādhippetā,
anya-e1102n0:117_2: bhikkhūnaṃ avisayatāya. Yaṃ pana padesaṃ paricchinditvā pariveṇaṃ katvā pākārādiparikkhittaṃ
anya-e1102n0:117_3: vā katvā aparikkhittepi upacārārahaṭṭhānaṃ paricchinditvā vā yasmiṃ padese bhikkhū
anya-e1102n0:117_5: tathā hi “kathinatthatasīmāya”nti upacārasīmaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ, khandhasīmāya tatruppādābhāvatoti
anya-e1102n0:117_6: tīsupi gaṇṭhipadesu vuttaṃ. Tatruppādenā bhatanti vihārasantakena khettavatthuādinā
anya-e1102n0:117_7: ābhataṃ kiñci saṅghikaṃ cīvaraṃ uppajjati, taṃ tesaṃ kathinatthārakabhikkhūnaṃ yeva
anya-e1102n0:117_8: bhavissatīti yojanā kātabbā. Khettavatthuādinā ti ettha ādisaddena matakacīvaraṃ
anya-e1102n0:117_9: vā hotu saṃghaṃ uddissa dinnaṃ vā saṅghikena vā ti mahāaṭṭhakathāyaṃ vuttaṃ. Tasmiṃ
anya-e1102n0:117_10: upacārasīme pavattacīvaraṃ sabbaṃ saṅgaṇhāti, teneva “tena kho pana samayena aññatarena
anya-e1102n0:117_11: upāsakena saṅghaṃ uddissa vihāro kārito hoti, so tassa vihārassa kate ubhatosaṅghassa
anya-e1102n0:117_12: akālacīvaraṃ dātukāmo hoti. Tena kho pana samayena ubhatosaṅghassa kathinaṃ atthataṃ
anya-e1102n0:117_13: hoti. Atha kho so upāsako saṅghaṃ upasaṅkamitvā kathinuddhāraṃ yācī”ti imasmiṃ vatthusmiṃ
anya-e1102n0:117_14: ānisaṃsapasambhanatthaṃ kathinuddhāraṃ bhagavatā paññattaṃ, teneva thullanandā bhikkhunī
anya-e1102n0:117_15: ānisaṃsaṃ appaṭippassambhentā cīvaraṃ amhākaṃ bhavissatīti kathinuddhāraṃ paṭibāhi,
anya-e1102n0:117_16: tasmā kathinatthatasīmāyaṃ anuddhaṭe kathine yāva phagguṇapuṇṇamā pañca māsā etthantare
anya-e1102n0:117_17: matakacīvaraṃ vā hotu cātuddisaṃ saṅghaṃ uddissa matānaṃ ñātijanānaṃ vā, bhikkhāpaññattiyā
anya-e1102n0:117_18: vā vihāramahādikiccena vā yenakenaci ākārena saṅghikaṃ cīvaraṃ dinnaṃ hoti, taṃ sabbaṃ
anya-e1102n0:117_19: tesaṃ kathinatthārakabhikkhūnaṃyeva hoti. Chinnavassānaṃ vā pacchimikāya upagatānaṃ
anya-e1102n0:117_20: vā tattha sampattānaṃ sīmaṭṭhakabhikkhūnaṃ vā na hoti. Ajānitvā ce gaṇhanti dātabbameva.
anya-e1102n0:117_21: Yadi taṃ cīvaraṃ taṇḍulādikhādanīyabhojanaṃ karoti, itaresampi hotiyeva. Kasmāti
anya-e1102n0:117_22: ce ānisaṃsa vigatattā. Teneva gaṇapūraṇavasena sampattānaṃ chinnaṃ vassānaṃ vā pacchimikāya
anya-e1102n0:117_23: upagatānaṃ vā aññasmiṃ vihāre vutthavassanaṃ vā khādanīyabhojanīyādīni pāpuṇanti.
anya-e1102n0:117_24: Kathinatthatasāṭakassa dānakammavācā pana khaṇḍasīmāyameva vaṭṭasi. Tasmiṃ vihāre
anya-e1102n0:117_25: asati aññavihāre baddhasīmāya vā udakukkhepasīmādīsu vā kātabbameva.
anya-e1102n0:118_0: Kasmāti ce, tasmiṃ vihāre purimikāya upagatā kathinatthārakusalā na honti. Atthārakusalā
anya-e1102n0:118_1: khandhakabhāṇakattherā pariyesitvā ānetabbā. Kammavācaṃ sāvetvā kathinaṃ attharāpetvā
anya-e1102n0:118_2: dānañca bhuñjitvā gamissanti, ānisaṃso pana itaresaṃ vahotī’ti. Aññasīmaṭṭhakabhikkhūnampi
anya-e1102n0:118_3: kammavāca sāvanassa aṭṭhakathāyaṃ vuttattā. Chinnavassāvā pacchimikāya upagatā vā
anya-e1102n0:118_4: aññasmiṃ vihāre vutthavassāpi vā purimikāya upagatānaṃ gaṇapūraṇamattameva labhanti,
anya-e1102n0:118_5: ānisaṃso itaresaṃyeva hoti. Sacepi te chinnavassādayo anumodenti, bhinno kathinatthāro,
anya-e1102n0:118_6: idaṃ aṭṭhakathāyaṃ vicāritaṃ. Apare pana “kathinatthatasīmanti upacārasīmaṃ sandhāya
anya-e1102n0:118_7: vutta”nti vuttattā upacārasīmāyameva kathinanatthāraka ñattiṃ karonti, taṃ ayuttaṃ,
anya-e1102n0:118_8: sodhetuṃ dukkarattā. Tathā hi upacārasīmāyameva paviṭṭhagāmasīmāyaṃ tattha otiṇṇe
anya-e1102n0:118_9: bhikkhū tattha pāsānayanaṃ vā bahisīmakaraṇaṃ vā ko sakkhissati. “Kathinatthatasīmāya”nti
anya-e1102n0:118_10: imināpipadena kathinatthatabhāvoyeva vutto, na kathinatthatasāṭakassa dānakammavācā,
anya-e1102n0:118_11: sā ca vicāraṇā kammacatukkena dīpetabbā. Tattha apalokanakammaṃ ñattikammaṃ ñattidutiyakammaṃ
anya-e1102n0:118_12: ñatticatutthakammanti. Tattha apalokanakammaṃ nāma sīmaṭṭhakasaṅghaṃ sodhetvā chandārahānaṃ
anya-e1102n0:118_13: chandaṃ āharitvā samaggassa saṅghassa anumatiyā saṅghaṃ kittetvā “ruccati saṅghassā”ti
anya-e1102n0:118_14: tikkhuttuṃ anusāvetvā kattabbaṃ vuccati. Ñattikammaṃ nāma vuttanayeneva samaggassa
anya-e1102n0:118_15: saṅghassa anumatiyā ekāya ñattiyā kattabbaṃ kammaṃ. Ñattidutiyakammaṃ nāma vuttanayeneva
anya-e1102n0:118_16: samaggassa saṅghassa anumatiyā ekāya ñattiyā ekāya ca anusāvanāyāti evaṃ ñattidutiyāya
anya-e1102n0:118_17: anusāvanāya kattabbaṃ kammaṃ. Ñatticatutthakammaṃ nāma vuttanayeneva samaggassa saṅghassa
anya-e1102n0:118_18: anumatiyā ekāya ñattiyā tīhi ca anusāvanāhīti evaṃ ñatticatutthāhi tīhi anusāvanāhi
anya-e1102n0:118_19: kattabbaṃ kammaṃ. Tattha apalokanakammaṃ phalabhājanakālādīsu lahukakammeyeva labbhati.
anya-e1102n0:118_20: Kathinatthatasāṭakadānepi anatthateyeva kathine tato bahuānisaṃsacīvarasāṭakaṃ labhitvā
anya-e1102n0:118_21: teneva sāṭakena attharitabbā, puna kammavācāya dānakiccaṃ natthi apalokanakammena
anya-e1102n0:118_22: saṅghassa anumatiyā dātabbaṃ. Kathinatthatasāṭakadānakammavācā ekā ce vaṭṭati. Puna
anya-e1102n0:118_23: kamma vācāyakiccaṃ natthi. Ñattikammaṃ pana dhammasaṅgāhakakāle mahākassapattherādīhi
anya-e1102n0:118_24: attanāva attānaṃ sammannanakāle lahukakammeyeva labbhati. Ñattidutiyakammaṃ pana
anya-e1102n0:118_25: sīmāsammuti, sīmāsamūhanaṃ, kathinadānaṃ, kathinuddhāro, kuṭivatthudesanā, vihāravatthudesanāti
anya-e1102n0:118_26: imāni cha garukammāni apaloketvā kātuṃ na vaṭṭati. Ñattidutiyakammavācaṃ sāvetvāva
anya-e1102n0:118_27: kātabbaṃ. Ito paresu cīvaravippavāsasammutiādīsu ñattidutiyakammesu apaloketvāpi
anya-e1102n0:118_28: kātabbaṃ, lahukakammattā. Ñatticatutthakammaṃ pana idāni upasampadākammaṃ idāni cattāri
anya-e1102n0:118_29: kammāni baddhasīmāya vā, tasmiṃ asati udakukkhepasīmāya vā sodhetuṃ asakkonte sati
anya-e1102n0:118_30: abaddhasīmāya vā kātabbameva. Apare evaṃ vadanti “kuṭivatthukāravihāravatthukārakāle
anya-e1102n0:118_31: tāni kuṭivihāravatthūni kathaṃ sīmaṭṭhā kātuṃ sakkhissanti, tasmā tattha tattheva
anya-e1102n0:118_32: kuṭivihārakaraṇaṭṭhāneyeva kātabba”nti, taṃ tesaṃ vacanamattameva, na sārato paccetabbaṃ.
anya-e1102n0:118_33: Vatthuparāmasanamevettha pamāṇaṃ, tathā hi saṅghakuṭivatthuṃ olokentaṃ yācatityādinā
anya-e1102n0:118_34: vatthuparāmasanaṃ katvā heṭṭhā vatthuñattidose ca vipatti lakkhaṇe ca vajjetvā ñattidutiyakammena
anya-e1102n0:118_35: sammatabhikkhūhi tattha kuṭivihāraṭṭhānaṃ gantvā oloketabbaṃ teneva pāḷiyaṃ “tehi
anya-e1102n0:118_36: sammatehi bhikkhūhi tattha gantvā kuṭivatthu oloketabba”nti vuttaṃ. Aññathā pattacīvaravirahitaṃ
anya-e1102n0:118_37: puggalaṃ vā anupajjhāyakaṃ vā katvā upasampādentehi “paripuṇṇassa pattacīvara”nti
anya-e1102n0:118_38: vā “itthannāmassa upasampadāpekkho, itthannāmena upajjhāyenā”ti kammavācāya sāvitepi
anya-e1102n0:118_39: kammassa asijjhanaṃ bhaveyya. Apare evaṃ vadanti “sīmāsammutikāle pana kataṃ, tathā
anya-e1102n0:118_40: hi sīmāsammutikāle bhikkhū tasmiṃ yeva ṭhāne ṭhatvā kammavācaṃ sāventi, tasmimpi
anya-e1102n0:118_41: ṭhāne abaddhasīmāva hoti. Yadi baddhasīmā bhaveyya, sīmajjhottharaṇaṃ vā sīmasambhedo
anya-e1102n0:118_42: vā siyā”ti. Saccaṃ, tathāpi taṃ sīmāsammutiṭṭhānaṃ bhujissaṃ katvā sīmasammutikammassakatattā
anya-e1102n0:118_43: visuṃgāme sammatānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ gāmasīme ṭhitā bhikkhū kammaṃ kopetuṃ na sakkonti.
anya-e1102n0:118_44: Yadi sīmasammutiṭṭhānaṃ bhujissaṃ katvāva sīmaṃ sammanneyya, kathaṃ bhagavato dharamānakāle
anya-e1102n0:118_45: chabbaggiyā bhikkhu yathāsukhaṃ sīmaṃ sammannissantīti na panevaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ tathā
anya-e1102n0:118_46: hi vāsākhā migāramātāpi navakoṭīhi bhūmiṃ gaṇhitvā pubbārāmaṃ nāma mahā vihāraṃ kāresi,
anya-e1102n0:118_47: tathā anāthapiṇḍiko kahāpaṇasanthatena jetassa rājakumārassa uyyānaṭṭhānaṃ kiṇāpetvā
anya-e1102n0:118_48: gaṇhitvā jetavanaṃ nāma mahāvihāraṃ kāresi evaṃ puññakāmā pariveṇaṃ katvā vihāraṃ
anya-e1102n0:118_49: karonti tasmā chabbaggiyā bhikkhū yathāsukhaṃ sīmaṃ bandhantīti daṭṭhabbanti. Ayaṃ
anya-e1102n0:119_1: samānaṃ ekībhāvaṃ hutvā vasituṃ sammatā sīmā. Avippavāsasīmā nāma ticīvarena vippavasituṃ
anya-e1102n0:119_2: sammatā sīmā, etā dvesīmā tiyojanaparamatāyapi sambhavato mahāsīmā tipi nāmaṃ labhanti,
anya-e1102n0:119_3: tāsaṃ vicāraṇā mahāaṭṭhakathāyaṃ sabbaso paripuṇṇaṃ katvā vuttā, tasmā idha na vakkhāma
anya-e1102n0:119_4: vuccamānampi avisesetvā vuttaṃ bhaveyya, tasmā na vakkhāma.
anya-e1102n0:120_0: Lābhasīmā nāma yaṃ gāmaṃ vā nigamaṃ vā pokkharaṇītaḷākavanādikaṃ vā yaṃ yaṃ padesaṃ
anya-e1102n0:120_1: saṅghassa catuccappayatthāya rājarājamahāmattehi paricchinditvā ṭhapitā, esā lābhasīmā
anya-e1102n0:120_2: nāma. Neva sammāsambuddhena anuññātā, na dhammasaṅgahakattherehi ṭhapitā, api ca
anya-e1102n0:120_3: kho lābhadāyakehi ṭhapitāva. Mātikāṭṭhakathāya līnatthappakāsaniyampi lābhasīmāti
anya-e1102n0:120_4: yaṃ rājarājamahāmattādayo vihāraṃ kāretvā gāvutaṃ vā aḍḍhayojanaṃ vā yojanaṃ vā samantā
anya-e1102n0:120_5: paricchinditvā “ayaṃ amhākaṃ vihārassa lābhasīmā, yaṃ etthantare uppajjati, taṃ sabbaṃ
anya-e1102n0:120_6: amhākaṃ vihārassa demā”ti ṭhapenti, ayaṃ lābhasīmā nāmā’ti vuttaṃ. Imasmiṃ lābhasīmādhikāre
anya-e1102n0:120_7: rañño mahācetiyadāyakassa divaṅgatakālato ekasmiṃ saṃvacchare atīte tassa jeṭṭhaputtassa
anya-e1102n0:120_8: dhammarañño kāle īdisaṃ puññaṃ bhūtapubbaṃ. Yadi hi rājarājamahāmattādīsu yo koci
anya-e1102n0:120_9: yassa vihārassa yāni taḷākakhettavatthādīni datvā taṃ sahitavihāraṃ puggalassa deti,
anya-e1102n0:120_10: evaṃ sati kiṃ tassa puggalassa taṃ sahitavihāraṃ puggalikabhāvena paṭiggahetuṃ vaṭṭati,
anya-e1102n0:120_11: udāhu saṅghikabhāvenevāti taḷākakhettavatthādivirahito pana kevalo puggalikavihāro
anya-e1102n0:120_12: aññesaṃ dammīti adatvā puggale mate saṅghiko hoti, udāhu puggalikoyevāti. Tatrāyaṃ
anya-e1102n0:120_13: vissajjanā, yadi hi rājarājamahāmattādīsu yokoci vihārassa taḷākakhettāvatthādīni
anya-e1102n0:120_14: deti, evaṃ sati paṭikkhipituṃ na vaṭṭatītidaṭṭhabbaṃ tena vuttaṃ vinayaṭṭhakathāyaṃ
anya-e1102n0:120_15: “imaṃ taḷākaṃ, imaṃ khettaṃ, imaṃ vatthuṃ vihārassa demāti vutte paṭikkhipituṃ na
anya-e1102n0:120_16: labbhatī”ti. “Pāsādassa dāsiṃ, dāsaṃ, khettaṃ, vatthuṃ, gomahiṃsaṃ demāti vadanti,
anya-e1102n0:120_17: pāṭekkaṃ gahaṇakiccaṃ natthi, pāsāde paṭiggahite paṭiggahitameva hotī”ti ca. Vinayavinicchayapakaraṇe ca.
anya-e1102n0:123_0: Khuddasikkhāpakaraṇe ca “khettādīni vihārassa, vutte dammīti vaṭṭatī”ti vuttaṃ. “Vihārassa
anya-e1102n0:123_1: demā”ti cettha saṅghikavihārasseva, na puggalikavihārassāti daṭṭhabbaṃ, tathā hi
anya-e1102n0:123_2: vuttaṃ vimativinodaniyaṃ vihārassa demāti saṅghikavihāraṃ sandhāya vuttanti. “Pāsādassā”ti
anya-e1102n0:123_3: ca sāmaññena vuttepi “tena kho pana samayena visākhā migāramātā saṅghassa atthāya
anya-e1102n0:123_4: sāḷindaṃ pāsādaṃ kārāpetukāmo hoti hatthinakhaka”nti imasmiṃ vatthusmiṃ pāsādaparibhogassa
anya-e1102n0:123_5: anuññātattā saṅghikaṃyeva pāsādaṃ sandhāya vuttanti viññāyati tathā hi vuttaṃ vimativinodaniyaṃ
anya-e1102n0:123_7: saṅghikasenāsanaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ. Puggalikaṃ pana suvaṇṇādivicitraṃ bhikkhussa sampaṭicchitumeva
anya-e1102n0:123_8: na vaṭṭati, “na kenaci pariyāyena jātarūpajataṃ sādiyitabba”nti vuttattā, tenevettha
anya-e1102n0:123_9: aṭṭhakathāyaṃ saṅghikavihāre vā puggalikavihāre vāti na vutta’nti. “Bhikkhūnaṃ dhammavinayavaṇṇanaṭṭhāne”ti
anya-e1102n0:123_10: vuttattā saṅghikameva suvaṇṇādimayaṃ senāsanaṃ senāsanaparikkhārā ca vaṭṭanti, na
anya-e1102n0:123_11: puggalikānīti gahetabbanti ca, tasmā taḷākakhettavatthādisahitavihāro saṅghikoyeva
anya-e1102n0:123_12: hoti, na puggalikoti vinayakovidehi daṭṭhabbo. Sace pana rājarājamahāmattādīsu yokoci
anya-e1102n0:123_13: taḷākakhettavatthādisahitaṃ vihāraṃ puggalassa taṃ sahitavihārabhāvamārocetvā deti,
anya-e1102n0:123_14: evaṃ sati puggalassa saṅghikavihārabhāveneva paṭiggahetuṃ vaṭṭati, na puggalikavihārabhāvenāti
anya-e1102n0:123_15: daṭṭhabbaṃ. “Kasmā, vihārassa demā”ti vatvā dinnānaṃ taḷākakhettavatthādīnaṃ saṅghasseva
anya-e1102n0:123_16: vaṭṭamānattā. Tenevāha vimativinodaniyaṃ “vihārassa demāti vuttaṃ saṅghassa vaṭṭati,
anya-e1102n0:123_17: na puggalassa, khettādi viya daṭṭhabba”nti. Tatrāyaṃ yojanā vihārassādemāti vatvā
anya-e1102n0:123_18: dinnaṃ khettādi saṅghassa vaṭṭati, na puggalassa, evaṃ vihārassa demāti vuttaṃ suvaṇṇādivicittaṃ
anya-e1102n0:123_19: akappiyamañcaṃ saṅghassa vaṭṭati, na puggalassāti daṭṭhabbanti. Saṅghasseva kappiyavohārena
anya-e1102n0:123_20: khettādīni paṭiggahetuṃ vaṭṭati, tathā hi vuttaṃ vimativinodaniyaṃ “cattāropaccaye
anya-e1102n0:123_21: paribhuñjatūti deti vaṭṭatītiettha bhikkhusaṅghassa catupaccayaparibhogatthāya taḷākaṃ
anya-e1102n0:123_22: dammīti vā bhikkhusaṅgho cattāro paccaye paribhuñjituṃ taḷākaṃ dammīti vā ito taḷākato
anya-e1102n0:123_23: uppanne cattāro paccaye dammīti vā vuttampi vaṭṭati. Idañca saṅghassa diyyamānaññeva
anya-e1102n0:123_24: sandhāya vuttaṃ, puggalassa pana evampi dinnaṃ taḷākakhettādi na vaṭṭati. Suddhacittassa
anya-e1102n0:123_25: pana udakaparibhogatthaṃ kūpapokkharaṇīādayo vaṭṭanti. Saṅghassataḷākaṃatthi, taṃkathantiādināhisabbattha
anya-e1102n0:123_26: saṅghassavaseneva vuttanti. “Khettādayo pana sabbesaṅghasseva vaṭṭanti, pāḷiyaṃ puggalikavasena
anya-e1102n0:123_27: gahetuṃ ananuññātattāti daṭṭhabba”nti ca. Puggalassa pana puggalānañca khettavatthādīni
anya-e1102n0:123_28: kappiyavohārenāpi paṭiggahetuṃ na vaṭṭati. Evañcakatvā vimativinodaniyaṃ “khettavatthādīnipi
anya-e1102n0:123_29: kappiyavohārenāpi puggalānaṃ gahetuṃ na vaṭṭati, tathā anuññātattāti viññāyati khettavatthupaṭiggahaṇā
anya-e1102n0:123_30: paṭivirato hotī”ti ādinā hi paṭikkhittāsu ekasseva puggalikavasena gahaṇe ananuññāte
anya-e1102n0:123_31: taditarānaṃ tathāgahetabbatā siddhāva hotī’ti vuttaṃ, tasmā taḷākakhettavatthādisahitassa
anya-e1102n0:123_32: vihārassa saṅghikabhāveneva paṭiggahetabbatā siddhā hotīti daṭṭhabbā. Ayaṃ paṭhamapañhe vissajjanā.
anya-e1102n0:124_0: Taḷākakhettavatthādivirahitaṃ pana vihāraṃ puggalikabhāvenāpi paṭiggahetuṃ vaṭṭati.
anya-e1102n0:124_1: So ca vihāro tasmiṃ puggale jīvante puggaliko hoti. Aññesaṃ dammīti adatvā mate avissajjanīyo
