anya-e1102n0:124_2: avebhaṅgiyo, saṅghikoyeva hotīti daṭṭhabbo. Yathāha, bhikkhussa bhikkhave kālaṅkate
anya-e1102n0:124_3: saṅgho sāmi pattacīvare. Api ca gilānupaṭṭhākā bahūpakārā, anujānāmi bhikkhave saṅghena
anya-e1102n0:124_4: ticīvarañca gilānupaṭṭhākānaṃ dātuṃ. Yaṃ tattha lahubhaṇḍaṃ lahuparikkhāraṃ, taṃ
anya-e1102n0:124_5: sammukhībhūtena saṅghena bhājetabbaṃ. Yaṃ tattha garubhaṇḍaṃgaruparikkhāraṃ taṃ āgatānāgatassa
anya-e1102n0:124_7: jīvante puggaliko, mate saṅghikoyevāti aññesaṃ adatvā ṭhapitaparikkhārāpi tattha
anya-e1102n0:124_8: saṅghasseva honti. Dvinnaṃ santakaṃ hoti avibhattaṃ, ekasmiṃ kālaṅkate itaro sāmi.
anya-e1102n0:124_9: Bahūnaṃ santakepi eseva nayo, sabbesu matesu saṅghikaṃ hotī”ti vuttaṃ.
anya-e1102n0:125_0: Ettha ca yaṃ tattha garubhaṇḍa’nti ādīsu garubhaṇḍaṃ nāma rāsivasena pañcavidhaṃ,
anya-e1102n0:125_1: sarūpavasena pana pañcavīsatividhaṃ hoti, tasmā matakasantakabhūtassāpi vihārassa
anya-e1102n0:125_2: garubhaṇḍabhāvo veditabbo, tenāha aṭṭhakathāyaṃ “yaṃ tattha lahubhaṇḍaṃ yaṃ tattha garubhaṇḍa”nti.
anya-e1102n0:128: Ettha vihārassa garubhaṇḍabhāvo veditabbo. Ayaṃ dutiyapañhe vissajjanā.
anya-e1102n0:129_0: Ayaṃ haṃsāvatiyā pāmokkhamahātherānaṃ vissajjanā. Rāmaññaraṭṭhavāsino pana mahātherā
anya-e1102n0:129_1: puggalikabhāvenāpi paṭiggahetabbamevāti vadanti, tathā jaṃmāyaraṭṭhavāsinopi mahātherā,
anya-e1102n0:129_2: tathā sūnāparantaraṭṭhavāsinopi mahātherā tathā isinagaravāsinopi mahātherā puggalikabhāvena
anya-e1102n0:129_3: paṭiggahaṇe doso natthī’ti vadanti tesaṃ mahātherānaṃ ayamadhippāyo lābhasīmānāmesā
anya-e1102n0:129_4: neva sammāsambuddhena anuññātā. Na dhammasaṅgāhakattherehipi ṭhapitā. Api ca kho
anya-e1102n0:129_5: puññatthikehi lābhadāyakehi ṭhapitā tasmā puññatthikā rājarājamahāmattādayo vihāraṃ
anya-e1102n0:129_6: kārāpetvā tassa vihārassa lābhatthāya padesaṃ paricchinditvā ṭhapenti “yaṃ etthantare
anya-e1102n0:129_7: uppajjati, taṃ sabbaṃ amhākaṃ vihārassa demā”ti. Taṃ pana vihāraṃ attano rucitassa
anya-e1102n0:129_8: yassakassaci puggalassa “imaṃ vihāraṃ tuyhaṃ dammi, tava vihāro hotū”tivā attano
anya-e1102n0:129_9: ruciyā deti sopi puggalo “anujānāmi bhikkhave pañcaleṇāni vihāra”nti ādinā anuññātavihārameva
anya-e1102n0:129_10: paṭiggaṇhāti, bhagavato anuññātavihāramattasseva paṭiggahitattāti. Tasmiṃ vihāre
anya-e1102n0:129_11: khettavatthādīni atthīti ce. “Khettavatthupaṭiggahaṇā paṭivirato hotī”ti ādinā yaṃ
anya-e1102n0:129_13: vihāramattameva hi paṭiggahite tappaṭibaddhā khettādivatthusmiṃ uppannacīvara piṇḍapātagilānapaccayabhesajjaparikkhārāpi
anya-e1102n0:129_14: tasseva puggalassa kappiyabhāveneva pavattanti, puggalassa paṭiggahaṇe vā paribhutte
anya-e1102n0:129_15: vā doso natthi, bhagavatā eva anuññātassa kappiyapaccayassa paribhuñjitattā. Suttaṃ
anya-e1102n0:129_16: āharāti ce, “anujānāmi bhikkhave sabbaṃ pāsādaparibhoga”nti. Nanu ca visākhā migāramātā
anya-e1102n0:129_17: saṅghasseva atthāya sāḷindaṃ pāsādaṃ hatthinakhakanti. Saccaṃ, tathāpi puggalo saṅghapariyāpanno
anya-e1102n0:129_18: saṅghassa pāsādaparibhoge anuññāte tadantogadhassapi puggalassa anuññātameva hoti.
anya-e1102n0:129_19: Aññathā puggale antovihāre nisinnoyeva saṅgho tasmiṃ yeva vihārasīme kammaṃ karontopi
anya-e1102n0:129_20: kammakopo na bhaveyya, avaggārahattāti vakkhati ca sāratthadīpaniyaṃ “anujānāmi bhikkhave
anya-e1102n0:129_21: sabbaṃ pāsādaparibhoga”nti vacanato puggalikepi senāsane se nāsanaparibhogavasena
anya-e1102n0:129_22: niyamitaṃ suvaṇṇaghaṭādikaṃ paribhuñjituṃ vaṭṭamānampi kevalaṃ attano santakaṃ katvā
anya-e1102n0:129_23: paribhuñjituṃ na vaṭṭatī”ti, imināpi vacanena puggalikavihārassapi sabbakappiyabhāvo
anya-e1102n0:129_24: viññāyati “anujānāmi bhikkhave sabbaṃ pāsādaparibhoga”nti ñāpakassa dassanato. Suvaṇṇaghaṭādikanti
anya-e1102n0:129_25: ettha ādisaddo mariyādattho, pakārattho vā, tena rajatahārakūṭa-jātiphalikādīni akappiyaghaṭāni
anya-e1102n0:129_27: tāni bhikkhussa parikkhārabhāvena na vaṭṭanti tathā dāsidāsagomahiṃsāpi, tathā khettādivatthumpi
anya-e1102n0:129_28: bhikkhussa attano santakabhāvena paṭiggahetuṃ na vaṭṭanti, vihārassa pana paṭisedhetabbaṃ
anya-e1102n0:129_29: natthi, sabbasaddassa dassanato tenevāha samantapāsādikāya vinayaṭṭhakathāya “senāsane
anya-e1102n0:129_30: pana dvārakavāṭa vātapānakavāṭādīsu sabbaṃ ratanamayampi vaṇṇamaṭṭhakammaṃ vaṭṭati.
anya-e1102n0:129_31: Senāsane kiñci paṭisedhetabbaṃ natthi aññatra viruddhasenāsanā”ti, iminā ṭhapetvā’gāmañca
anya-e1102n0:129_32: gāmūpacārañcā’ti ettha viruddhasenāsanaṃ ṭhapetvā sabbakappiyākappiyaṃ vihārassa
anya-e1102n0:129_33: kappati, kiñciappamattakampi paṭisedhetabbaṃ nāma natthīti viññāyati, tenevāha vinayavinicchaye.
anya-e1102n0:132_0: Nanuca vihārassa demāti saṅghikavihāraṃ sandhāya vuttanti vimativinodaniyaṃ vuttanti.
anya-e1102n0:132_2: demā”ti vutte “na kappati upāsakā”ti paṭikkhipitabbaṃ. Kasmā puggalo tassa vihārassa
anya-e1102n0:132_3: sāmi, vihārassa dinne puggalassa dinnameva hoti, evaṃ sati ca “khettavatthupaṭiggahaṇā
anya-e1102n0:132_4: paṭivirato hotī”ti ādinā vuttasikkhāpadena kāretabbataṃ āpajjati. Saṅghikavihārassa
anya-e1102n0:132_5: pana na paṭikkhipitabbaṃ. Kasmā so puggalo tassa saṅghikavihārassa anissaro. Cātuddisaṃ
anya-e1102n0:132_6: saṅghaṃ uddissa dinnaṃ yaṃkiñci khuddakaṃ vā mahantaṃ vā padesaṃ acchinditvā gaṇhantassapi
anya-e1102n0:132_7: pārājiko na hoti, sabbasseva cātuddisikassa saṅghassa dhuranikkhepassa asambhavato
anya-e1102n0:132_8: tasmā saṅghikavihārassa dinne paṭikkhitte saṅghassa lābhantarāyakaro hotīti. Imamevatthaṃ
anya-e1102n0:132_9: sandhāya vihārassa demāti saṅghikavihāraṃ sandhāya vutta’nti vuttaṃ bhaveyya, na
anya-e1102n0:132_10: puggalikabhāvenāpi paṭiggahetabbanti. Evañca sati sāmikānaṃ dhuranikkhepenā’ti ettha
anya-e1102n0:132_11: ekassa santake taḷāke khette ca jāte tasseva dhuranikkhepena pārājikaṃ. Yadi pana
anya-e1102n0:132_12: taṃ taḷākaṃ sabbasādhāraṇaṃ, khettāni pāṭipuggalikāni, tassa ca dhuranikkhepe avahāro.
anya-e1102n0:132_13: Atha khettānipi sabbasādhāraṇāni, sabbesaṃ dhuranikkhepeyeva pārājikaṃ, nāsatīti
anya-e1102n0:132_14: daṭṭhabbanti vimativinodaniyaṃ vuttavacanena avirodho siyā, tathā hi khettavatthādisahitassa
anya-e1102n0:132_15: vihārassa puggalikabhāvena akappiye sati. Kathaṃ puggalassa khettavatthādikamārabbha
anya-e1102n0:132_16: abhiyuñjabhāvo bhaveyya, evañca pana vadeyya “dhuraṃ nikkhipatīti ettha ekassa santake
anya-e1102n0:132_17: taḷāke khette cātiettha gihisantakameva sandhāya vutta”nti. Tathāpi na vattabbaṃ.
anya-e1102n0:132_18: Kasmā “dhuraṃ nikkhipatīti yadā pana sāmiko ayaṃ thaddho kakkhaḷo, jīvitabrahmacariyantarāyampi
anya-e1102n0:132_19: me kareyya, alaṃ dāni mayhaṃ iminā”ti padassa dissanato teneva “khettāni pāṭipuggalikāni,
anya-e1102n0:132_20: tassa ca dhuranikkhepe”ti vimativinodaniyaṃ vuttaṃ. Tathā “anujānāmi bhikkhave sabbaṃ
anya-e1102n0:132_21: pāsādaparibhoga”nti vacanato puggalikepi senāsane senāsanaparibhogavasena niyamitaṃ
anya-e1102n0:132_22: suvaṇṇaghaṭādikaṃ paribhuñjituṃ na vaṭṭamānampi kevalaṃ attano santakaṃ katvā paribhuñjituṃ
anya-e1102n0:132_23: na vaṭṭatī”ti sāratthadīpaniyaṃ vutta vacanenāpi avirodho siyā, tathā “senāsane kiñci
anya-e1102n0:132_24: paṭisedhetabbaṃ natthi aññatra viruddhasenāsananā”ti aṭṭhakathāvacanenāpi saṃsandameva.
anya-e1102n0:132_25: Tathā “yaṃ bhikkhave mayā idaṃ na kappatīti appaṭikkhittaṃ, taṃ ce kappiyaṃ anulometi,
anya-e1102n0:132_26: akappiyaṃ paṭibāhati, taṃ vo kappatī”ti iminā suttānulomenapisaṃndameva. Kathaṃ “anujānāmi
anya-e1102n0:132_27: bhikkhave pañcaleṇāni vihārantyā”dinā anuññātavihārassa paṭiggahitatthā. Tappaṭibaddhacīvarādikappiyapaccayasseva
anya-e1102n0:132_29: kappiyānulomā ca honti. Evaṃ suttasuttānulomaācariyavādaattanomatīhi saṃsandanato
anya-e1102n0:132_30: aññadatthu gaṅgodakena yamunodakaṃ viya khettavatthādisahitavihāro puggalikabhāvenāpi
anya-e1102n0:132_31: paṭiggahetabboti kappiyā kappiyāni vinayakovidehi daṭṭhabbo. Ayaṃ isinagaravāsīnaṃ
anya-e1102n0:133: “Ye ca janā garubhaṇḍaṃ saṃvidhāya avaharuṃ. Dhuranikkhepo ca hoti, pārājikamanāpannā, pañhāmesā kusalehi cintitā”ti.
anya-e1102n0:134_0: Ayaṃ pañhā saṅghikabhūmithenake bhikkhu sandhāya vuttā, tattha hi paccuppannasaṅghassa
anya-e1102n0:134_1: dhuranikkhepena cātuddisikasaṅghassa dhuranikkhepābhāvato avahāro natthīti. Ayaṃ
anya-e1102n0:135_0: Gāmasīmānigamasīmānagarasīmā pana pākaṭāyeva. Tāsaṃ pana viseso evaṃ veditabbo yasmiṃ
anya-e1102n0:135_1: pana padese āpaṇameva atthi, na pākāraparikkhittaṃ pākāraparikkhittameva vā atthi
anya-e1102n0:135_2: na āpaṇaṃ ayaṃ padeso gāmo nāma. Yasmiṃ pana ṭṭhāne gāmoyeva atthi, na pana āpaṇapākārā
anya-e1102n0:135_3: santi, ayaṃ padeso nigamo nāma. Yattha pana āpaṇampi atthi pākāraparikkhittampi,
anya-e1102n0:135_4: ayaṃ padeso nagaraṃ nāma. Ayaṃ padeso nāgāravanti etthāti vacanatthena rājūnaṃ vā
anya-e1102n0:135_5: mahāmattānaṃ vā nivāsanayogyaṭṭhānattā nagaranti vuccati. Lokiyasatthe pana.
anya-e1102n0:138_0: Vuttaṃ. Evaṃ gāmanigamanagarānaṃ visesaṃ ñatvā gāmoyeva gāmasīmā, nigamoyeva nigamasīmā,
anya-e1102n0:138_1: nagarameva nagarasīmāti tāsaṃ vacanattho veditabbo. Tattha yaṃ padesaṃ asammatāya
anya-e1102n0:138_2: bhikkhave sīmāya aṭhapitāya yaṃ gāmaṃ vā nigamaṃ vā upanissāya viharati, yā tassa
anya-e1102n0:138_3: gāmassa vā gāmasīmā nigamassa vā nigamasīmā, ayaṃ tattha samānasaṃvāsā ekūposathā’ti
anya-e1102n0:138_4: anuññātaṃ, tasmiṃ padese sabbopi vā gāmapadeso. Yampi ekasmiṃyeva gāmakhette ekaṃ
anya-e1102n0:138_5: padesaṃ “ayaṃ visuṃ gāmo hotū”ti paricchinditvā rājā kassaci deti sopi visuṃgāmasīmā
anya-e1102n0:138_6: hotiyeva tasmā sā ca itarā ca pakatigāmanagaranigamasīmā baddhasīmāsadisāyeva honti.
anya-e1102n0:138_7: Kevalaṃ pana ticīvaravippavāsaparihāraṃ na labhanti. Ettha ca apare evaṃ vadanti,
anya-e1102n0:138_9: brahmadeyyavasena dinnameva visuṃ gāmasīmā hoti, na āyamattassa, chejjabhejjassa
anya-e1102n0:138_10: anissarattā”ti taṃ na panevaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ, chejjabhejjassa rājārahattā tathā hi lokavohārasaṅketavasena
anya-e1102n0:138_11: ayaṃ padeso imassa gāmassa paricchedo”ti issarehi kataparicchinnameva pamāṇaṃ hoti.
anya-e1102n0:138_12: Yadi chejjabhejjakaro bhaveyya, rājātveva saṅkhyaṃ gacchati. Sopi gāmadeso nagararajjasīmā
anya-e1102n0:138_13: bhaveyya, na pana gāmasīmāmattameva, tenevāha samantapāsādikāya vinayaṭṭhakathāya
anya-e1102n0:138_14: “yattake padese tassa gāmassa gāmabhojakā baliṃ labhanti, so padeso appo vā hotu
anya-e1102n0:138_15: mahanto vā, gāmasīmātveva saṅkhyaṃ gacchati. Nagaranigamasīmāsupi eseva nayo”ti.
anya-e1102n0:139_0: Abbhantarasīmā nāma yaṃ paṭapadesaṃ agāmake bhikkhave araññe samantā sattabbhantarā,
anya-e1102n0:139_1: ayaṃ tattha samānasaṃvāsā ekūposathā’ti anuññātā abbhantarasīmā nāma. Tattha samantā
anya-e1102n0:139_2: sattabbhantarāti yasmiṃ viñjhāṭavisadise araññe bhikkhu vasati, athassa ṭhitokāsato
anya-e1102n0:139_3: samantā puratthimāya sattabbhantarā pacchimāya sattabbhantarā dakkhiṇāya sattabbhantarā
anya-e1102n0:139_4: uttarāya sattabbhantarāti samantā sattabbhantarā. Vinibbedhena cuddasā ti puratthimapacchimavasena
anya-e1102n0:139_5: cuddasabbhantarā, dakkhiṇuttaravasenapi cuddasabbhantarāti evaṃ nibbedhena cuddasa
anya-e1102n0:139_6: cuddasa katvā samantā aṭṭhavīsati abbhantarā honti. Ettha ca ekaṃ abbhantaraṃ aṭṭhavīsati
anya-e1102n0:139_7: hatthappamāṇaṃ hoti, tasmā puratthimāya sattabbhantare channavutisatahatthappamāṇaṃ
anya-e1102n0:139_8: hoti, evaṃ dakkhiṇuttarapacchimesupīti sabbaṃ sampiṇḍetvā caturāsītisattasatahatthappamāṇaṃ
anya-e1102n0:139_9: hoti. Parimaṇḍalavasena pana sabbaṃ chasattatiekasatuttarāni ca ekaṃ sahassañca hoti.
anya-e1102n0:142_0: Vuttattā ayanavasena vinibbedhe cuddasabbhantare dvehatthādhikaaṭṭhasattati hoti.
anya-e1102n0:142_1: Sabbaṃ aṭṭhavīsati abbhantaraṃ sampiṇḍetvā catuhatthādhikachappaññāsuttara ekasataṃ
anya-e1102n0:142_2: hoti. Parimaṇḍalavasena pana chahatthādhikacatutiṃsuttaradvesatāni honti, usabhavasena
anya-e1102n0:142_3: pana vinibbedhena cuddasa abbhantare dvehi ūnāni cattāri usabhāni ca dveratanañca
anya-e1102n0:142_4: honti. Sabbaṃ sampiṇḍetvā aṭṭhavīsatiyā abbhantare caturatanañca soḷasa ayanāni adhikāni
anya-e1102n0:142_5: satta usabhāni honti. Parimaṇḍalavasena pana charatanañca cuddasaayanāni ca adhikāni
anya-e1102n0:142_6: ekādasa usabhāni honti. Ayamettha sārato vinicchayo. Keci pana abbhantarasaddaṃ hattharatanavācakaṃ
anya-e1102n0:142_7: parikappetvā evaṃ vadanti majjhe ṭhitassa samantā satta vinibbedhena cuddasā’ti vuttattā
anya-e1102n0:142_8: puratthimāya satta hatthā dakkhiṇuttarapacchimesupi satta satta hatthāti katvā evaṃ
anya-e1102n0:142_9: nibbedhena cuddasa hatthā honti. Sabbaṃ sampiṇḍetvā aṭṭhavīsatihatthaṃ abbhantaranti
anya-e1102n0:142_10: taṃ tesaṃ matimattameva, na sārato paccetabbaṃ. Kasmā aṭṭhakathāyaṃ tattha ekaṃ abbhantaraṃ
anya-e1102n0:142_11: aṭṭhavīsatihattha’nti vuttattā. Yadi tesaṃ matena sabbaṃ sampiṇḍetvā aṭṭhavīsatihatthabbhantaraṃ
anya-e1102n0:142_12: bhaveyya, aṭṭhakathāyaṃ tattha abbhantaraṃ nāma aṭṭhavīsatihatthappamāṇaṃ hoti, majjhe
anya-e1102n0:142_13: ṭhitassa samantā sattavinibbedhena cuddasā hontī’ti vattabbaṃ bhaveyya, na panevaṃ
anya-e1102n0:142_14: vuttaṃ, tasmā taṃ tesaṃ matimattamevāti daṭṭhabbaṃ. Tattha ayañhetthattho tattha
anya-e1102n0:142_15: tatthā’ti niddhāraṇe bhummaṃ. Ekanti gaṇanaparicchedo. Abbhantaranti paricchinnaniddeso,
anya-e1102n0:142_17: tattha tesu samantā sattabbhantaresu ekaṃ abbhantaraṃ nāma aṭṭhavīsatihatthappamāṇaṃ
anya-e1102n0:142_18: hotīti attho daṭṭhabbo. Ettha pana saṅkhyā kathetabbā. Sā duvidhā parimāṇaminanavasena.
anya-e1102n0:142_19: Tattha parimāṇa saṅkhyā evaṃ veditabbā catasso muṭṭhiyo eko kuḍuvo. Cattāro kuḍuvā
anya-e1102n0:142_20: eko pattho, cattāro patthā eko āḷhako. Cattāro āḷhakā ekaṃ doṇaṃ, cattāri doṇāni
anya-e1102n0:142_21: ekā mānikā. Catasso mānikā ekā khārī. Vīsati khārikā eko vāho. Tadeva ekaṃ sakaṭanti
anya-e1102n0:142_22: suttanipātaṭṭhakathādīsu vuttaṃ. Sāratthadīpaniyaṃ pana nava vāhasahassānīti ettha
anya-e1102n0:142_23: catasso muṭṭhiyo kuḍuvo, cattāro kuḍuvā eko pattho, cattāro patthā eko āḷhako. Cattāro
anya-e1102n0:142_24: āḷhakā ekaṃ doṇaṃ, cattāri doṇāni ekā mānikā, cattasso mānikā ekā khārī. Vīsatikhārikā
anya-e1102n0:142_25: eko vāho. Tadeva ekaṃ sakaṭanti suttanipātaṭṭhakathādīsu vutta’nti vatvā “idha pana
anya-e1102n0:142_26: dve sakaṭāni eko vāhoti vadantī”ti likhitaṃ paccantavohārena minite pana saṭṭhisataṃ
anya-e1102n0:142_27: eko vāhoti rañño dhammāsokassa sūvakāhatasāliyā minite pana paccantavohārena vīsādhikatisataṃ
anya-e1102n0:142_28: hoti eko vāhoti vadanti. Minana saṅkhyā pana evaṃ veditabbā. Tathā hi –
anya-e1102n0:146: Chattiṃsa rathareṇū ca, ekā likkhāti vuccati.
anya-e1102n0:152_0: Vuttattā ekā rajo paramāṇu atisukhumā acakkhuviññeyyā, sarīrampi ghanaselamayaṃ sinerupabbatarājampi
anya-e1102n0:152_1: vinijjhitvā gatā. Tassā chattiṃsaparimāṇaṃ ekoaṇu tajjāritassa chattiṃsaparimāṇaṃ
anya-e1102n0:152_2: ekārathareṇu. Tassā chattiṃsaparimāṇaṃ ekalikkhā. Sattalikkhā ekā ūkā. Satta ūkā
anya-e1102n0:152_3: ekaṃ dhaññaṃ. Sattadhaññaṃ ekā aṅguli, dvādasaaṅguli ekā vidatthi. Dve vidatthi ekaratanaṃ.
anya-e1102n0:152_4: Sattahatthaṃ ekayaṭṭhi, vīsayaṭṭhi ekā usabhā, asīti usabhā gāvutaṃ. Cattāri gāvutāni
anya-e1102n0:152_5: meruyojananti vuccati. Tattha aṇurajo kiḷañjakuṭṭachiddādīsu vāte pahaṭakāle sūriyālokesu
anya-e1102n0:152_6: dissati. Tajjārī pana sakaṭamaggādīsu dakkhiṇavāma passādīsu dissati. Rathareṇu pana
anya-e1102n0:152_7: tassā allīyanaṭṭhānesu dissati. Likkhā pana atioḷārikā pākaṭā hoti. Ayaṃ meruayanavasena vuttaṃ.
anya-e1102n0:156: Vuttattā dasa kesā ekatilaṃ nāma. Chatilaṃ ekaṃ yavaṃ nāma. Catuyavaṃ eko aṅguli nāma. Pañcadasaṅguliyo eko pādoti vuccati. Idaṃ tīsu vedesu āgatavasena vuttaṃ.
anya-e1102n0:159: Catuyavañca aṅguli, aṭṭhaṅguli ekā muṭṭhi, ratanaṃ timuṭṭhi bhave”ti.
anya-e1102n0:160_0: Vuttattā dasakesā ekaṃ tilaṃ nāma. Chatilaṃ ekaṃ yavaṃ nāma. Catuyavaṃ ekāaṅguli
anya-e1102n0:160_1: nāma. Aṭṭhaṅgulaṃ ekāmuṭṭhi. Trimuṭṭhi ekaratanaṃ. Pañca ratanāni ekodaṇḍo. Vīsati
anya-e1102n0:160_2: daṇḍāni ekousabho. Asīti usabhā ekā gāvī. Catasso gāviyo ekayojananti vuttaṃ, tenevāha.
anya-e1102n0:162: Asīti usabhā gāvī, catugāvī ca yojana”nti.
anya-e1102n0:165: Asīti usabhā gāvī, catugāvī ca yojana”nti vuttaṃ.
anya-e1102n0:170: Vuttaṃ. Tenevāha “tattha ekaṃ aṭṭhavīsatihattappamāṇaṃ hotī”ti. Ettha ca agāmake ceti ettha akāro kataratthoti, tathā hi akāro.
anya-e1102n0:173_0: Vuttesu dissati tathā hi ajanetvā tiādīsu paṭisedhe dissati. “Aparihānīyā dhammā”ti
anya-e1102n0:173_1: ādīsu vuddhimhi. “Anavajjaṃ bhante”ti ādīsu tabbhāve akkharā’ti ādīsu aññatthe. “Amaru
anya-e1102n0:173_2: rājā”tiādīsu sadise. “Amala”nti ādīsu viruddhe. “Aseṭṭhoyaṃ brāhmaṇo abrahmacārī”ti
anya-e1102n0:173_3: ādīsu garahe. “Agāmo”ti ādīsu suññe. “Apatikāyaṃitthī”ti ādīsu virahe. “Atha nāyaṃ
anya-e1102n0:173_4: kaññā”ti ādīsu appake. Idha pana suññe virahe vā daṭṭhabbo. Suññatthena pana agāmake
anya-e1102n0:173_5: nimanusse kevalāraññeti attho. Virahattho vā agāmake gāmavirahite padeseti attho
anya-e1102n0:173_7: muñcitvā yaṃ anavasesaṃ heṭṭhā pathavīsandhārakaudakampiudakasandhārako vātopi ajaṭākāsampi,
anya-e1102n0:173_9: araññantveva saṅgahitā. Nadīsamuddantaresupi macchabandhānaṃ agamanapatho dīpako
anya-e1102n0:173_10: vā pabbato vā, sopi araññasīmātveva saṅkhyaṃ gacchati, tasmā ayaṃ sattabbhantarasīmā
anya-e1102n0:173_11: nimanusse kevalāraññe pathavīmaṇḍalepi devaloke vimānakapparukkhādīsupi labbhateva.
anya-e1102n0:173_12: Pathaviyaṃ pana yasmiṃ gāmakhette heṭṭhā pathaviyā yattha vā suvaṇṇamaṇiādīni khaṇitvā
anya-e1102n0:173_13: gahetuṃ sakkonti, taṃ padesaṃ gāmakhettameva. Tato parā yāva pathavīsandhārakaudakā
anya-e1102n0:173_14: ajaṭākāsepi labbhateva. Nanu chakāmāvacara devalokesupi devavimānakapparukkhagāmanigamādayopi
anya-e1102n0:173_15: attheva. Atha kasmā “araññā”ti kathitāti amanussā vā sattā jātibhinnattā ca te agāmāyeva,
anya-e1102n0:173_16: teneva “nimanussamhi araññamhī”ti vuttaṃ. Tiracchānavatthusmimpi “nāgo vā hotu supaṇṇamāṇavakādīnaṃ
anya-e1102n0:173_17: vā aññataro antamaso sakkaṃ devarājānaṃ upādāya yo koci amanussajātiko sabbova imasmiṃ
anya-e1102n0:173_18: atthe tiracchānagatoti veditabbo”ti vuttaṃ, tasmā jātibhinnatāya amanussāvāso araññanti
anya-e1102n0:174_0: Idāni udakukkhepasīmāya saṃvaṇṇanākkamo sampatto. Tattha “sabbā bhikkhave nadī asīmā.
anya-e1102n0:174_1: Sabbo samuddo asīmo. Sabbo jātassaro asīmo. Nadiyā vā bhikkhave samudde vā jātassare
anya-e1102n0:174_2: vā yaṃ majjhimassa purisassa samantā udakukkhepā, ayaṃ tattha samānasaṃvāsā ekūposathā”ti
anya-e1102n0:174_3: paññattā, ayaṃ udakukkhepasīmā nāma. Tattha “sabbā bhikkhave nadī asīmā”ti ettha
anya-e1102n0:174_4: asīmasadde akāro virahattho, asīmā baddhasīmā virahitāti attho. Ñattidutiyakammavācaṃ
anya-e1102n0:174_5: sāvetvāpi bandhasīmāvirahitāti vuttaṃ hoti. Paṭisedhattho vā, asammannitabbāti attho.
anya-e1102n0:174_6: Vuḍḍhiattho vā, “asekkhā dhammā”ti yathā sikkhitasikkhā niṭṭhitasikkhāti vuttaṃ hoti.
anya-e1102n0:174_7: Evaṃ asīmāsīmakiccaniṭṭhappattāti attho. Ñattidutiyakamma vācaṃ sāvetvā sammatāpi
anya-e1102n0:174_8: asammatāyeva, attano sabhāveneva gāmasīmā viya baddhasīmāsadisāti vuttaṃ hoti. Etena
anya-e1102n0:174_9: nadījātassarasamuddānaṃ baddhasīmāya akhettabhāvo dassito hoti. Evaṃ “sabbā bhikkhave
anya-e1102n0:174_10: nadī asīmā”tiādinā nadīsamuddajātassarānaṃ baddhasīmābhāvaṃ paṭikkhipitvā tattha
anya-e1102n0:174_11: lokavohārasiddhāsu etāsu nadīādīsu abaddhasīmāsu puna vaggakammaparihāratthaṃ vālikādīhi
anya-e1102n0:174_12: sīmaparicchindanaṃ kattukāmo bhagavā “nadiyā vā bhikkhave samudde vā jātassare vā
anya-e1102n0:174_13: yaṃ majjhimassa purisassa samantā udakukkhepā”ti ādimāha. Tattha majjhimassa purisassati
anya-e1102n0:174_16: na panevaṃ vuttaṃ, tena ñāyati “thāmamajjhimassa purisassā”ti. Tividhā hi purisā
anya-e1102n0:174_17: uttamapuriso majjhimapuriso pakatipurisoti. Tattha uttamapuriso nāma sabbaññu bhagavā,
anya-e1102n0:174_18: so hi bhagavā sabbasattuttamo thāmayasasampattiissariyādīhi tathā hi tathāgatassa thāmo.
anya-e1102n0:177_0: Vuttānaṃ dasannaṃ hatthikulānaṃ balānusārena veditabbo. Tattha kāḷāvaka nti pakatihatthikulaṃ
anya-e1102n0:177_1: yaṃ dasannaṃ purisānaṃ kāyabalaṃ, taṃ ekassa kāḷāvakassa hatthino balaṃ. Yaṃ dasannaṃ
anya-e1102n0:177_2: kāḷāvakānaṃ balaṃ, taṃ ekassa gaṅgeyyassa balaṃ. Yaṃ dasannaṃ gaṅgeyyānaṃ balaṃ,
anya-e1102n0:177_3: taṃ ekassa paṇḍarassa balaṃ, yaṃ dasannaṃ paṇḍarānaṃ balaṃ, taṃ ekassa tambassa balaṃ.
anya-e1102n0:177_4: Yaṃ dasannaṃ tambānaṃ balaṃ, taṃ ekassa piṅgalassa balaṃ. Yaṃ dasannaṃ piṅgalānaṃ
anya-e1102n0:177_5: balaṃ, taṃ ekassa gandhahatthino balaṃ. Yaṃ dasannaṃ gandhahatthīnaṃ balaṃ, taṃ ekassa
anya-e1102n0:177_6: maṅgalassa balaṃ. Yaṃ dasannaṃ maṅgalānaṃ balaṃ, taṃ ekassa hemassa balaṃ. Yaṃ dasannaṃ
anya-e1102n0:177_7: hemavatānaṃ balaṃ, taṃ ekassa uposathassa balaṃ. Yaṃ dasannaṃ uposathānaṃ balaṃ,
anya-e1102n0:177_8: taṃ ekassa chaddantassa balaṃ. Yaṃ dasannaṃ chaddantānaṃ balaṃ, taṃ ekassa tathāgatassa
anya-e1102n0:177_9: kāyabalaṃ. “Nārāyanasaṅkhātaṃ bala”ntipi idameva vuccati. Tattha nārā vuccanti rasmiyo,
anya-e1102n0:177_10: tā bahū nānāvidhā tato uppajjantīti nārayanaṃ, vajiraṃ, tasmā vajirasaṅkhātaṃ balanti
anya-e1102n0:177_11: pi attho, tadetaṃ pakatihatthigaṇanāya hatthikoṭisahassaṃ, purisagaṇanāya dasannaṃ
anya-e1102n0:177_12: purisakoṭisahassānaṃ balaṃ hoti, idaṃ tathāgatassa kāyabalaṃ. Issariyādibalavidhānaṃ
anya-e1102n0:177_13: pana taṃtaṃ suttānusārena veditabbaṃ. Majjhimapuriso nāma vaḍḍhakipuriso so hi tathāgatassa
anya-e1102n0:177_14: balaṃ paṭicca sinerupabbatarājaṃ sāsapabījena minanto viya satenapisahassenapi satasahassenapi
anya-e1102n0:177_15: minetuṃ abhabbo, antamaso pādaṅguṭṭha so pādaṅguṭṭhakampi gaṇhetuṃ abhabbova. Tassa
anya-e1102n0:177_16: pakatipurisato mahantabhāvena majjhe bhavattā majjhimapuriso nāma jāto, tathā hi
anya-e1102n0:177_17: sugatavidatthi vaḍḍhakissa tisso vidatthiyo, vaḍḍhakihatthena diyaḍḍhahattho hoti,
anya-e1102n0:177_18: tathā vaḍḍhakividatthi pakatipurisassa dve vidatthiyo, pakatipurisahatthena paripuṇṇahattho
anya-e1102n0:177_19: hoti tathā hi sugatavidatthi nāma idāni majjhimassa purisassa tisso vidatthiyo, vaḍḍhakihatthena
anya-e1102n0:177_20: diyaḍḍho hattho hotīti kuṭikārasikkhāpadaṭṭhakathāyaṃ vuttaṃ. Ayaṃ idha majjhimapurisoti
anya-e1102n0:177_21: nādhippetā. Kasmā kuṭikārasikkhāpadeyeva tihatthāti vaḍḍhakihatthena tihatthā. Pamāṇayutto
anya-e1102n0:177_22: mañcoti pakatividatthiyā navavidatthippamāṇo mañcoti vuccati yathā, evaṃ majjhimapurisenā’ti
anya-e1102n0:177_23: idha avatvā’thāmamajjhimena purisenā’ti aṭṭhakathāyaṃ vuttattā. Pakatipuriso nāma’yaṃ
anya-e1102n0:177_24: dasannaṃ purisānaṃ kāyabalaṃ, taṃ ekassa kāḷāvakassa hatthino bala’nti vuttapuriso
anya-e1102n0:177_25: pakatipuriso nāma. Tattha kiñcāpi ekacce puññavantā rājā ajātasattu jīvako komārabhacco
anya-e1102n0:177_26: itthiyāpi visākhā migāramātāti evamādayo pañcannaṃ hatthīnaṃ balaṃ dhārenti, na pana
anya-e1102n0:177_27: te majjhimapurisā nāma honti, pakatipuriso yeva, puññavantabhāvena visesapurisattā.
anya-e1102n0:177_28: Idha pana pakatipurisoyeva thāma majjhimapurisoti adhippeto. Udakukkhepāti udakukkhepena
anya-e1102n0:177_29: paricchinnā, tenevāha mātikāṭṭhakathāyaṃ līnatthappakāsaniyaṃ udakukkhepāti karaṇatthe
anya-e1102n0:177_30: nissakkavacananti āha. Udakukkhepenā’ti ayañhetthattho. Nadīsamuddajātassaresu yaṃṭhānaṃ
anya-e1102n0:177_31: majjimassa purisassa samantā parisapariyantato udakukkhepena paricchinnaṃ, ayaṃ tattha
anya-e1102n0:177_32: nadīādīsu lokavohāra siddhāsu tāsueva abaddhasīmāsu aparāpi samānasaṃvāsā ekūposathāti
anya-e1102n0:177_33: kaṅkhāvitaraṇiyaṃ pana yaṃ majjhimassa purisassa samantā udakukkhepāti yaṃ ṭhānaṃ
anya-e1102n0:177_34: thāmamajjhimassa purisassa samantato udakukkhepena paricchinnaṃ. Tattha yathā akkhadhuttā
anya-e1102n0:177_35: dāruguḷaṃ khipanti, evaṃ udakaṃ vā vālikaṃ vā hatthena gahetvā majjhimena purisena
anya-e1102n0:177_36: sabbathāmena khipitabbaṃ. Yattha evaṃ khittaṃ udakaṃ vā vālikā patati, ayaṃ udakukkhepo
anya-e1102n0:177_37: nāma. Ayaṃ tattha samāna saṃvāsā ekūposathāti, ayaṃ tesu nadīādīsu udakukkhepaparicchinnā
anya-e1102n0:177_38: sīmā samānasaṃvāsāceva ekūposathācā’ti atthayojanaṃ katvā ayaṃ etesaṃ nadīādīnaṃ
anya-e1102n0:177_39: antoyeva labbhati, na bahi, tasmā nadiyā vā jātassare vā yattakaṃ padesaṃ pakativassakāle
anya-e1102n0:177_40: catūsu māsesu udakaṃ ottharati, samudde yasmiṃ padese pakativīciyo osaritvā saṇṭhahanti,
anya-e1102n0:177_41: tatopaṭṭhāya kappiyabhūmi. Dubbuṭṭhikāle vā gimhe vā nadījātassaresu sukkhesupi sāeva
anya-e1102n0:177_42: kappiyabhūmi. Sace pana sukkhe jātassare vāpiṃ vā khaṇanti vappaṃ vā karonti, taṃ
anya-e1102n0:177_43: ṭhānaṃ gāmakhettaṃ hoti. Yā panesā kappiyabhūmīti vuttā, tato bahi udakukkhepasīmā
anya-e1102n0:177_44: na gacchati, antoyeva gacchati, tasmā tesaṃ antoparisapariyantato paṭṭhāya samantāudakukkhepa
anya-e1102n0:177_45: paricchedo kātabbo”ti vuttaṃ. Gaṇṭhipade pana yaṃ majjhimassa purisassa samantā udakukkhepāti
anya-e1102n0:177_46: pana etissā nadiyā catuvaggādīnaṃ saṅghānaṃ visuṃ catuvaggakaraṇīyādikammakaraṇakāle
anya-e1102n0:177_48: paricchedadassanaṃ viyāti ācariyā, tasmā udakukkhepaparicchedābhāvepi antonadiyaṃ
anya-e1102n0:177_49: kātuṃ vaṭṭatīti siddha’nti likhitaṃ. Tattha udakukkhepaparicchedābhāvepī’ti idaṃ
anya-e1102n0:177_50: padaṃ samantato udakukkhepena paricchinna’nti mahāaṭṭhakathāvacanena vā samantā udakukkhepaparicchedo
anya-e1102n0:177_51: kātabbo’ti mātikāṭṭhakathāya kaṅkhā vitaraṇiyañca vuttavacanena vā, “tatthāpi hi
anya-e1102n0:177_52: majjhimapuriso na ñāyati, tathā sabbathāmena khipana”nti vā, “etadatthameva hi vālikādīhi
anya-e1102n0:177_53: sīmaparicchindana”nti vā vimativinodanīvacanehi vā na sameti. Ganthakārenāpi parūpavādavivajjanatthaṃ
anya-e1102n0:177_54: “ayaṃ amhākaṃ khantī”ti avatvā’acariyā’ti aññakattāre nidassitvā parato nigamane
anya-e1102n0:177_55: “idaṃ sabbaṃ suṭṭhu vicāretvā garukule payirupāsitvā gahetabbaṃ yuttaṃ gahetabbaṃ,
anya-e1102n0:177_56: itaraṃ chaḍḍetabba”nti vuttaṃ tasmā aññesaṃ ācariyānaṃ matena likhitanti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
anya-e1102n0:177_57: Aññathā tissopi saṅgītiyo ārūḷhe aṭṭhakathāvacane ca kaṅkhāvitaraṇī-vimativinodanīvacanāni
anya-e1102n0:177_58: ca makkhetabbāni bhaveyyuṃ, ganthāpi aññamaññaviruddhā bhaveyyuṃ, bhagavatā paññattasikkhāpadampi
anya-e1102n0:177_59: sāvakānaṃ matena paṭisaṅkharitabbaṃ bhaveyya bhagavatā paññattasikkhāpadaṃ pana na
anya-e1102n0:177_60: makkhetabbaṃ, yathā paññatteyeva vattitabbaṃ vakkhati hi vatthuṃ jānitvāpi majjaṃ
anya-e1102n0:177_61: pivato bhikkhussa pācittiyaṃ, sāmaṇerassa pana jānitvā pivato sīlabhedo, na ajānitvāti
anya-e1102n0:177_62: vuttaṃ tattha kāraṇaṃ maggitabbaṃ, sikkhāpada paññattiyā buddhānameva visayattā na
anya-e1102n0:177_63: vā maggitabbaṃ, yathā paññatteyeva vattitabba’nti tasmā samantā udakukkhepāti paññattasikkhāpadānurūpaṃ
anya-e1102n0:177_64: samantato udakukkhepena paricchinnanti vā udakaṃ ukkhipitabbanti vā udakukkhepena
anya-e1102n0:177_65: pi paricchinnā sīmātivā samantā udakukkhepaparicchedo kātabboti vā vuttadhammasaṅgāhakattherānaṃ
anya-e1102n0:177_66: vacanameva pamāṇaṃ te hi buddhamataññuno, idañca vacanaṃ bhagavato na paccakkhavacanaṃ
anya-e1102n0:177_67: nāpisaṅgāhakattherānaṃ vacanaṃ athavā “yaṃ majjhimassa purisassa samantā udakukkhepā”ti
anya-e1102n0:177_68: pana etissā nadiyā…pe… sattabbhantarasīmāya paricchedadassanaṃ viya sīmaparicchedadassanatthaṃ
anya-e1102n0:177_69: vutta’nti ācariyā yasmā vadanti, tasmā udakukkhepaparicchedābhāvepi antonadiyaṃ kātuṃ
anya-e1102n0:177_70: vaṭṭatīti siddhanti imissā atthayojanāya na dhammasaṅgāhakattherāpi paviṭṭhā, ganthakāropi
anya-e1102n0:177_71: apaviṭṭho. Kasmāti ce tissopi saṅgītiyo ārūḷhesu vinayaṭṭhakathāsuceva tabbivaraṇabhūtāsu
anya-e1102n0:177_72: silokaṭīkāsu ca “udakukkhepena paricchinnaṃ, udakaṃ ukkhipitabbaṃ, udakukkhepaparicchedo
anya-e1102n0:177_73: kātabbo”ti ādinā bahūhi ākārehi udakukkhepaparicchedameva likhanti, tasmā dhammasaṅgāhakattherāpi
anya-e1102n0:177_74: appaviṭṭhāti viññāyati ganthakāro pi parūpavādavivajjanatthaṃ “ācariyā”ti aññakattāre
anya-e1102n0:177_75: nidasseti, tasmā gantthakāropi appaviṭṭhoti viññāyati, idañca vacanaṃ kesañci therānaṃ
anya-e1102n0:177_76: attanomati, attanomatica nāmesā sabbadubbalā, sinerupabbatarājaṃ sāsapabījena minento
anya-e1102n0:177_77: viya sabbaññubuddhena paññattassa udakukkhepāti sikkhāpadassa atthaṃ vadantānaṃ mahākassapayasamoggaliputtatissapabhutīnañca
anya-e1102n0:177_78: tesaṃ sissānusissānaṃ mahāvihāravāsīnañca vacanaṃ ko nāma puggalo makkhetuṃ sakkhissati,
anya-e1102n0:177_79: upasampadādikammassa ca garukammattā sāsanassa mūlattā ca garukeyeva ṭhātabbaṃ. “Yaṃ
anya-e1102n0:177_80: majjhimassa purisassa samantā udakukkhepā”ti bhagavatā paññattaṃ, kathaṃ majjhimassa
anya-e1102n0:177_81: purisassa udakukkhepārahaṭṭhānameva udakukkhepasīmā, udāhu udakukkhepeneva udakukkhepasīmāti
anya-e1102n0:177_82: codanaṃ pariharanto aṭṭhakathācariyo kathaṃ pana udakaṃ ukkhipitabbantyādimāha. Tattha
anya-e1102n0:177_83: kathanti kathetukamyatā pucchā, kathaṃ kena kāraṇena udakaṃ ukkhipitabbaṃ udakāsiñcanasaṅkhepena
anya-e1102n0:177_84: ukkhipitabbaṃ atha kho leḍḍukhipanadāruguḷakhipanākārena ukkhipitabbanti attho. Akkhadhuttāti
anya-e1102n0:177_85: sāmaññena vuttepi “sīho gāyati naṅguṭṭhaṃ, sīho cāleti vāladhi”nti ettha viya dāruguḷaṃ
anya-e1102n0:177_86: khipanti saddantarasannidhānato atthavasena dāruguḷakīḷakā dhuttajanāti viññāyati
anya-e1102n0:177_87: akkhasaddo hi jūtepi nirūḷho. Dāruguḷanti bhamaṃ āropetvā āraggena katadāruvikati
anya-e1102n0:177_88: ayañhetthattho… yathā akkhadhuttā dāruguḷakā dhuttajanā dāruguḷaṃ hatthena gahetvā
anya-e1102n0:177_89: attano balaṃ dassentā viya sabbathāmena attānaṃ onamitvā khipanti, evameva thāmamajjhimena
anya-e1102n0:177_90: purisena udakaṃ vā vālikaṃ vā hatthena gahetvā attano balaṃ dassentāviya onamitvā
anya-e1102n0:177_91: sabbathāmena nisinnassa vā ṭhitassa vā parisapariyantato anupariyāyitvā khipitabbaṃ,
anya-e1102n0:177_92: evaṃ cittaṃ udakaṃ vā vālikaṃ vā yattha yasmiṃ ṭhāne patati, ayameko udakukkhepo
anya-e1102n0:177_93: nāmāti “ayameko udakukkhepo”ti iminā padena dvinnaṃ saṅghānaṃ visuṃvisuṃ kammakaraṇādhikāre
anya-e1102n0:177_94: sīmantarikattā aññassāpi udakukkhepassa sambhavaṃ dasseti, teneva mātikāṭṭhakathāyaṃ
anya-e1102n0:177_95: “sace pana dve saṅghā visuṃvisuṃ uposathādikammaṃ karonti, dvinnaṃ udakukkhepānaṃ
anya-e1102n0:177_96: antare añño eko udakukkhepo upacāratthāya ṭhapetabbo”ti vuttaṃ, vimativinodaniyampi
anya-e1102n0:177_97: “tassa antoti tassa udakukkhepaparicchinnassa ṭhānassa anto na kevalañca tasseva
anya-e1102n0:177_98: anto, tato bahipi ekassa udakukkhepassa anto ṭhātuṃ na vaṭṭatīti vacanaṃ udakukkhepaparicchedassa
anya-e1102n0:177_99: dubbijānato kammakopasaṅkā hotī”ti vuttaṃ, sāratthadīpaniyaṃ pana “tassa anto hatthapāsaṃ
anya-e1102n0:177_100: vijahitvā ṭhito kammaṃ kopetīti iminā paricchedato bahi yattha katthaci ṭhito kammaṃ
anya-e1102n0:177_101: na kopetīti dīpetī”ti vatvā mātikāṭṭhakathāvacanampi paṭikkhipi, taṃ ekasaṅghaṃ sannipātaṃ
anya-e1102n0:177_102: sandhāya vuttanti daṭṭhabbaṃ, yathā ca mahāsīmāya khaṇḍitvā baddhānaṃ khaṇḍasīmānaṃ
anya-e1102n0:177_103: aññamaññasaṅkaravivajjanatthaṃ sīmantarikā ṭhapitā, evameva attano sabhāvena gāmasīmā
anya-e1102n0:177_104: viya sayaṃ jātasīmāyaṃ nadīsamuddajātassarānaṃ atimahantabhāvena udakukkhepena udakukkhepasīmā
anya-e1102n0:177_105: bhagavatā anuññātā, tathāpi dvinnaṃ baddhasīmānamiva aññamaññasaṅkaravivajjanatthaṃ
anya-e1102n0:177_106: dvinnaṃ udakukkhepasīmānaṃ antare sīmantarikatthāya añño udakukkhepo ṭhapetabbo’ti
anya-e1102n0:177_107: vuttaṃ, sanimittā baddhasīmā, saudakukkhepā udakukkhepasīmā, sīmantarikā viya eko
anya-e1102n0:177_108: udakukkhepo daṭṭhabbo, teneva vimativinodaniyaṃ “idañcettha sīmantarikāvidhānaṃ dvinnaṃ
anya-e1102n0:177_109: baddhasīmānaṃ sīmantarikāanujānanasuttānulomato siddhanti daṭṭhabba”nti vuttaṃ, ekasmiṃ
anya-e1102n0:177_110: saṅghasannipāte pana ekassa udakukkhepassa bahi tiṭṭhantopi kammaṃ na kopetīti daṭṭhabbaṃ
anya-e1102n0:177_111: vuttañhi vimativinodaniyaṃ bhagavatā nidānavasena ekagāmasīmanissitānaṃ ekasabhāgānañca
anya-e1102n0:177_112: dvinnaṃ baddhasīmānameva aññamaññaṃ sambhedajjhottharaṇaṃ sīmantarikaṃ vinā abyavadhāne
anya-e1102n0:177_113: ṭhānañca bhagavatā anumatamevāti ñatvā aṭṭhakathācariyā idhāpi sīmantarikāvidhānamakaṃsu
anya-e1102n0:177_114: visabhāgasīmānampi hi ekasīmanissitattaṃ ekasabhāvattañcāti dvīhaṅgehi samannāgate
anya-e1102n0:177_115: sati eva sīmantarikaṃ vinā ṭhānaṃ sambhedāya hoti, nāsatīti daṭṭhabba’nti. Evaṃ nadīsamuddajātassaresu
anya-e1102n0:177_117: rassapabhave nadījātassarapadese udakukkhepena vināva attano sabhāvena gāmasīmāyamiva
anya-e1102n0:177_118: sabbathā kappiyabhāvaṃ dassetuṃ sace pana nātidīghā hoti, pabhavato paṭṭhāya tyādimāha.
anya-e1102n0:177_119: Tattha pabhavato paṭṭhāyāti yasmiṃ padese catumāsaparamā nadī sandati, tassa uparimabhāgato
anya-e1102n0:177_120: paṭṭhāyāti attho. Yāva mukhadvārā ti yāva nadītīramevettha mukhadvārāti adhippetā.
anya-e1102n0:177_121: Sabbatthā’ti sabbasmiṃ nadīpadese udakukkhepasīmākammaṃ natthī ti udakukkhepena pavattā
anya-e1102n0:177_122: sīmā udakukkhepasīmā. Karitabbanti kammaṃ, karakaraṇeti dhātu, rammapaccayo. Karaṇeti
anya-e1102n0:177_124: tena kāyapayogena khipitabbaṃ uddhaṭaṃ kammanti vuccati paramatthavasena pana kāyapayogasaṅkhātāya
anya-e1102n0:177_126: Udakukkhepasīmāya kammaṃ udakukkhepasīmākammaṃ taṃ ettha rassapabhavanadiyā natthīti
anya-e1102n0:177_127: attho. Ayañhetthattho sace nadī nātidīghā hoti aḍḍhayojanaṃ vā gāvutaṃ vā aḍḍhagāvutaṃ
anya-e1102n0:177_128: vā, tassā pavattanaṭṭhānato paṭṭhāya yāva nadītīrā sabbattha nadīpadese ajjhottharitvā
anya-e1102n0:177_129: saṅgho nisīdati, tattha tasmiṃ nadīpadese samantato avasesanadiyā abhāvā vaggakammasaṅkābhāvena
anya-e1102n0:177_130: udakukkhepasīmā kammaṃ natthi, kevalā nadī sīmāyevāti sāratthadīpaniyampi mātikāṭṭhakathāyalīnatthappakāsaniyampi
anya-e1102n0:177_131: etadeva sanniṭṭhānaṃ vuttaṃ vimativinodaniyaṃ pana yattha khuddake araññe mahantehi
anya-e1102n0:177_132: vā bhikkhūhi paripuṇṇatāya vaggakammasaṅkābhāvena sattabbhantarasīmāpekkhā natthi,
anya-e1102n0:177_133: tattha satthabbhantarasīmā na uppajjati, kevalāraññasīmāyeva tattha saṅghena kammaṃ
anya-e1102n0:177_134: kātabbaṃ nadīādīsupi eseva nayo vakkhati hi sace nadī nātidīghā hoti, pabhavato paṭṭhāya
anya-e1102n0:177_135: yāvamukhadvārā sabbattha saṅgho nisīdati, udakukkhepasīmākammaṃ natthī’ti ādi ca
anya-e1102n0:177_136: ubhayatthāpi ca. Yassaṃ disāyaṃ sattabbhantarassa vā udakukkhepassa vā okāso nappahoti,
anya-e1102n0:177_137: tattha kathaṃ minanaṃ khipanaṃ vā bhaveyya, gāmakhettādīsu pavisanato akhette sīmā
anya-e1102n0:177_138: paviṭṭhā nāmātisīmā vipajjeyya, apekkhāya sīmuppattiyaṃ pana yato pahoti, tattha
anya-e1102n0:177_139: sattabbhantaraudakukkhepasīmā sayameva paripuṇṇā jāyanti. Yato pana nappahoti, tattha
anya-e1102n0:177_140: attano khettappamāṇeneva jāyanti, na bahīti vuttaṃ, ettha ca’sīmāpekkhāya sattabbhantaraudakukkhepasīmā
anya-e1102n0:177_141: sayameva paripuṇṇā jāyantī’ti vuttattā udakukkhepaṃ vināyeva apekkhāya sīmāya udakukkhepasīmā
anya-e1102n0:177_142: uppajjatī’ti atthaṃ vadanti, taṃ ayuttarūpaṃ viya dissati. Kasmāti ce pāḷinayavirodhato
anya-e1102n0:177_143: vimativinodaniyaṃ parato vuttavacanenāpi virodhato ca. Idañca vacanaṃ ācariyassa
anya-e1102n0:177_144: kesañci puggalānaṃ vādappakāsanatthaṃ vuttaṃ bhaveyya. Kasmā parato vuttavacanena
anya-e1102n0:177_145: aghaṭiyattā ca pāḷiyaṭṭhakathāṭīkāvacanehipi virujjhanato ca, taṃ parato vaṇṇayissāma.
anya-e1102n0:177_146: Yathā ca loke vatiṃ aparikkhipitvā “idaṃ vatiyā ṭhāna”nti ca yathā ca naṅgalakoṭiyā
anya-e1102n0:177_147: akasitvā “idaṃ kasikaṭṭhāna”nti ca yathā ca vatthuṃ karontā manussā kudhārīpharasuādinā
anya-e1102n0:177_148: rukkhe acchinditvā “idaṃ mama kudhāripatanaṭṭhāna”nti ca yathā ca dāttena alāyitvā
anya-e1102n0:177_149: “idaṃ mama lāyitaṭṭhāna”nti ca na sakkā vattuṃ, evameva udakaṃ vā vālikaṃ vā hatthena
anya-e1102n0:177_150: akhipitvā “ayameko udakukkhepoti ca, udakapatanaṭṭhānanti ca na sakkā vattuṃ. Ettha
anya-e1102n0:177_151: ca dve bhikkhū evaṃ vivādaṃ karonti vimativinodaniyaṃ “yattha khuddake araññe mahantehi
anya-e1102n0:177_152: bhikkhūhi paripuṇṇatāya vaggakammasaṅkābhāvena sattabbhantarasīmāpekkhā natthi, tattha
anya-e1102n0:177_153: sattabbhantarasīmā na uppajjati, kevalāraññasīmāyeva tattha saṅghena kammaṃ kattabbaṃ
anya-e1102n0:177_154: nadī ādīsupi eseva nayo. Vakkhati hi sace nadī nātidīghā hoti. Pabhavato paṭṭhāya
anya-e1102n0:177_155: yāva mukhadvārā sabbattha saṅgho nisīdati, udakukkhepasīmākammaṃ natthī’tiādiṃ, iminā
anya-e1102n0:177_156: eva vacanena vaggakammaparihāratthaṃ sīmāpekkhāya sati eva udakukkhepasīmā sattabbhantarasīmā
anya-e1102n0:177_157: uppajjanti, nāsatīti daṭṭhabba’nti vuttattā udakukkhepaṃ vināva parisapariyantato
anya-e1102n0:177_158: paṭṭhāya sīmāpekkhāya saheva udakukkhepasīmā uppajjati tasmā udakukkhepena payojanaṃ
anya-e1102n0:177_159: natthevāti te evaṃ vattabbā “mā sappurisā evaṃ vadeyyātha ācariyavarañca mā abbhācikkhatha
anya-e1102n0:177_160: idañca vacanaṃ ācariyavarassa neyyavacanaṃ, paratopi ācariyavaro sanniṭṭhānaṃ vakkhati
anya-e1102n0:177_161: vinayaṭṭhakathāsuceva sāratthadīpaniyañca vuttavacanehipi tava vacanaṃ asaṃsandeva,
anya-e1102n0:177_162: vimativinodaniyameva parato vuttavacanenāpi na ghaṭiyati. Kathaṃ neyyavacanaṃ hotīti.
anya-e1102n0:177_163: “Sīmāpekkhāya sati eva…pe… nassatī”ti ettha sīmāpekkhāya vinā maggagamananhānādi
anya-e1102n0:177_164: atthehi bhikkhūhi araññe vā nadīādīsupivā paviṭṭhakkhaṇeyeva nuppajjati, sīmāpekkhāya
anya-e1102n0:177_165: satieva araññe samantā sattabbhantarā’ti paññattasikkhāpadānurūpaṃ abbhantarasīmā
anya-e1102n0:177_166: uppajjati’ nadīsamuddajātassaresupi majjhimassa purisassa samantā udakukkhe’pāti
anya-e1102n0:177_167: paññatta sikkhāpadānurūpaṃ udakukkhepena saha udakukkhepasīmā uppajjati, na udakukkhepena
anya-e1102n0:177_168: vināti ayaṃ neyyattho. Nāsatītiettha udakukkhepena vināti atthopi na labbhate. Evañca
anya-e1102n0:177_169: sati vimativinodaniyaṃ yeva puna tatthāti lokavohārasiddhāsu etāsu nadīādīsu tīsu
anya-e1102n0:177_171: dassentoti adhippāyo. Pāḷiyaṃ “yaṃ majjhimassa purisassā”ti ādīsu udakaṃ ukkhipitvā
anya-e1102n0:177_172: khipiyati etthāti udakukkhepo, udakassa pathanokāso, tasmā udakukkhepā. Ayañhettha
anya-e1102n0:177_173: padasambandhavasena attho… “parisa pariyantato paṭṭhāya samantā yāva majjhimassa
anya-e1102n0:177_174: purisassa udakukkhepo udakapatanaṭṭhānaṃ, tāva yaṃ taṃ paricchinnaṃ ṭṭhānaṃ, ayaṃ
anya-e1102n0:177_175: tattha nadīādīsu aparā samānasaṃvāsā udakukkhepasīmā”ti vuttaatthapadehipi samānaṃ
anya-e1102n0:177_176: bhaveyya ācariyameva hi kecipana samantā abbhantaraṃ minitvā paricchedakaraṇeneva
anya-e1102n0:177_177: sīmā sañjāyati, na sayamevāti vadanti, taṃ na gahetabbhantyādinā kecivādaṃ paṭikkhipitvā
anya-e1102n0:177_178: minanakhipane dosaṃ dassetvā ca yaṃ panettha abbhantaraminanappamāṇassa vālikādikhipanakammassa
anya-e1102n0:177_179: ca dassanaṃ, taṃ sayaṃjātasīmānaṃ ṭhitaṭṭhānaparicchedadassanatthaṃ kataṃ, gāmūpacāragharūpacārajānanatthaṃ
anya-e1102n0:177_180: leḍḍusuppādikhipanavijānanadassanaṃ viya, teneva mātikāṭṭhakathāyaṃ sīmaṃ vā bandhanti
anya-e1102n0:177_181: udakukkhepaṃ vā pariccheda’nti vuttaṃ, evaṃ katepi tassa paricchedassa pabhavato
anya-e1102n0:177_182: ñātuṃ asakkuṇeyyattena thūlato ñatvā antotiṭṭhantehi nirāsaṅkaṭṭhāne ṭhātabbaṃ aññaṃ
anya-e1102n0:177_183: bahikarontehi atidūre nirāsaṅkaṭṭhāne pesetabbanti vā, tasmā yathā vuttasīmāpekkhavaseneva
anya-e1102n0:177_184: tāsaṃ sattabbhantaraudakukkhepasīmānaṃ uppatti, tabbigamena vināso ca gahetabboti
anya-e1102n0:177_185: amhākaṃ khanti, vīmaṃsitvā gahetabbaṃ, añño vā pakāro ito yuttataro gavesitabbo’ti
anya-e1102n0:177_186: āha. Vīmaṃsitvā gahetabbaṃ. Añño vā pakāro ito yuttataro gavesitabbo’ti iminā ācariyassa
anya-e1102n0:177_187: vacanena imassa vacanassa attanomatibhāvañca ācariyassa apaṭisambhidāpattabhāvañca
anya-e1102n0:177_188: dasseti. Idañca vacanaṃ na bhagavato paccakkhavacanaṃ, nāpidhammasaṅgāhakattherānaṃ
anya-e1102n0:177_189: vacanaṃ, tissopi saṅgītiyo anārūḷhā, nāpi aṭṭhakathāya saṃvaṇṇanācariyassa vādappakāsanameva
anya-e1102n0:177_190: tasmā asallakkhitabbameva sāratthadīpaniyampi sace nadī nātidīghā hotīti imissā saṃvaṇṇanādhikāre
anya-e1102n0:177_191: udakukkhepasīmā kammaṃ natthīti yasmā sabbopi nadīpadeso bhikkhūhi ajjhotthaṭo, tasmā
anya-e1102n0:177_192: samantato nadiyā abhāvā udakukkhepena payojanaṃ natthī’ti vuttaṃ tathā hi samantato
anya-e1102n0:177_193: nadiyā abhāvā udakukkhepena payojanaṃ natthī’tiimassa anvayavasena vā atthāpattivasena
anya-e1102n0:177_194: vā samantato nadiyā bhāve sati udakukkhepena payojanaṃ attheva vaggakammaparihāratthanti
anya-e1102n0:177_196: kātabboti pahonakaṭṭhānaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ yattha pana kunnadiyaṃ nappahoti. Tattha
anya-e1102n0:177_198: iminā vacanena sīmāpekkhāya saha udakukkhepaṃ vinā attano sabhāveneva nuppajjatīti
anya-e1102n0:177_199: viññāyati, tathā hi udakukkhepaparicchedake kattāre asati kathaṃ udakukkhepaparicchedo
anya-e1102n0:177_200: kātabbo bhaveyya tasmā “vaggakammaparihāratthaṃ sīmāpekkhāya sati eva udakukkhepasattabbhantarasīmā
anya-e1102n0:177_201: uppajjanti, nāsatī’ti idaṃ vacanaṃ sāratthadīpaniyañca mātikāṭṭhakathāyañca vuttavacanehi
anya-e1102n0:177_202: aññamaññaviruddhaṃ viya dissati vimativinodaniyaṃyeva ca “mahoghena pana unnataṭṭhānato
anya-e1102n0:177_203: ninnaṭṭhāne patantena khato khuddako vā mahanto vā lakkhaṇayutto jātassarova etthāpi
anya-e1102n0:177_204: khuddake udakukkhepakiccaṃ natthi samudde pana sabbathā udakukkhepasīmāyameva kammaṃ
anya-e1102n0:177_205: kātabbaṃ, sodhetuṃ dukkarattā”ti vuttaṃ tathā hi ayamācariyavaro pubbe “vaggakammaparihāratthaṃ
anya-e1102n0:177_206: sīmāpekkhāya sati eva udakukkhepasattabbhantarasīmā uppajjanti, nāsatī”ti vatvā parato
anya-e1102n0:177_208: tatthāyaṃ viggaho udakaṃ ukkhipitvā khipīyati etthāti udakukkhepo udakassa patanokāso
anya-e1102n0:177_209: kintuṃ, ṭhānaṃ karitabbaṃ kiccaṃ kara karaṇeti dhātu riccapaccayo yaṃ. “Ajjeva kiccaṃ
anya-e1102n0:177_210: ātappa”nti yathā, udakukkhepassa kiccaṃ karaṇaṃ udakukkhepakiccaṃ. Samudde panā ti
anya-e1102n0:177_211: ettha pana saddo visesattho, pakkhantaratthotipi apare visesatthe pana nadījātassaresu
anya-e1102n0:177_212: mahantesu udakukkhepasīmāyameva kātabbaṃ, khuddake pana kevale nadījātassarepi kātabbaṃ
anya-e1102n0:177_213: samudde pana visesato udakukkhepasīmāyameva kātabbanti ayaṃ pana saddassa visesattho.
anya-e1102n0:177_214: Sabbathā ti sabbena sabbaṃ. Udakukkhepasīmāyamevā ti ettha evakāro sanniṭṭhānattho,
anya-e1102n0:177_215: udakukkhepasīmāyameva kammaṃ kātabbaṃ, na samuddasīmāya kadācīti attho yujjateva.
anya-e1102n0:177_216: Nadījātassaresu pana mahantesu udakukkhepasīmāya kātabbaṃ, khuddake nadījātassareyeva
anya-e1102n0:177_217: na kātabbanti ayaṃ attho sāmatthiyato labbhateva nadījātassaresu khuddakamahantabhāvena
anya-e1102n0:177_218: nadījātassaraudakukkhepāti dve dve sīmā labbhanti samudde pana kasmā samuddaudakukkhepavasena
anya-e1102n0:177_219: dve na labbhantīti samudde pana kasmā samuddaudakukkhepavasena dve na labbhantīti
anya-e1102n0:177_220: codanaṃ manasisandhāyāha “sodhetuṃ dukkarattā”ti. Tattha sodhetuṃ dukkarattā ti samuddassa
anya-e1102n0:177_221: atimahantabhāvena samuddamotiṇṇe bhikkhū hatthapāsanayanaṃ vā bahisamuddakaraṇaṃ
anya-e1102n0:177_222: vā kātuṃ atidukkaraṃ tasmā sabbathā sabbena sabbaṃ udakukkhepasīmāyameva kātabbanti
anya-e1102n0:177_223: ayamācariyavarassa adhippāyo. Yadi vaggakammaparihāratthaṃ sīmāpekkhāya sati eva
anya-e1102n0:177_224: udakukkhepasīmā uppajjeyya, evaṃ sati samuddamotiṇṇe bhikkhusamūheva hatthapāsato
anya-e1102n0:177_225: bahi kareyya, evañca sati sodhetuṃ dukkarattā’ti hetupadampi niratthakaṃ bhaveyya
anya-e1102n0:177_226: na panevaṃ sakkā vattuṃ, tena ñāyati “vaggakammaparihāratthaṃ udakukkhepapayojana”nti.
anya-e1102n0:177_227: Apica tesaṃ ācariyānaṃ adhippāyena “mayaṃ udakukkhepasīmāya na karoma, kevalaṃ samuddeyeva
anya-e1102n0:177_228: karomā”ti icchamāne sati kathaṃ karissanti. Tasmā tesaṃ matena sīmāpekkhāya saheva
anya-e1102n0:177_229: udakukkhepasīmāya sambhavato gatagataṭṭhāne udakukkhepasīmā bhaveyya evañca sati
anya-e1102n0:177_230: “samudde pana sabbathā udakukkhepasīmāyameva kammaṃ kātabbaṃ, sodhetuṃ dukkarattā”ti
anya-e1102n0:177_231: vacanampi niratthakaṃ bhaveyya evañca pana vadeyya… sabbaso samuddasīmāya alabbhamānataṃ
anya-e1102n0:177_232: sandhāya “samudde panā”tyādivacanaṃ ācariyavarena vuttanti tathāpi na vattabbaṃ kasmā
anya-e1102n0:177_233: evañca atthe icchamāne sati “samudde pana sabbattha udakukkhe pasīmāva labbhatī”ti
anya-e1102n0:177_234: vattabbaṃ siyā nanevaṃ vuttaṃ. Athavā pakaraṇādivasena saddatthe vibhajjīyamānepi
anya-e1102n0:177_235: virujjhateva kathaṃ saṃyogavasena “savacchaṃ dhenumānehī”ti vutte “gāvī”ti viññāyati,
anya-e1102n0:177_236: na vaḷavā. “Avacchaṃ dhenu”nti vutte gāvīti viññāyati, na vaḷavāti ettha viya kadācipi
anya-e1102n0:177_237: evasaddena nivattetabbassa samuddassa nadiyamiva nātidīghabhāve alabbhamāne sati
anya-e1102n0:177_238: “samudde pana sabbathā udakukkhepasīmāyameva kammaṃ kātabba”nti evakārena avattabbaṃ
anya-e1102n0:177_239: siyā, tathā hi saṃyogavippayogavasena “savacchaṃ dhenuṃ, avacchaṃ dhenu”nti vutte
anya-e1102n0:177_240: gāvīti viññāyati, na vaḷavā. Vaḷavā ca nāma yonimaggassa atisambādhattā vijāyituṃ
anya-e1102n0:177_241: na sakkonti, gabbhassa pariṇatakāle kucchiṃ phāletvā ājaññapotakaṃ gaṇhanti evaṃ
anya-e1102n0:177_242: ekagabbheneva maranti tasmā “vaḷavaṃ savaccha”ntivā avaccha”nti vā vattuṃ nārahati
anya-e1102n0:177_243: evameva kadācipi nātidīghasamuddassapi anupalabbhamānattā taṃ nivattāpakena evasaddena
anya-e1102n0:177_244: “samudde pana sabbathā udakukkhepasīmāyameva kammaṃ kātabba”nti apadisituṃ nārahatiyeva
anya-e1102n0:177_245: tasmā udakukkhepena sīmā uppajjatīti niṭṭhametthāva gantabbaṃ tena vuttaṃ “evañca
anya-e1102n0:177_246: atthe icchamāne sati samudde pana sabbathā udakukkhepasīmāva labbhatīti vattabbaṃ
anya-e1102n0:177_247: siyā na panevaṃ vutta”nti tena ñāyati vaggakammaparihāratthaṃ vālikādīhi khipananti
anya-e1102n0:177_248: apica vimativinodaniyaṃyeva “gacchantiyā pana nāvāya kātuṃ na vaṭṭati. Kasmā udakukkhepamattameva
anya-e1102n0:177_249: hi sīmā, taṃ nāvā sīghameva atikkameti evaṃ sati aññissā sīmāya ñatti, aññissā anusāvanā
anya-e1102n0:177_250: hotī”ti imassa saṃvaṇṇanādhikāre tanti sīmaṃ. Sīghameva atikkametīti iminā taṃ anatikkamitvā
anya-e1102n0:177_251: anto eva parivattamānāya kātuṃ vaṭṭatīti dasseti. Etadatthameva hi vālikādīhi sīmāparicchindanaṃ.
anya-e1102n0:177_252: Itarathā “bahiparivattā nukho no vā”ti kammakopasaṅkā bhaveyya. Aññissā anusāvanāti
anya-e1102n0:177_253: kevalāya nadīsīmāya anusāvanā’ti ācariyavarena vuttaṃ. Yadisī māpekkhāya saha attano
anya-e1102n0:177_254: sabhāvena udakukkhepasīmā uppajjeyya, evaṃ sati nāvāya gatagataṭṭhāne samantato sabhā
anya-e1102n0:177_255: viya parikhipitvā udakukkhepasīmā uppajjeyya, uppajjamānepi ca aññissā anusāvanāti
anya-e1102n0:177_256: ca aparāya udakukkhepasīmāya anusāvanāti vattabbaṃ bhaveyya na panevaṃ vuttaṃ athāpi
anya-e1102n0:177_257: vadeyya “paṭhamotiṇṇaṭṭhāneyeva sīmāpekkhā hoti, gatagataṭṭhāne natthī”ti, tampi
anya-e1102n0:177_258: vacanaṃ ayuttameva. Kasmā yāva kammaṃ na nipphannaṃ, tāva sīmāpekkhāya vinā asambhavato
anya-e1102n0:177_259: tena ñāyati “vaggakammaparihāratthaṃ udakukkhepaṃ vinā sīmāpekkhāya saheva attano
anya-e1102n0:177_260: sabhāvena udakukkhepasīmā nuppajjatī”ti niṭṭhametthāva gantabbaṃ tasmā nāvāya kammaṃ
anya-e1102n0:177_261: karontehi thirataraṃ katvā nāvaṃ agamanīyaṃ katvāva kātabbaṃ. Sāratthadīpaniyampi
anya-e1102n0:177_262: “gacchantiyā pana nāvāya kātuṃnavaṭṭatīti ettha udakukkhepaṃ anatikkamitvā parivattamānāya
anya-e1102n0:177_263: kātuṃ vaṭṭatīti veditabba”nti vuttaṃ. Evañca pana vadeyya “yāva parisā vaḍḍhati,
anya-e1102n0:177_264: tāva sīmāpi vaḍḍhati parisapariyantato udakukkhepoyeva pamāṇanti vinayaṭṭhakathāyaṃ
anya-e1102n0:177_265: vuttattā parisavasena vaḍḍhamānā udakakhipanaṃ vināyeva vaḍḍhati upacārasīmā viya
anya-e1102n0:177_266: tasmā udakukkhepena payojanaṃ natthevā”ti. Taṃ nu, ayañhetthattho… udakukkhepasīmā
anya-e1102n0:177_267: nāmesā vaḍḍhamānā parisavaseneva vaḍḍhati baddhasīmāyaṃ pana vaḍḍhamānā samūhavasena
anya-e1102n0:177_268: vaḍḍhati. Kasmā parisavasena vaḍḍhamānā parisapariyantato udakukkhepo kātabboti.
anya-e1102n0:177_269: Apare evaṃ vadanti pubbe udakukkhepoyeva pamāṇaṃ, puna udakukkhepakiccaṃ natthi,
anya-e1102n0:177_271: ekāyevavaṭṭati, atthateyeva kathine puna varasāṭakaṃ labhitvā kammavācāya dānakiccaṃ
anya-e1102n0:177_272: natthi evameva etthāpi pubbe udakukkhepoyeva pamāṇaṃ, puna udakukkhepakiccaṃ natthīti
anya-e1102n0:177_273: te upacārasīmāyamiva maññitvā vadanti upacārasīmāyañhi purisāya nisinnaṭṭhānameva
anya-e1102n0:177_274: upacārasīmābhāvena vaḍḍhati idha pana parisapariyantato udakukkhepappamāṇena vaḍḍhatiyeva
anya-e1102n0:177_275: na udakukkhepaṃ vināva ijjhate “kathaṃ pana udakaṃ ukkhipitabbaṃ yathā akkhadhuttā
anya-e1102n0:177_276: dāruguḷaṃ khipanti, evaṃ udakaṃ vā vālikaṃ vā hatthena gahetvā thāmamajjhimena purisena
anya-e1102n0:177_277: sabbathāmena khipitabbaṃ, yattha evaṃ khittaṃ udakaṃ vā vālikaṃ vā patati, ayameko
anya-e1102n0:177_278: udakukkhepo”ti aṭṭhakathāvacanaṃ bhindanti nāma. Kimivāti ce, ye pana “kammameva
anya-e1102n0:177_279: kammakaraṇaṃ karoti, natthi nirayapālā”ti vadanti, te “atthi bhikkhave niraye nirayapālā”ti
anya-e1102n0:177_280: devadūtasuttaṃ bhindanti viyāti. Evañcapana vadeyya ye udakukkhepena saha ijjhanti,
anya-e1102n0:177_281: tepi “sacepi hi bhikkhusahassaṃ tiṭṭhati, tassa ṭhitokāsassa bāhirantato paṭṭhāya
anya-e1102n0:177_282: bhikkhūnaṃ vaggakammaparihāratthaṃ sīmāpekkhāya uppannāya tāya saha sayameva sañjātā
anya-e1102n0:177_283: sattabbhantarasīmā samānasaṃvāsakāti adhippāyo. Yattha pana khuddake araññe mahantehi
anya-e1102n0:177_284: vā bhikkhūhi paripuṇṇatāya vaggakammasaṅkābhāvena sattabbhantarasīmāpekkhā natthi,
anya-e1102n0:177_285: tattha sattabbhantarasīmā na uppajjati, kevalāraññasīmāyameva tattha saṅghena kammaṃ
anya-e1102n0:177_286: kātabbaṃ nadīādīsupi esevanayo”ti vimati vinodaniyaṃ vuttavacanaṃ bhindanti nāmāti.
anya-e1102n0:177_287: Taṃ na, tena no kā hāni evampi amhākaṃ vāde koci virodho na vijjateva. Kasmāti ce,
anya-e1102n0:177_288: ime dve saddaracanāpi asambandhāva bhinnalakkhaṇā bhinnavisayā cetā sīmā. Kathaṃ
anya-e1102n0:177_289: saddaracanā asambandhā. Yathā araññe tattha sattabbhantarasīmā na uppajjati, kevalāraññamevāti
anya-e1102n0:177_290: vuccati, eva meva “nadiyāpi sabbattha saṅgho nisīdati, udakukkhepasīmā nuppajjatī”ti
anya-e1102n0:177_291: avatvā “udakukkhepasīmā kammaṃ natthī”ti kriyāparāmasanavasena vuttaṃ. Karitabbaṃ
anya-e1102n0:177_292: kammaṃ. Kiṃ taṃ, khipanaṃ. Evampi saddaracanā asambandhāva. “Vaggakammaparihāratthaṃ…pe…
anya-e1102n0:177_293: udakukkhepasīmā sattabbhantarasīmā uppajjati, nāsatī”ti ettha “nāsatī”ti imassa udakukkhepena
anya-e1102n0:177_294: vināpīti atthopi yujjateva. Kasmāti ce “sīmāpekkhāya satievā”ti iminā anulomanayavasena
anya-e1102n0:177_295: “sīmāpekkhāya asati nuppajjatī”ti attho yujjateva. Kecipana “samantā abbhantaraṃ
anya-e1102n0:177_296: minitvā paricchedakaraṇeneva sīmā sañjāyati, na sayamevā”ti vadanti taṃ na gahetabbaṃ.
anya-e1102n0:177_297: Yadi hi…pe… yathā cettha, evaṃ udakukkhepasīmāyapi nadīādīsupi tatthāpi hi majjhimapuriso
anya-e1102n0:177_298: na ñāyati, tathā sabbathāmena khipananti imināpi vacanena ācariyavarassa udakukkhepena
anya-e1102n0:177_299: saheva sīmāpekkhāya sati udakukkhepasīmā uppajjati, nāsatīti adhippāyo ñāyati. Kathaṃ
anya-e1102n0:177_301: samānā, na pana samānalakkhaṇā tathā hi “asammatāya bhikkhave sīmāya aṭṭhapitāya
anya-e1102n0:177_302: yaṃ gāmaṃ vā nigamaṃ vā upanissāya viharati, yā tassa gāmassa vā gāmasīmā, nigamassa
anya-e1102n0:177_303: vā nigamasīmā, ayaṃ tattha samānasaṃvāsā ekūposathā”ti imasmiṃ sikkhāpade khuddako
anya-e1102n0:177_304: vā mahanto vā sabbopi gāmapadeso gāmasīmāti anuññātā, na sattabbhantarasīmāya viya
anya-e1102n0:177_305: samantā leḍḍupātukkhepena anuññātā abbhantarasīmāyapi agāmake ce araññe yaṃ nissāya
anya-e1102n0:177_306: viharati, tassa araññassa araññasīmāti nānuññātā tathā nadīsamuddajātassaresupi gāmasīmāyamiva
anya-e1102n0:177_307: sabbo nadīsamuddajātassarapadeso nadīsamuddajātassa rasīmāti evameva na anuññātā
anya-e1102n0:177_308: tathā abbhantarasīmāyamiva samantā sattabbhantarāti vā nānuññātā evamimā gāmasīmasattabbhantaraudakukkhepasīmā
anya-e1102n0:177_309: bhinnalakkhaṇā, tasmā bhagavatā paññattasikkhāpadānusāreneva gāmasīmāyapi khuddako
anya-e1102n0:177_310: vā mahanto vā sabbo gāmapadeso gāmasīmāva hoti, sattabbhantarasīmāyapi “samantā sattabbhantarā”ti
anya-e1102n0:177_311: paññattasikkhāpadānusārena samantā sattabbhantarasīmā sīmāpekkhāya saha sayameva
anya-e1102n0:177_312: uppajjatī”ti minanāminanavicāraṇā pana niratthakāva tathā udakukkhepasīmāyapi “majjhimassa
anya-e1102n0:177_313: purisassa samantā udakukkhepā”ti paññattasikkhāpadānurūpaṃ udakukkhepena saheva uppajjatīti
anya-e1102n0:177_314: natthi khipanākhipana vicāraṇāya payojananti. Kathaṃ bhinnavisayā sattabbhantarasīmā
anya-e1102n0:177_315: araññavisayā, udakukkhepasīmā nadīsamuddajātassaravisayā, evampi etā gāmasīmasattabbhantaraudakukkhepasīmā
anya-e1102n0:177_316: bhinnavisayāva tasmā “nadīādīsu eseva nayo”ti vuttepi sattabbhantarasīmā apekkhāya
anya-e1102n0:177_317: saheva attano sabhāveneva sattabbhantarasīmā uppajjati yathā. Evameva udakukkhepasīmāyapi
anya-e1102n0:177_318: apekkhāya saha udakukkhepaṃ katvāva vaggakammaparihāratthaṃ udakukkhepasīmā uppajjati,
anya-e1102n0:177_319: na vināti sanniṭṭhānaṃ kātabbaṃ. Nanu ca mātikāṭṭhakathāyaṃ paricchedabbhantare hatthapāsaṃ
anya-e1102n0:177_320: vijahitvā ṭhitopi, paricchedā bahi aññaṃ tattakaṃyeva paricchedaṃ anatikkamitvā ṭhitopi
anya-e1102n0:177_321: kammaṃ kopeti, idaṃ sabbaaṭṭhakathāsu sinniṭṭhāna’nti vuttavacane navirujjhatīti
anya-e1102n0:177_322: ce. Taṃ na, mātikāṭṭhakathāyaṃ “sace pana dvesaṅghā visuṃvisuṃ uposathādikammaṃ karonti,
anya-e1102n0:177_323: dvinnaṃ udakukkhepānaṃ antare añño eko udakukkhepo upacāratthāya ṭhapetabbo”ti dvinnaṃ
anya-e1102n0:177_324: saṅghānaṃ visuṃ visuṃ kammakaraṇādhikāre vuttattā. Sāratthadīpaniyampi “tattha aññaṃ
anya-e1102n0:177_325: tattakaṃyeva paricchedaṃ anatikkamitvā ṭhitopi kammaṃ kopetīti idaṃ neva pāḷiyaṃ,
anya-e1102n0:177_326: na aṭṭhakathāyaṃ upalabbhati. Yadi cetaṃ dvinnaṃ saṅghānaṃ visuṃvisuṃ uposathādikammakaraṇādhikāre
anya-e1102n0:177_327: vuttattā udakukkhepato bahi aññaṃ udakukkhepaṃ anatikkamitvā uposathādikaraṇatthaṃ.
anya-e1102n0:177_328: Ṭhito saṅgho sīmāsambhedasambhavato kammaṃ kopetīti iminā adhippāyena vuttaṃ siyā.
anya-e1102n0:177_329: Evaṃ sati yujjeyya, teneva mātikāṭṭhakathāyaṃ līnatthappakāsaniyaṃ aññaṃ tattakaṃyeva
anya-e1102n0:177_330: paricchedanti dutiyaṃ udakukkhepaṃ anatikkamantopi kopeti. Kasmā, attano udakukkhepasīmāya
anya-e1102n0:177_331: paresaṃ udakukkhepasīmāya ajjhotthatattā sīmāsambhedo hoti, tasmā kopetī’ti “idaṃ
anya-e1102n0:177_332: sabbaaṭṭhakathāsu sanniṭṭhāna”nti ca iminā adhippāyena vuttanti gahetabbaṃ. Sabbāsupi
anya-e1102n0:177_333: aṭṭhakathāsu sīmāsambhedassa anicchitattā teneva attano ca aññesañca udakukkhepaparicchedassa
anya-e1102n0:177_334: antarā añño udakukkhepo sīmantarikatthāya ṭhapetabboti vuttaṃ. Aññe panettha aññathāpi
anya-e1102n0:177_335: papañcenti, taṃ na gahetabba’nti vatvā paṭikkhittaṃ. Tassa “antohatthapāsaṃ vijahitvā
anya-e1102n0:177_336: ṭhito kammaṃ kopetī”ti iminā paricchedato bahi yatthakatthaci ṭhito kammaṃ na kopetīti
anya-e1102n0:177_337: dīpetīti sāratthadīpanīvacanenāpi ekasmiṃ saṅghasannipāte paricchedato bahi aññaṃ
anya-e1102n0:177_338: tattakaṃyeva paricchedaṃ anatikkamitvā ṭhitopi kammaṃ na kopetīti veditabbametaṃ
anya-e1102n0:177_340: suviññeyyatarā hoti, sīmāsambhedasaṅkā ca na siyāti sāmicidassanatthaṃ añño udakukkhepo
anya-e1102n0:177_341: sīmantarikatthāya ṭhapetabbo’ti vuttaṃ. Yattakena pana sīmāsambhedo na hoti, tattakaṃ
anya-e1102n0:177_342: ṭhapetuṃ vaṭṭatiyeva, tenāhu porāṇā “yattakena sīmasaṅkaro na hoti, tattakampi ṭhapetuṃ
anya-e1102n0:177_343: vaṭṭati. Khuddakaṃ pana na vaṭṭatī”ti idampi udakukkhepasīmāya parisavasena vaḍḍhanato
anya-e1102n0:181: Janapadasīmā nāma ekassa rañño vijite pavatto mahāmaccānaṃ nivāsabhūto ekameko padeso janapadasīmā nāma.
anya-e1102n0:182_0: Raṭṭhasīmā nāma kāsikosalādikā soḷasa mahājanapadā. “Soḷasamahānagara”ntipi tesaṃ
anya-e1102n0:182_1: nāmaṃ. Tattha soḷasa mahājanapadāni nāma. Aṅgaraṭṭhaṃ, magadharaṭṭhaṃ, kosalaraṭṭhaṃ,
anya-e1102n0:182_2: vajjiraṭṭhaṃ, cetiyaraṭṭhaṃ, kururaṭṭhaṃ, pañcālaraṭṭhaṃ, majjharaṭṭhaṃ, surasenaraṭṭhaṃ,
anya-e1102n0:182_3: assakaraṭṭhaṃ, avantiraṭṭhaṃ, gandhālaraṭṭhaṃ, mallaraṭṭhaṃ, kambojaraṭṭhanti imāni
anya-e1102n0:182_4: soḷasamahājanapadāni nāma. Ime soḷasamahājanapadā majjhimapadeseyeva pavattā mahāraṭṭhā
anya-e1102n0:182_5: nāma tadaññepi sunāparantaraṭṭhādikā bahutarāva. Tathā paccantavisayepi rāmaññādikā
anya-e1102n0:182_6: anekappabhedā mahāraṭṭhā attheva tepi sabbe raṭṭhasīmā nāma. Lokiyasatthesu pana
anya-e1102n0:182_7: yasmiṃ padese khattiyabrāhmaṇavessasuddavasena catuvaṇṇāni vasanti, so padeso “mahāraṭṭho”ti
anya-e1102n0:184: So milakkhudeso vutto, puññabhūmi tato para”nti.
anya-e1102n0:185: Rajjasīmā nāma ekassa rañño āṇāpavattaṭṭhānaṃ rajjasīmā nāma.
anya-e1102n0:186_0: Dīpasīmā nāma samuddantare vā nadimajjhe vā pavattā dīpā dīpasīmā nāma. Yasmiṃ pana
anya-e1102n0:186_1: dīpe gāmā vasanti, so gāmasīmātveva saṅkhyaṃ gacchati, vakkhati hi sukkhe jātassare
anya-e1102n0:186_2: vāpiṃ vā khaṇanti vappaṃ vā karonti, taṃ ṭhānaṃ gāmakhettaṃ hotīti.
anya-e1102n0:187: Cakkavāḷasīmā nāma “āyāmato ca vitthārato ca yojanānaṃ dvādasasatasahassāni tīṇisahassāni cattārisatāni paññāsañcayojanāni.
anya-e1102n0:191_0: Vuttaṃ ekaṃ cakkavāḷaṃ cakkavāḷasīmā nāma. Evaṃ pannarasappabhedā hoti sīmā. Tattha
anya-e1102n0:191_1: iddhimā puggalo yasmiṃ yasmiṃ vā sīme uposathādisaṅghakammaṃ karoti, tattha tattha
anya-e1102n0:191_2: gate bhikkhū hatthapāsanayanaṃ vā bahisīmakaraṇaṃ vā kātuṃ chandārahānaṃ, chandaṃ
anya-e1102n0:191_3: āharitvā kātuṃ sakkuṇeyyabhāvoyeva pamāṇaṃ. Evamasakkonte aniddhimapuggale sandhāya
anya-e1102n0:191_4: atimahantāraññe samantā sattabbhantarasīmā anuññātā. Tattha sīmāpekkhāya saha samantā
anya-e1102n0:191_5: sattabbhantarasīmā attano sabhāveneva jātā tathā nadīsamuddajātassaresupi majjhimassa
anya-e1102n0:191_6: purisassa samantā udakukkhepasīmā anuññātā tatthapi vaggakammaparihāratthaṃ sīmāpekkhaṃ
anya-e1102n0:191_7: katvā udakukkhepena saha udakukkhepasīmā uppajjati tathā gāmanigamajanapadanagararaṭṭharajjasīmāsupi
anya-e1102n0:191_8: vaggakammaparihāratthaṃ baddhasīmā anuññātā. Tato paresu pana gāmasīmasattabbhantaraudakukkhepasīmā
anya-e1102n0:191_10: gate bhikkhū sodhetvā chandārahānaṃ chandaṃ āharitvā samaggassa saṅghassa anumatiyāva
anya-e1102n0:191_11: uposathādisaṅghakammaṃ kātabbameva tathā khuddake araññepi nadījātassarepi yathāsukhaṃ
anya-e1102n0:192_0: Evaṃ paricchindanalakkhaṇena abhedepi baddhābaddhavasena duvidhā. Tappabhedena pannarasavidhā,
anya-e1102n0:192_1: sarūpavasena pana khaṇḍasīmā, upacārasīmā, samānasaṃvāsasīmā, avippavāsasīmā, lābhasīmā,
anya-e1102n0:192_2: gāmasīmā. Nigamasīmā, nagarasīmā, abbhantarasīmā, araññasīmā, udakukkhepasīmā, nadīsīmā,
anya-e1102n0:192_3: jātassarasīmā, samuddasīmā, janapadasīmā, raṭṭhasīmā, rajjasīmā, dīpasīmā, cakkavāḷasīmātiekūnavīsappabhede
anya-e1102n0:192_4: pi sīme vipattilakkhaṇaṃ pahāya sampattilakkhaṇappakāsakaṃ sīmavisodhanīnāma pakaraṇaṃ samattaṃ.
anya-e1102n0:202: Imesaṃ gāthāpadānaṃ attho sabbaso saṃvaṇṇito hoti.
anya-e1102n0:204_1: upasampannā bhikkhū paccantimesu janapadesu pañcavaggato paṭṭhāya, majjhimesu janapadesu
anya-e1102n0:204_2: dasavaggato paṭṭhāya sabbe hatthapāsaṃ avijahitvā nisinnā honti, ayaṃ parisasampatti
anya-e1102n0:204_3: nāma. Tattha ekavīsati vajjanīyā nāma “na bhikkhave saga ṭṭhāya parisāyā”ti vacanato
anya-e1102n0:204_4: heṭṭhā “na bhikkhave bhikkhuniyā nisinnaparisāya pātimokkhaṃ uddisitabba”nti ādinānayena
anya-e1102n0:204_5: vuttā bhikkhunī, sikkhamānā, sāmaṇero, sāmaṇerī, sikkhāpaccakkhātako, antimavatthuajjhāpannako,
anya-e1102n0:204_6: āpattiyā adassane ukkhittako, āpattiyā appaṭikamme ukkhittako, pāpikāya diṭṭhiyā
anya-e1102n0:204_7: appaṭinissagge ukkhittako, paṇḍako, theyyasaṃvāsako, titthiyapakkantako, tiracchānagato,
anya-e1102n0:204_8: māghātutako, pitughātako, arahantaghātako, bhikkhunidūsako, saṅghabhedako, lohituppādako,
anya-e1102n0:204_9: ubhatobyañjanakoti te bahisīmakaraṇavasena nisinnāti attho. Yadi te hatthapāse vā
anya-e1102n0:204_10: sīmeyeva vā honti, te avajjetvā pañcavaggādiko pakatattagaṇo hatthapāsaṃ avijahitvā
anya-e1102n0:204_11: nisinno hoti, kārakasaṅgho sāvajjo, kammaṃpana na kuppati kasmā avaggārahattā. Aparepana
anya-e1102n0:204_12: evaṃ vadanti antimavatthuajjhāpannassa avandanīyesu avuttattā, tena saddhiṃ sayantassa
anya-e1102n0:204_13: sahaseyyāpattiyā abhāvato tassa ca paṭiggahaṇassa rūhanatoti tadeva yuttataranti
anya-e1102n0:204_14: viññāyati, kiñcāpi yāva so bhikkhubhāvaṃ paṭijānāti, tāva vanditabbo. Yadā pana “assamaṇomhī”ti
anya-e1102n0:204_15: paṭijānāti, tadā na vanditabboti ayamettha viseso veditabbo. Antimavatthuajjhāpannassa
anya-e1102n0:204_16: hi bhikkhubhāvaṃ paṭijānantasseva bhikkhubhāvo, na tatoparaṃ. Bhikkhubhāvaṃ appaṭijānanto
anya-e1102n0:204_17: hi anupasampannapakkhaṃ bhajatīti majjhimagaṇṭhipade sāratthadīpaniyañca vuttattā
anya-e1102n0:204_18: antimavatthu ajjhāpannapubbo bhikkhu attano kāraṇaṃ ajānitvāva tena saha pañcavaggagaṇo
anya-e1102n0:204_19: uposathādisaṅghakammaṃ karoti, kārakasaṅgho anavajjo, kammampi na kuppatīti, tesaṃ
anya-e1102n0:204_20: matimattameva. Kasmā sahaseyyāpatti abhāvopi tassa bhikkhusaññāya patiṭṭhitattā,
anya-e1102n0:204_21: paṭiggahaṇaruhaṇassa ca tasmiṃ puggale bhikkhūti saddahitattā tena puggalena sahaseyyāpattipi
anya-e1102n0:204_22: natthi, paṭiggahaṇañca ruhati, ekavīsativajjanīyapuggalepi tathāvidhassa avicārikattā
anya-e1102n0:204_23: tena saha pañcavaggagaṇo uposathādisaṅghakammaṃ karonto kārakasaṅgho asañcicca anupavajjo.
anya-e1102n0:204_24: Kammaṃ pana kuppatīti amhākaṃ khanti, ito yuttataro labbhamāno pariyesitabbova.
anya-e1102n0:206_1: vā samaggena saṅghena ñatticatutthena kammena akuppena ṭhānārahena uparibhāvaṃ samāpannoti
anya-e1102n0:206_2: vā dvīhi kāraṇehi laddhanāmo ñatti catutthaupasampannabhāvo atidullabhova.
anya-e1102n0:207: Evaṃ buddhuppādo dullabho, tato pabbajjā ca upasampadā cā ti imesaṃ tiṇṇaṃ padānaṃ atto vuttoyeva hoti.
anya-e1102n0:213: Saṅgho ca dullabho loke, sappurisāti dullabhā”ti.
anya-e1102n0:214_0: Imissā gāthāya saṃvaṇṇanākkamo sampatto. Tattha imasmiṃ sattaloke okāsaloke vā sabbaññusammāsambuddho
anya-e1102n0:214_1: dullabhova tathā hesa loko saṅkhāraloko, sattaloko, okāsalokoti tippabhedo hoti tesaṃ
anya-e1102n0:214_2: sampattivipatti ca evaṃ veditabbā tattha lujjati palujjatīti lokoti vacanatthena
anya-e1102n0:214_3: sattaloko veditabbo. Lokiyanti patiṭṭhahanti ettha sattanikāyāti vacanatthena okāsaloko
anya-e1102n0:214_4: veditabbo. Tathā hesa sattā avakasanti etthātiokāsoti vuccati so bhūmivasena apāyabhūmi,
anya-e1102n0:214_5: kāmasugatibhūmi, rūpāvacarabhūmi, arūpāvacarabhūmiceti catubbidhā hoti. Tattha nirayaṃ,
anya-e1102n0:214_6: tiracchānayoni, pettivisayo, asurakāyo, ti catasso apāyabhūmi nāma. Manussā, cātumahārājikā,
anya-e1102n0:214_7: tāvatiṃsā, yāmā, tusitā, nimmānarati, paranimmitavasavattī ceti sattavidhā hoti kāmasugatibhūmi
anya-e1102n0:214_8: sāpanāyaṃ ekādasavidhāpi kāmataṇhā avacarati etthāti vacanatthena kāmāvacarabhūmi
anya-e1102n0:214_9: nāma. Brahmapārisajjā, brahmapurohitā, mahābrahmā ca paṭhamajjhānabhūmi idaṃ agginā
anya-e1102n0:214_10: pariggahitaṭṭhānaṃ. Parittābhā, appamāṇābhā, ābhassarā ca dutiyajjhānabhūmi idaṃ
anya-e1102n0:214_11: āpena pariggahitaṭṭhānaṃ. Parittasubhā, appamāṇasubhā, subhakiṇhā ca tatiyajjhānabhūmi
anya-e1102n0:214_12: idaṃ vātena pariggahitaṭṭhānaṃ, tesaṃ vipattiṃ parato vaṇṇayissāma. Vehapphalā, asaññasattā,
anya-e1102n0:214_13: suddhāvāsā ca catutthajjhānabhūmiceti rūpāvacarabhūmi soḷasavidhā hoti. Avihā, atappā,
anya-e1102n0:214_14: sudassā, sudassī, akaniṭṭhāceti suddhāvāsabhūmi pañcavidhā hoti. Ākāsānañcāyatanabhūmi,
anya-e1102n0:214_16: hoti arūpabhūmi. Ettāvatā ekatiṃsappabhedāpi bhūmi avakasanti ettha sattanikāyāti
anya-e1102n0:214_17: vacanatthena okāsoti vuccati. Tattha aṭṭha mahānirayāni apāyabhūmi nāma. Tiracchānaṃ
anya-e1102n0:214_18: pettivisayo asurakāyoti imesaṃ visuṃ bhūmi nāma natthi, manussabhūmiyaṃyeva yattha
anya-e1102n0:214_19: katthaci araññavanapatthādīsu nibaddhavāsaṃ vasanti soyeva padeso tesaṃ bhūmi. Manussabhūmito
anya-e1102n0:214_21: Tatupari dvitālīsasahassayojanaṃ sinerumatthakaṃ tāvatiṃsānaṃ bhūmi. Tatupari dvetālīsasahassayojanaṃ
anya-e1102n0:214_22: ṭhānaṃ yāmānaṃ bhūmi. Iminā nayena yāva vasavattibhūmi dvitālīsasahassayojane tiṭṭhati,
anya-e1102n0:214_23: tasmā manussabhūmito yāva vasavattibhūmi dvesahassānipañcana hutāni duvesatasahassāni
anya-e1102n0:218: Gaṇanā nāma bhūmīsu, saṅkhyā evaṃ pakāsitā”ti.
anya-e1102n0:219_0: Tatupari brahmapārisajjādayo tayo brahmuno pañcapaññāsasatasahassa aṭṭhasahassayojane
anya-e1102n0:219_1: samatale ṭhāne tiṭṭhanti. Dutiyatatiyabhūmībrahmunopi tappamāṇesu samatalesu tiṭṭhanti.
anya-e1102n0:219_2: Catutthabhūmiyaṃ pana vehapphalaasaññasattā tappamāṇe samatale ṭhāne tiṭṭhanti. Tatuparisuddhāvāsabhūmiyo
anya-e1102n0:219_3: taṃtaṃ pamāṇe ṭhāne uparūpari tiṭṭhanti. Catassopi arūpabhūmiyo tappamāṇe ṭhāne uparūpari
anya-e1102n0:219_4: tiṭṭhanti. Ettāvatā ca manussabhūmito yāva bhavaggā yojanānaṃ sattakoṭi ca aṭṭhārasalakkhā
anya-e1102n0:219_5: ca pañcanahutāni ca chasahassāni ca honti tenetaṃ vuccati porāṇehi.
anya-e1102n0:234: Esā ca vicāraṇā ṭīkā cariyamatena katā;
anya-e1102n0:237: Tāva sahassadhā loke, ettha te vattatī vaso”ti.
anya-e1102n0:238_0: Vuttaṃ. Etthantare sattā tiṭṭhanti, tesaṃ vitthāro apubbaṃ katvā kathetuṃ asakkuṇeyyattā
anya-e1102n0:238_1: na vakkhāma imasmiṃ sattaloke okāsaloke ca sabbaññusammāsambuddhova dullabho, tathā
anya-e1102n0:238_2: hi cattāro buddhā anubuddho, sāvakabuddho, paccekabuddho, sammāsambuddhoti. Tattha
anya-e1102n0:238_3: bahussutaṃ bhikkhuṃ pasaṃsantena ca na so tumhākaṃ sāvako nāma, buddhonāmesa cundāti
anya-e1102n0:239: Dhammakāyo yato satthā, dhammo satthukāyo mato;
anya-e1102n0:241_0: Vutte puthujjanopi upacāravasena vācanāmaggassa bodhattā anubuddho nāma. Ariyasāvako
anya-e1102n0:241_1: pana parato yosavasena cattāri saccāni bujjhati bujjhanamattameva vāti vacanatthena
anya-e1102n0:241_2: bujjhanasabhāvattā sāvakabuddho nāma. Yo pana khaggavisāṇakappo sayambhūñāṇena anaññabodhako
anya-e1102n0:241_3: hutvā sāmaṃ bujjhanatthena paccekabujjhattā paccekabuddho nāma. Sambuddhotipi etasseva
anya-e1102n0:241_4: nāmaṃ. Yo pana saṅkhatāsaṅkhatappabhedaṃ sakalampi dhammajātaṃ yāthāvasarasalakkhaṇappaṭivedhavasena
anya-e1102n0:241_5: sammā pakārena sayaṃ pacitupāramitāsayambhūtena sayambhūñāṇena sayameva anaññabodhito
anya-e1102n0:241_6: hutvā savāsanasammohaniddāya accantaṃ vigato dinakarakiraṇasamāgamena paramarucirasirīsobhaggappattiyā
anya-e1102n0:241_8: sabbadhamme bujjhi abujjhi aññāsīti sammāsambuddho, bhagavā, sova loke dullabho paccekasambuddhānampi
anya-e1102n0:241_9: hi ekasmiṃ kāle satasahassādivasena ekato pavattattā te dullabhāpi anacchariyajātattā
anya-e1102n0:241_10: paresaṃ maggaphalādhigamāya upanissayarahitattā ca sammāsambuddhova loke dullabho,
anya-e1102n0:242_0: Kathaṃ lokassa vipatti veditabbā tathā hesa loko vinassamāno tejenapi āpenapi vāyunāpi
anya-e1102n0:242_1: vinassati. Tassa vitthāro visuddhimaggādīsu vuccamānopi kesañci puggalānaṃ matena
anya-e1102n0:242_2: micchāgāhattā brahmūnaṃ āyunā minitepi asamānaṃ saṃvaṭṭasīmāpi viruddhā, tasmā tesaṃ
anya-e1102n0:242_3: vādaṃ apanetvā ganthato samānetvā vakkhāma. Tattha cattāri asaṅkhyeyyāni. Katamāni
anya-e1102n0:242_4: cattāri asaṅkhyeyyāni saṃvaṭṭo, saṃvaṭṭaṭṭhāyī, vivaṭṭo, vaṭṭaṭṭhāyīti. Tayo saṃvaṭṭā
anya-e1102n0:242_5: āposaṃvaṭṭo, tejosaṃvaṭṭo, vāyosaṃvaṭṭo. Tisso saṃvaṭṭasīmā ābhassarā, subhakiṇhā,
anya-e1102n0:242_6: vehapphalāti. Ayamettha uddeso. Tattha saṃvaṭṭo nāma parihāyamāno kappo. Tena saṃvaṭṭaṭṭhāyīpi
anya-e1102n0:242_7: gahito hoti, taṃ mūlakattā. Vaḍḍhayamāno vivaṭṭakappo nāma. Tena vivaṭṭaṭṭhāyīpi
anya-e1102n0:242_8: gahito taṃ mūlakattā. Tattha saṃvaṭṭoti vināso. Yadā kappo vinassamāno tejena saṃvaṭṭati,
anya-e1102n0:242_9: ābhassarato heṭṭhā paṭhamajjhānabhūmi agginā dayhati. Yadā āpena saṃvaṭṭati, subhakiṇhato
anya-e1102n0:242_10: heṭṭhā yāva dutiyajjhānabhūmi udakena vilīyati. Yadā vāyunā saṃvaṭṭati, vehapphalato
anya-e1102n0:242_11: heṭṭhā yāva tatiyajjhānabhūmi vātena saṃvaṭṭati. Vitthārato pana jātikhetta āṇākhettavisayakhettavasena
anya-e1102n0:242_12: tiṇṇaṃ buddhakhettānaṃ āṇākhettaṃ vinassati. Tasmiṃ vinaṭṭhe jātikhettampi vinassateva.
anya-e1102n0:242_13: Tattha jātikhettaṃ dasasahassacakkavāḷapariyantaṃ hoti. Taṃ tathāgatassa paṭisandhiggahaṇaāyusaṅkhārossajjanādikālesupi
anya-e1102n0:242_14: kampati. Āṇākhettaṃ koṭisatasahassacakkavāḷapariyantaṃ. Yattha ratanasuttaṃ khandhaparittaṃ
anya-e1102n0:242_15: dhajaggaparittaṃ āṭānāṭiyaparittaṃ moraparittanti imesaṃ parittānaṃ ānubhāvo pavattati.
anya-e1102n0:242_16: Visayakhettaṃ anantaṃ aparimāṇaṃ. Tattha jātikhettaāṇākhettāvasena dve khettāni ekato
anya-e1102n0:242_17: vinassanti. Saṇṭhahantampi ekato saṇṭhahati. Tassa vināsoca saṇṭhahantañca evaṃ veditabbaṃ
anya-e1102n0:242_18: yasmiṃ samaye kappo agginā nassati, tadā ādito kappavināsakamahāmegho vuṭṭhahitvā
anya-e1102n0:242_19: koṭisatasahassacakkavāḷaṃ ekameghavassaṃ vasi, tuṭṭhā manussā bījāni vappenti, sassesu
anya-e1102n0:242_20: gokhāyitamattesu jātesu gadrabharavaṃ viravanto ekabindupi na patati. Yadā pacchinnameva
anya-e1102n0:242_21: hoti tadā vassūpajīvino sattā kālaṃ katvā parittābhesu brahmabhūmīsu uppajjanti puññaphalūpajīvinopi
anya-e1102n0:242_22: devatā tattheva brahmaloke uppajjanti, evaṃ dīghassa addhuno accayena tattha tattha
anya-e1102n0:242_23: udakaṃ parikkhayaṃ gacchati, macchakacchapādi udakanissitā pāṇā kālaṃ katvā manussadevalokesu
anya-e1102n0:242_24: nibbattitvā jhānaṃ uppādetvā brahmaloke nibbattanti. Nerayikasattāpi sattamasūriyapātubhāvā
anya-e1102n0:242_25: vinassanti, tepi devaloke paṭiladdhajjhānavasena brahmaloke uppajjanti, tadā hi lokabyūhā
anya-e1102n0:242_26: nāma kāmāvacaradevā ukkhittasirā vikiṇṇakesā rudamukhā assūni hatthehi muñcamānā
anya-e1102n0:242_27: rattavatthanivatthā ativiya virūpavesadhārino hutvā manussapathe vicarantā evaṃ ārocenti
anya-e1102n0:242_28: “mārisā bho ito vassasata sahassaccayena kappavuṭṭhānaṃ bhavissati ayaṃ loko vinassissati
anya-e1102n0:242_29: mahāsamuddopisussissati ayañca mahāpathavī sinerupabbatarājā ḍayhissati vinassissati
anya-e1102n0:242_30: yāvabrahmalokā vināso bhavissati mettaṃ mārisā bhāvetha. Karuṇaṃ, muditaṃ, upekkhaṃ
anya-e1102n0:242_31: mārisā bhāvetha mātaraṃ upaṭṭhahatha, pitaraṃ upaṭṭhahatha, kule jeṭṭhāpacāyino hothā”ti.
anya-e1102n0:242_32: Tesaṃ vacanaṃ sutvā yebhuyyena manussā ca bhummadevatā ca saṃvegajātā aññamaññaṃ
anya-e1102n0:242_33: muducittā hutvā mettādīni puññāni karitvā devaloke nibbattanti. Tattha sudhābhojanaṃ
anya-e1102n0:242_34: bhuñjitvā vāyo parikammaṃ katvā jhānaṃ paṭilabhanti, evaṃ nerayikasattāpi aparāpariyakammena
anya-e1102n0:242_35: devalokaṃ nibbattanti. Ye pana niyatamicchādiṭṭhikā tesaṃ kammassa aparikkhayā aññacakkavāḷesu
anya-e1102n0:242_36: attano kammānurūpaṃ vipākamanubhonti. Teneva ahosikamme micchādiṭṭhivasena akattabbaṃ
anya-e1102n0:242_37: nāma pāpaṃ natthi, yato saṃsārakhāṇubhāvova nāma hotīti āha “diṭṭhi paramāni bhikkhave
anya-e1102n0:242_38: vajjānī”ti. “Aparāpariyavedanīyakammarahitopi saṃsaranto satto nāma natthī”ti vuttattā.
anya-e1102n0:242_40: bhavato vuṭṭhānaṃ nāma bhaveyyāti amhākaṃ khanti. Evaṃ devaloke paṭiladdhajjhānavasena
anya-e1102n0:242_41: sabbepi brahmaloke nibbattanti. Vassupacchedato pana uddhaṃ dīghassa addhuno accayena
anya-e1102n0:242_42: dutiyo sūriyo pātubhavati. Pātubhūte ca tasmiṃ neva rattiparicchedo, na divā paricchedo
anya-e1102n0:242_43: paññāyati, eko sūriyo uṭṭheti, eko sūriyo atthaṃ gacchati. Avicchinnasūriyasantāpova loko hoti.
anya-e1102n0:243_0: Pakatisūriye sūriyadevaputto atthi kappavināsakasūriye pana natthi. Pakatisūriyobhāsena
anya-e1102n0:243_1: ākāse valāhakā dhūmasikhāpi caranti. Kappavināsakasūriyobhāsena vigatadhūmavalāhakaṃ
anya-e1102n0:243_2: ādāsamaṇḍalaṃ viya nimmalaṃ hoti nabhaṃ ṭhapetvā gaṅgā, yamunā, sarabhū, aciravatī,
anya-e1102n0:243_3: mahīti, imā pañca mahānadiyo ṭhapetvā avasesapañcasatakunnadīādīsu udakaṃ sussati
anya-e1102n0:243_4: tato dīghassa addhuno accayena tatiyo sūriyo pātubhavati tasmiṃ pātubhūte pañca mahānadiyopi
anya-e1102n0:243_5: sussanti. Tato dīghassa addhuno accayena catuttho sūriyo pātubhavati. Yassa pātubhāvā
anya-e1102n0:243_6: himavatī mahānadīnaṃ pabhavā sīhapatano, haṃsapatano, mandākinī, kaṇṇamuṇḍako, rathakāradaho,
anya-e1102n0:243_7: anotattadaho, chaddantadaho, kuṇāladahoti ime satta mahāsarā sussanti. Tato dīghassa
anya-e1102n0:243_8: addhuno accayena pañcamo sūriyo pātubhavati, yassa pātubhāvā anupubbena mahāsamuddo
anya-e1102n0:243_9: aṅgulipabbatemanamattampi udakaṃ na saṇṭhāti. Tato dīghassa addhuno accayena chaṭṭho
anya-e1102n0:243_10: sūriyo pātubhavati, yasmiṃ pātubhāve sakalacakkavāḷaṃ ekadhūmaṃ hoti, pariyādinnasinehadhūmena
anya-e1102n0:243_11: yathā ca evaṃ koṭisatasahassacakkavāḷampi. Tatopi dīghassa addhuno accayena sattamo
anya-e1102n0:243_12: sūriyo pātubhavati, yassa pātubhāvā sakalacakkavāḷaṃ ekajālaṃ hoti saddhiṃ koṭisatasahassacakkavāḷehi
anya-e1102n0:243_13: yojanasatikādibhedā sinerukūṭāni palujjitvā ākāseyeva antaradhāyanti. Sāpi aggijālā
anya-e1102n0:243_14: uṭṭhahitvā cātumahārājike gaṇhāti, tattha kanakavimānaratanavimānāni jhāpetvā tāvatiṃsabhavanaṃ
anya-e1102n0:243_15: gaṇhāti etenūpāyena yāva paṭhamajjhānabhūmi gaṇhāti. Tattha tayopi brahmaloke jhāpetvā
anya-e1102n0:243_16: ābhassare āhacca aṭṭhāsi. Sā yāva aṇumattampi saṅkhāragataṃ atthi, tāva nanibbāyi.
anya-e1102n0:243_17: Sabbasaṅkhāraparikkhayā pana sappitelajhāpanaaggisikhā viya chārikampi anavasesetvā
anya-e1102n0:243_18: nibbāyi. Heṭṭhā ākāsena saha upari ākāso eko hoti mahandhakāro. Evaṃ kappavināsakamahāmeghato
anya-e1102n0:243_19: yāvajālaparicchedā saṃvaṭṭo nāma ekamasaṅkhyeyyaṃ nāma. Atha dīghassa addhuno accayena
anya-e1102n0:243_20: mahāmegho vuṭṭhahitvā paṭhamaṃ sukhumaṃ vassati. Anupubbena kumudanāḷayaṭṭhimusalatālakkhandhādippamāṇāhi
anya-e1102n0:243_21: dhārāhi vassanto koṭisatasahassacakkavāḷesu sabbaḍaḍḍhaṭṭhānaṃ pūretvā antaradhāyati.
anya-e1102n0:243_22: Taṃ udakaṃ heṭṭhā ca tiriyañca vāto samuṭṭhahitvā ghanaṃ karoti. Parivaṭumaṃ paduminipatte
anya-e1102n0:243_24: sampattimahāmegho, idaṃ saṃvaṭṭaṭṭhāyī nāma, dutiyamasaṅkhyeyyaṃ nāma. Kathaṃ tāva
anya-e1102n0:243_25: mahantaṃ udakarāsiṃ vāto ghanaṃ karotīti ce. Vivarasampadānato taṃ vā tena piṇḍiyamānaṃ
anya-e1102n0:243_26: ghanaṃ kariyamānaṃ parikkhayamānaṃ anupubbena heṭṭhā otarati. Otiṇṇotiṇṇe udake pubbe
anya-e1102n0:243_28: paṭhamaṃ pātubhavati. Tato otiṇṇotiṇṇe udake catukāmāvacaradevalokaṭṭhāne anukkamena
anya-e1102n0:243_29: paranimmitavasavattī, nimmānaratī, tusitā, yāmāti cattāro kāmāvacaradevalokā pātubhavanti.
anya-e1102n0:243_30: Tato purimapathaviṭṭhānaṃ otiṇṇe pana udake balavavātā uppajjanti. Te taṃ pidahitadvāre
anya-e1102n0:243_31: dhamakaraṇe ṭhitaudakamiva nirussāsaṃ katvā nirujjhanti. Madhurodakaṃ parikkhayaṃ
anya-e1102n0:243_32: gacchamānaṃ upari rasapathaviṃ samuṭṭhāpeti sā vaṇṇasampannāceva hoti gandharasasampannā
anya-e1102n0:243_33: ca, nirudakapāyāsassa upari paṭalaṃ viya tadā ca ābhassarabrahmaloke paṭhamatarābhinibbattā
anya-e1102n0:243_34: sattā āyukkhayā vā puññakkhayā vā tato cavitvā idhūpapajjanti. “Puññakkhayā vā”ti
anya-e1102n0:243_35: iminā brahmūnaṃ āyuparicchedaṃ appatvāva kammakkhayena maraṇaṃ viññāyati. Te honti
anya-e1102n0:243_36: sayaṃpabhā antalikkhacarā. Te aggaññasutte vuttanayena taṃ rasapathaviṃ sāyitvā taṇhābhibhūtā
anya-e1102n0:243_37: āluppakāraṃ paribhuñjituṃ upakkamanti. Atha nesaṃ sayaṃ pabhā antaradhāyati, andhakāro
anya-e1102n0:243_38: hoti te andhakāraṃ disvā bhāyanti. Tato nesaṃ bhayaṃ nāsetvā sūrabhāvaṃ janayantaṃ
anya-e1102n0:243_39: paripuṇṇapaṇṇāsayojanaṃ sūriyamaṇḍalaṃ vā pātubhavati. Te taṃ disvā “ālokaṃ paṭilabhimhā”ti
anya-e1102n0:243_40: haṭṭhatuṭṭhā hutvā “amhākaṃ bhayaṃ nāsetvā sūrabhāvaṃ janayanto uṭṭhito, tasmā sūriyo
anya-e1102n0:243_41: hotū”ti sūriyo tvevassa nāmaṃ karonti. Atha sūriye divasaṃ ālokaṃ katvā atthaṅgate
anya-e1102n0:243_42: “yampi ālokaṃ labhimhā, sopi no naṭṭho”ti puna bhītā honti. Tesaṃ evaṃ hoti “sādhuvatassa
anya-e1102n0:243_43: aññaṃ ālokaṃ labheyyāmā”ti. Tesaṃ cittaṃ ñatvā viya ekūnapaññāsayojanaṃ candamaṇḍalaṃ
anya-e1102n0:243_44: pātubhavati. Te taṃ disvā bhiyyosomattāya haṭṭhatuṭṭhā hutvā “amhākaṃ chandaṃ ñatvā
anya-e1102n0:243_45: viya uṭṭhito, tasmā cando hotū”ti candotvevassa nāmaṃ karonti. Tato pabhuti rattidivā
anya-e1102n0:243_46: paññāyanti. Anukkamena ca māsaddhamāsautusaṃvaccharā. Candimasūriyānaṃ pana pātubhūtadivaseyeva
anya-e1102n0:243_47: sinerucakkavāḷahimavantapabbatā pātubhavanti, te ca kho apubbaṃ acarimaṃ phagguṇapuṇṇamadivaseyeva
anya-e1102n0:243_48: pātubhavanti. Kathaṃ yathānāma kaṅgubhatte paccamāne ekappahāreneva bubbuḷakāni uṭṭhahanti.
anya-e1102n0:243_49: Eke padesā thūpathūpā honti, eke ninnaninnā, eke samasamā evameva thūpathūpaṭṭhāne
anya-e1102n0:243_50: pabbatā honti, ninnaninnaṭṭhāne samuddā, samasamaṭṭhāne dīpāti evaṃ manussaloke saṇṭhite
anya-e1102n0:243_51: cātumahārājikā, tāvatiṃsāti dve kāmāvacaradevalokā pacchato pātubhavanti. Bhūmanissitā
anya-e1102n0:243_52: nāma hete dve devalokā. Evaṃ sampattimahāmeghato yāva candimasūriyapātubhāvo, idaṃ
anya-e1102n0:243_53: vivaṭṭo nāma tatiyamasaṅkhyeyyaṃ nāma. Atha tesaṃ sattānaṃ rasapathaviṃ paribhuñjantānaṃ
anya-e1102n0:243_54: kammena ekacce vaṇṇavanto, ekacce dubbaṇṇā honti tattha vaṇṇavanto dubbaṇṇe atimaññanti.
anya-e1102n0:243_55: Tesaṃ mānātimānapaccayā sāpi rasapathavī antaradhāyati. Bhūmipappaṭako pātubhavati
anya-e1102n0:243_56: atha nesaṃ teneva nayena sopi antaradhāyati, patālatā pātubhavati, teneva nayena
anya-e1102n0:243_57: sāpi antaradhāyati. Akaṭṭhapāko sāli pātubhavati akaṇo athuso suddho sugandho taṇḍulapphalo.
anya-e1102n0:243_58: Tato nesaṃ bhājanāni uppajjanti te sālī bhājane ṭhapetvā pāsāṇapiṭṭhiyā ṭhapenti,
anya-e1102n0:243_59: sayameva jālasikhā uṭṭhahitvā pacati. So hoti odano sumanajātipupphasadiso, na tassa
anya-e1102n0:243_60: sūpena vā byañjanena vā karaṇīyaṃ atthi. Yaṃyaṃ rasaṃ bhuñjitukāmā honti, taṃtaṃ
anya-e1102n0:243_61: rasova hoti. Tesaṃ taṃ oḷārikaṃ āhāraṃ āharataṃ tato pabhuti muttakarīsaṃ sañjāyati.
anya-e1102n0:243_62: Atha nesaṃ tassa nikkhamanatthāya vaṇamukhāni pabhijjanti. Purisassa purisabhāvo,
anya-e1102n0:243_63: itthiyā itthibhāvo pātubhavati. Tatrasudaṃ itthī purisaṃ, puriso ca itthiṃ ativelaṃ
anya-e1102n0:243_64: upanijjhāyati. Tesaṃ ativelaṃ upanijjhāyanabhāvā kāmapariḷāho uppajjati. Tato methunadhammaṃ
anya-e1102n0:243_65: paṭisevanti. Te asaddhammapaṭisevanapaccayā viññūhi garahiyamānā viheṭhiyamānā tassa
anya-e1102n0:244_0: Te agāraṃ ajjhāvasamānā anukkamena aññatarassa alasajātikassa sattassa diṭṭhānugatiṃ
anya-e1102n0:244_1: āpajjantā sannidhiṃ karonti. Tato pabhuti kaṇopi thusopi taṇḍulaṃ pariyonaddhanti,
anya-e1102n0:244_2: lāyitaṭṭhānampi nappaṭivirūhati. Te sannipatitvā anuṭṭhunanti “pāpakā vata bho dhammā
anya-e1102n0:244_3: sattesu pātubhūtā, mayaṃ pubbe manomayā ahumhā”ti. Aggaññasutte vuttanayena vittharetabbaṃ.
anya-e1102n0:244_4: Tato mariyādaṃ ṭhapenti. Athaññataro satto aññassa bhāgaṃ adinnaṃ ādiyati. Taṃ dvikkhattuṃ
anya-e1102n0:244_5: paribhāsitvā tatiyavāre leḍḍudaṇḍehi paharanti. Te evaṃ adinnādānakalahamusāvādadaṇḍadānesu
anya-e1102n0:244_6: uppannesu sannipatitvā cintayanti, “yaṃnūna mayaṃ ekaṃ sattaṃ sammanneyyāma, yo no
anya-e1102n0:244_7: sammā khiyitabbaṃ khiyeyya, garahitabbaṃ garaheyya, pabbājetabbaṃ pabbājeyya, mayaṃ
anya-e1102n0:244_8: panassa sālīnaṃ bhāgaṃ anupadassāmā”ti. Evaṃ katasanniṭṭhānesu pana sattesu imasmiṃ
