anya-e1102n0:244_9: tāva kappe ayameva bhagavā bodhisattabhūto tena samayena tesu sattesu abhirūpataro
anya-e1102n0:244_10: ca dassanīyataro ca mahesakkhataro ca buddhisampanno paṭibalo niggahapaggahaṃ kātuṃ
anya-e1102n0:244_11: te taṃ upasaṅkamitvā yācitvā sammaniṃsu. So tena mahājanena sammatotipi mahāsammato,
anya-e1102n0:244_12: khettānaṃ adhipatīti khattiyo, dhammena samena paresaṃ rañjetīti rājāti, tīhi nāmehi
anya-e1102n0:244_13: paññāyittha. Yañhi loke acchariyaṃ ṭhānaṃ bodhisattova tattha ādi purisoti evaṃ bodhisattaṃ
anya-e1102n0:244_14: ādiṃ katvā khattiyamaṇḍale saṇṭhite anupubbena brāhmaṇādayopi vaṇṇā saṇṭhahiṃsu.
anya-e1102n0:244_15: Evaṃ candimasūriyapātu bhāvato yāva puna kappavināsakamahāmegho, idaṃ vivaṭṭaṭṭhāyī
anya-e1102n0:244_16: nāma catutthamasaṅkhyeyyaṃ nāma. Tenetaṃ vuccati megho jālaparicchinno saṃvaṭṭoti
anya-e1102n0:244_17: jālā meghaparicchinno saṃvaṭṭaṭṭhāyīti vuccati. Meghā sūriyaparicchinno vivaṭṭoti
anya-e1102n0:244_18: vuccati. Sūriyā meghaparicchinno vivaṭṭaṭṭhāyīti vuccati. Cattāri imāni kappāni mahākappoti
anya-e1102n0:244_19: vuccati. Vivaṭṭaṭṭhāyikappeyeva uppajjanti buddhādayoti. Tathā hi imasmiṃyeva vivaṭṭaṭṭhāyiasaṅkhyayyakappe
anya-e1102n0:244_20: buddhapacceka buddhasāvakacakkavattino uppajjanti, na tīsu asaṅkhyeyyakappesu. Tañca
anya-e1102n0:244_21: kho asuññakappeyeva, na suññakappe. Tattha buddhapaccekabuddhasāvakacakkavattīhi
anya-e1102n0:244_22: puññavantapuggalehi asuññattā asuññakappo nāma. Tabbigamena suññakappo veditabbo.
anya-e1102n0:244_23: Tesupi asuññakappo pañcavidho hoti sārakappo, maṇḍakappo, varakappo, sāramaṇḍakappo,
anya-e1102n0:244_24: bhaddakappoti, tesu yasmiṃ kappe ekova buddho uppajjati, so sārakappo nāma. Yasmiṃ
anya-e1102n0:244_25: kappe dve buddhā uppajjanti, so maṇḍakappo nāma. Yasmiṃ kappe tayo uppajjanti, so
anya-e1102n0:244_26: varakappo nāma. Yasmiṃ kappe cattāro buddhā uppajjanti, so sāramaṇḍakappo nāma. Yasmiṃ
anya-e1102n0:244_27: kappe pañca buddhā uppajjanti, so bhaddakapponāma. Imāni pañcakappāniyeva saheva
anya-e1102n0:273: Te sabbepi sammāsambuddhe yāva arimetteyyā samodhānetvā
anya-e1102n0:279_0: Namassanagāthā pavattā sā ūnasaṅkhyāvaseneva katāva bhavitabbaṃ, tathā hi amhākaṃ
anya-e1102n0:279_1: bhagavā porāṇabrahmadevabuddhaṃ ādiṃ katvā yāva porāṇasakyagotamā manasāva cintentassa
anya-e1102n0:279_2: sattaasaṅkhyeyyāni vītivattāni porāṇasakyagotamabuddhaṃ ādiṃ katvā yāva majjhimadīpaṅkarā
anya-e1102n0:279_3: vācāmattena nava asaṅkhyeyyāni vītivattāni. Majjhimadīpaṅkarato paṭṭhāya yāva padumuttarabuddhā
anya-e1102n0:279_4: kāyaṅgavācaṅgavasena cattāri asaṅkhyeyyāni vītivattāni. Padumuttarabuddhato yāva
anya-e1102n0:279_6: satta asaṅkhyeyye sabbaṃ sampiṇḍetvā ekasatasahassañca vīsati sahassañca pañcasahassāni
anya-e1102n0:279_7: ca honti. Porāṇasakyagotamamajjhimadīpaṅkarānamantare nava asaṅkhyeyye sabbaṃ sampiṇḍetvā
anya-e1102n0:279_8: tīṇisatasahassāni sattāsītisahassāni ca honti. Majjhimadīpaṅkarato yāva metteyyā
anya-e1102n0:279_9: aṭṭhavīsāti sabbaṃ samodhānetvā aṭṭhavīsañca dvādasasahassañca pañcasatasahassāni
anya-e1102n0:279_10: ca honti tasmā ūnasaṅkhyāti veditabbā. Paripuṇṇasaṅkhyāvasena icchamānehi cintetabbāva.
anya-e1102n0:282_0: Vuttesu vīsatiasaṅkhyeyyesu pavattaasaṅkhyeyyakappavaseneva katā. Atthato pana sārakappamaṇḍakappavarakappasāramaṇḍakappabhaddakappavasena
anya-e1102n0:282_1: pañcavidhāti veditabbā. Imāni pañcanāmāni buddhuppādakappeyeva labbhanti, anuppannakappe
anya-e1102n0:282_2: pana suññakappotveva nāmaṃ labbhati tathā hi kappasaṇṭhahanakāle sabbapaṭhamaṃ mahābodhipallaṅkaṭṭhāneyeva
anya-e1102n0:282_3: paduminigabbhā uppajjati. Sā yasmiṃ kāle eko buddho uppajjissati, eko paduminigabbho
anya-e1102n0:282_4: aṭṭhaparikkhārehi saha uppajjati. Taṃ disvā suddhāvāsabrahmuno nemittapāṭhakā arahanto
anya-e1102n0:282_5: imasmiṃ kappe eko buddho uppajjissatīti sañjātapītisomanassā hutvā aṭṭhaparikkhāre
anya-e1102n0:282_6: gahetvā brahmaloke ṭhapenti “yadā buddho uppajjissati, tadā dassāmā”ti. Evaṃ dve
anya-e1102n0:282_7: tayo cattāro pañca buddhā uppajjissanti, tadā dve tīṇi cattāri pañca paduminigabbhā
anya-e1102n0:282_8: aṭṭhaparikkhārehi saha uppajjanti. Tañca kho ekasmiṃ yeva nāḷekeka baddhā hutvā uppajjanti.
anya-e1102n0:282_9: Evaṃ kappasaṇṭhahanakālato paṭṭhāyeva imāni pañca nāmāni labbhantīti veditabbāni.
anya-e1102n0:282_10: Ettāvatā imasmiṃyeva vivaṭṭaṭṭhāyīasaṅkhyeyyakappe buddhādayo mahesakkhā puññavanto
anya-e1102n0:282_11: cakkavattirājāno uppajjanti, tathā āyukappantarakappānipi. Tattha āyukappo nāma tesaṃ
anya-e1102n0:282_12: tesaṃ sattānaṃ āyuparicchedo. Antarakappo nāma tattha sattharogadubbhikkhānaṃ aññatarasaṃvaṭṭanena
anya-e1102n0:282_14: paṭṭhāya anukkamena asaṅkhyeyyāyukappappamāṇesu sattesu pana adhammasamādānavasena
anya-e1102n0:282_15: kamena parihāyitvā dasavassāyukesu jātesu rogādīnamaññatarasaṃvaṭṭanena sattānaṃ
anya-e1102n0:282_16: vināsappatti yāva ayameko antarakappo. Evaṃ paricchinnaantarakappavasena catusaṭṭhiantarakappo
anya-e1102n0:282_17: eko asaṅkhyeyyakappo vīsati antarakappappamāṇoti apare vadanti. Imāni cattāri asaṅkhyeyyakappāni
anya-e1102n0:282_18: eko mahākappo nāma. Evaṃ tejo saṃvaṭṭavasena tāva mahākappānaṃ antaraṃ aggināva vinassati.
anya-e1102n0:282_19: Yasmiṃ pana samaye kappo udakena nassati, tadā āditova kappavināsakamahāmegho vuṭṭhahitvāti
anya-e1102n0:282_20: pubbe vuttanayeneva vitthāretabbaṃ ayaṃ pana viseso yathā tattha dutiyasūriyo, evamidhapi
anya-e1102n0:282_21: kappavināsako khārudakamahāmegho vuṭṭhāti so ādito sukhumaṃ vassanto anukkamena mahādhārāhi
anya-e1102n0:282_22: koṭisatasahassacakkavāḷaṃ pūrento vassati. Khārudakena phuṭṭhaphuṭṭhā pathavīpabbatādayo
anya-e1102n0:282_23: vilīyanti taṃ udakaṃ vātena samantato dhāritaṃ pathavito yāva parittābhā appamāṇābhā
anya-e1102n0:282_24: ābhassarāti tayopi dutiyajjhānabhūmi udakaṃ gaṇhāti. Tattha tayopi brahmaloke vilīyāpetvā
anya-e1102n0:282_25: subha kiṇhe āhacca tiṭṭhati yāva aṇumattaṃ saṅkhāragataṃ atthi, tāva na vūpasamati.
anya-e1102n0:282_26: Udakānugataṃ pana sabbasaṅkhāragataṃ abhibhavitvā sahasā vūpasamati antaradhānaṃ
anya-e1102n0:282_27: gacchati, heṭṭhā ākāsena saha upari ākāso eko hoti mahandhakāroti sabbaṃ vuttasadisameva.
anya-e1102n0:282_28: Kevalaṃ panidha otiṇṇotiṇṇe udake ābhassarabrahmalokaṃ ādiṃ katvā lokapātubhāvo veditabbo.
anya-e1102n0:282_29: Subhakiṇhato cavitvā ābhassaraṭṭhānādīsu sattā nibbattanti etthāpi kappavināsakamahāmeghato
anya-e1102n0:282_30: yāva kappavināsakaudakaparicchedo saṃvaṭṭo nāma paṭhamamasaṅkhyeyyakappo nāmāti cattāriasaṅkhyeyyakappāni
anya-e1102n0:282_31: vuttasadisāni evaṃ satta mahākappāni sattakkhattuṃ agginā vilīyitvā aṭṭhame mahākappe
anya-e1102n0:282_32: udakenapi vināso ca saṇṭhahanañca veditabbaṃ, evaṃ sattasattamahākappo sattasattavāraṃ
anya-e1102n0:282_33: agginā vilīyitvā aṭṭhame aṭṭhame vāre āpena vilīyitvā anukkamena tesaṭṭhimahākappāni
anya-e1102n0:282_34: paripuṇṇāni tadā āpavāraṃ paṭibāhitvā catusaṭṭhime mahākappe vātena vinassati tadā
anya-e1102n0:282_35: ādito kappavināsakamahāvāto vuṭṭhahitvāti sabbaṃ pubbe vuttanayameva. Ayaṃ pana viseso
anya-e1102n0:282_36: yathā agginā vināsakappe dutiyasūriyo, evamidhāpi kappavināsanatthaṃ vāto samuṭṭhāti
anya-e1102n0:282_37: so paṭhamaṃ sukhumarajaṃ uṭṭhāpeti, tato thūlarajaṃ saṇharajaṃ sukhumavālikaṃ sakkharapāsāṇādayoti
anya-e1102n0:282_38: yāva kūṭāgāramatte pāsāṇepi visamaṭṭhāne ṭhitamahārukkheca uṭṭhāpeti, te pathavito
anya-e1102n0:282_39: nabhamuggatā na puna patanti, tattheva cuṇṇavicuṇṇā hutvā abhāvaṃ gacchanti. Yathānukkamena
anya-e1102n0:282_40: heṭṭhā mahāpathaviyā vāto samuṭṭhahitvā pathaviṃ parivattetvā uddhaṃmūlaṃ katvā ākāse
anya-e1102n0:282_42: bhijjitvā te vegakkhittā ākāseyeva cuṇṇavicuṇṇā hutvā abhāvaṃ gacchanti cakkavāḷapabbatampi
anya-e1102n0:282_43: vāto ukkhipitvā ākāse khipati te aññamaññaṃ ghaṭṭayantā cuṇṇavicuṇṇā hutvā vinassanti
anya-e1102n0:282_44: eteneva bhūmaṭṭhakavimānāni ākāsaṭṭhakavimānāni ca vināsento chakāmāvacaradevaloke
anya-e1102n0:282_45: nāsetvā koṭisatasahassacakkavāḷāni vināseti. Tattha cakkavāḷā cakkavāḷehi, himavantā
anya-e1102n0:282_46: himavantehi, sinerū sinerūhi aññamaññaṃ samāgantvā cuṇṇavicuṇṇā hutvā vinassanti.
anya-e1102n0:282_47: Pathavito yāva parittasubhā, appamāṇasubhā, subhaṇiṇhāti tayopi tatiyajjhānabhūmī
anya-e1102n0:282_48: vāto gaṇhāti tattha tayopi brahmaloke vināsetvā vehapphalaṃ āhacca aṭṭhāsi. Evaṃ
anya-e1102n0:282_49: sabbaṃ saṅkhāragataṃ vināsetvā sayaṃ vinassati, heṭṭhā ākāsena saha upari ākāso eko
anya-e1102n0:282_50: hoti mahandhakāroti sabbaṃ vuttasadisaṃ. Idha pana subhakiṇhabrahmalokaṃ ādiṃ katvā
anya-e1102n0:282_51: loko pātubhavati. Vehapphalato cavitvā subhakiṇhādīsu sattā nibbattanti, tatthakappavinā
anya-e1102n0:282_52: sakamahāmeghato yāva kappavināsakavātupacchedo, idaṃ saṃvaṭṭo nāma, paṭhamamasaṅkhyeyyaṃ
anya-e1102n0:282_53: nāmāti cattāri asaṅkhyeyyakappāni eko mahākappo nāmāti sabbaṃ tejosaṃvaṭṭe vuttanayameva.
anya-e1102n0:284: “Satta satta gginā vārā, aṭṭhame aṭṭhame dakā;
anya-e1102n0:285: Catusaṭṭhi yadā puṇṇā, eko vāyuvaro siyā.
anya-e1102n0:288_0: Tasmā tiṇṇampi paṭhamajjhānatalānaṃ ekakappepi avināsābhāvato sakalakappe tesaṃ sambhavo
anya-e1102n0:288_1: natthīti asaṅkhyeyya kappavasena tesaṃ āyuparicchedo daṭṭhabbo. Dutiyajjhānatalato
anya-e1102n0:288_2: paṭṭhāya pana paripuṇṇamahākappavasena āyuparicchedo daṭṭhabbo, na asaṅkhyeyyakappavasena.
anya-e1102n0:288_3: Yadi dutiyajjhānatalato paṭṭhāya paripuṇṇamahākappavasena āyuparicchedo siyā, kathaṃ
anya-e1102n0:288_4: ābhassarādīsu brahmūnaṃ aṭṭhamahākappādivasena āyu paripuṇṇaṃ siyā, tathā hi paṭhamajjhānatalaṃ
anya-e1102n0:288_5: sattasu vāresu agginā vinassati. Aṭṭhame vāre yāva ābhassarā udakena vinassati puna
anya-e1102n0:288_6: sattavāresu agginā paṭhamajjhānatalaṃ, puna aṭṭhamevāre udakena dutiyajjhānatalaṃ
anya-e1102n0:288_7: vinassatīti evaṃ aṭṭhame vāre āpavāraṃ paṭibāhitvā yāva subhakiṇhā vātena vinassati
anya-e1102n0:288_8: evaṃ catusaṭṭhi paripuṇṇā hotīti saccaṃ, heṭṭhāvivaṭṭaṭṭhāyī asaṅkhyeyyakappavasena
anya-e1102n0:288_9: eko satta mahākappāni cāti aṭṭha kappāni ābhassarabrahmūnaṃ āyuppamāṇaṃ hoti. Catusaṭṭhikappesupi
anya-e1102n0:288_10: vivaṭṭaṭṭhāyīasaṅkhyeyyakappavasena eko te saṭṭhimahākappāni cāti catusaṭṭhikappāni
anya-e1102n0:288_11: subhakiṇhānaṃ brahmūnaṃ āyuppamāṇaṃ hoti tena vuttaṃ porāṇehi.
anya-e1102n0:289: Satta satta’gginā vārā, aṭṭhame aṭṭhame dakā;
anya-e1102n0:290: Catusaṭṭhi yadā puṇṇā, eko vāyuvaro siyā’ti.
anya-e1102n0:294_1: vuttabhāvañca samatalabhāvepi seṭṭhabhūmittā paṭṭhānavasena vuttabhāvañca amaññitvā
anya-e1102n0:295: “Pañcabhūmi naṭṭhā aggi, aṭṭha bhūmi naṭṭhā dakā;
anya-e1102n0:296: Navabhūmi naṭṭhā vātā, lokanaṭṭhā tadā siyuṃ.
anya-e1102n0:297: Paṭhame aggi dvattiṃsa, dutiye ādi soḷasa;
anya-e1102n0:298: Dutiyabhūme majjhe aṭṭhamaṃ, taṃ chappaññāsa vārakaṃ.
anya-e1102n0:301_0: Vadanti tesaṃ vāde ābhassarato heṭṭhā pañcabhūmi agginaṭṭhā, subhakiṇhato heṭṭhā
anya-e1102n0:301_1: aṭṭhabhūmi udakanaṭṭhāti vadanti. Samataladīpanatthaṃ sandehacchedanatthaṃ evaṃ gahitāti
anya-e1102n0:301_2: ekabhavapariyosānaṃ sandhāya paṭisandhibhavañcāti ādi vuttanti. Imissāpi atthaṃ duggahitena
anya-e1102n0:301_3: gahetvā paṭisandhibhavaṅgavasena sadisabhāvameva sandhāya vuttanti parikappenti so
anya-e1102n0:301_4: ayuttarūpo viya dissati ativiya micchāgāho ca hoti aggaññasuttavisuddhimaggādīhi
anya-e1102n0:301_5: virujjhanato saṃvaṭṭasīmāpi viruddhā tattha paṭhamajjhānatalaṃ upādāya agginā, dutiyajjhānatalaṃ
anya-e1102n0:301_6: upādāya udakena, catutthajjhānatalaṃ upādāya vātena vinassatīti vuttavacanenāpi virujjhateva
anya-e1102n0:301_8: attho gahetabbo. Aññathā “upari pabbatā devo vassatī”ti ettha viya ābhassarasubhakiṇhavehapphalānaṃ
anya-e1102n0:301_9: tena tena saṃvaṭṭena vināsopi na bhaveyya. Ayaṃ lokavipattiparicchedo. Evaṃ buddho
anya-e1102n0:301_10: ca dullabho loke ti imassa attho vuttoyeva.
anya-e1102n0:305_0: Idāni “saddhammasavanampi cāti imassa saṃvaṇṇanākkamo sampatto tattha saddhammasavanampi
anya-e1102n0:305_1: ca loke dullabhameva tathā hi saddhammo nāma tividho hoti. Pariyattisaddhammo, paṭipattisaddhammo,
anya-e1102n0:305_2: paṭivedhasaddhammoti. Tattha pariyattisaddhammo nāma tepiṭakaṃ buddhavacanaṃ. Paṭipattisaddhammo
anya-e1102n0:305_3: nāma terasadhutaṅgāni asīti khandhakavattādayo abhisamācāravattādīni. Paṭivedhasaddhammo
anya-e1102n0:305_4: nāma catusaccappaṭivedho. Tesu pariyattisaddhammo dvinnaṃ saddhammānaṃ pubbaṅgamoyeva
anya-e1102n0:305_5: padaṭṭhānañca. Kasmā taṃmūlakattā tathā hi pariyattiyā asati paṭivedho nāma natthi.
anya-e1102n0:305_6: Pariyattiyā antarahitāya paṭipatti, paṭipattiyā antarahitāya adhigamo antaradhāyati.
anya-e1102n0:305_7: Kiṃ kāraṇā ayañhi pariyatti paṭipattiyā paccayo hoti. Paṭipattiadhigamassāpi pariyattiyeva
anya-e1102n0:305_8: pamāṇaṃ. Tattha paṭivedho ca paṭipatti ca hotipi nahotipi. Ekasmiñhi kāle paṭivedhadharā
anya-e1102n0:305_9: bhikkhū bahū honti, “esa bhikkhu puthujjano”ti aṅguliṃ paharitvā dassetabbo hoti.
anya-e1102n0:305_10: Imasmiṃ yeva dīpe ekavāraṃ puthujjanabhikkhunāma nāhosi. Paṭipattipūrakāpi kadāci
anya-e1102n0:305_11: bahū honti kadāci appā. Iti paṭivedho ca paṭipatti ca hotipi na hotipi. Sāsanassa
anya-e1102n0:305_12: ṭhitiyā pana pariyattiyeva pamāṇaṃ paṇḍito hi tepiṭakaṃ sutvā dvepi pūreti, yathā
anya-e1102n0:305_13: amhākaṃ bodhisatto āḷārassa santike pañca abhiññā satta ca samāpattiyo nibbattetvā
anya-e1102n0:305_14: nevasaññānāsaññāyatana samāpattiyā parikammaṃ pucchi. So “na jānāmī”ti āha. Tato
anya-e1102n0:305_15: udakassa santikaṃ gantvā adhigatavisesaṃ saṃsanditvā nevasaññānāsaññāyatanassa parikammaṃ
anya-e1102n0:305_16: pucchi. So ācikkhi, tassa vacanasamanantarameva mahāsatto taṃ sampādesi evameva paññavā
anya-e1102n0:305_17: bhikkhu pariyattiṃ sutvā dvepi pūreti tasmā pariyattiyā ṭhitāya sāsanaṃ ṭhitaṃ hoti
anya-e1102n0:305_18: yathā mahātaḷākassa pāḷiyā thirāya udakaṃ na ṭhassatīti na vattabbaṃ udake sati padumādīni
anya-e1102n0:305_19: pupphāni na pupphissantīti na vattabbaṃ evameva mahātaḷākassa thirapāḷisadise tepiṭake
anya-e1102n0:305_20: buddhavacane sati mahātaḷāke udakasadisā paṭipattipūrakā kulaputtā natthīti na vattabbaṃ.
anya-e1102n0:305_21: Tesu sati mahātaḷākesu padumādīni pupphāni viya sotāpannādayo ariyapuggalā natthīti
anya-e1102n0:305_22: na vattabbaṃ, ekantato pariyattiyeva pamāṇaṃ pariyattiyā antarahitāya paṭipattipaṭivedhānaṃ
anya-e1102n0:305_23: antaradhānato. Tattha pariyattināma tepiṭakaṃ buddhavacanaṃ sāṭṭhakathā pāḷiyāva
anya-e1102n0:305_24: sā tiṭṭhati, tāva pariyatti paripuṇṇā hoti. Gacchante kāle kaliyugarājāno adhammikā
anya-e1102n0:305_25: honti tesu adhammikesu rājāmaccādayo adhammikā honti tathā raṭṭhajanapadavāsinopi
anya-e1102n0:305_26: adhammikā etesaṃ adhammikatāya na devo sammā vassati, tato sassāni na sampajjanti.
anya-e1102n0:305_27: Tesu sampajjantesu paccayadāyakā bhikkhusaṅghassa paccaye dātuṃ na sakkonti. Bhikkhū
anya-e1102n0:305_28: paccayehi kilamantā antevāsike saṅgahetuṃ na sakkonti. Gacchante gacchante kāle pariyatti
anya-e1102n0:305_29: parihāyati, atthavasena dhāretuṃ na sakkonti, pāḷivaseneva dhārenti. Tato kāle gacchante
anya-e1102n0:305_30: pāḷimpi sakalaṃ dhāretuṃ na sakkonti paṭhamaṃ abhidhammapiṭakaṃ parihāyati. Parihāyamānaṃ
anya-e1102n0:305_31: matthakato paṭṭhāya pariyatti hāyati paṭhamañhi mahāpakaraṇaṃ parihāyati. Tasmiṃ
anya-e1102n0:305_32: parihāyamāne yamakaṃ, kathāvatthu, puggalapaññatti, dhātukathā, vibhaṅgo, dhammasaṅgahoti
anya-e1102n0:305_33: evaṃ abhidhammapiṭake parihīne matthakato paṭṭhāya suttantapiṭakaṃ parihāyati. Paṭhamañhi
anya-e1102n0:305_34: aṅguttaranikāyo parihāyati. Tasmimpi paṭhamaṃ ekādasanipāto…pe… tato ekanipātoti
anya-e1102n0:305_35: evaṃ aṅguttare parihīne matthakato paṭṭhāya saṃyuttanikāyo parihāyati, paṭhamaṃ mahāvaggo
anya-e1102n0:305_36: parihāyati. Tato paṭṭhāya saḷāyatanavaggo, khandhavaggo, nidānavaggo, sagāthāvaggoti
anya-e1102n0:305_37: evaṃ saṃyuttanikāye parihīne matthakato paṭṭhāya majjhimanikāyo parihāyati paṭhamañhi
anya-e1102n0:305_38: uparipaṇṇāsako parihāyati. Tato majjhimapaṇṇāsako, tato mūlapaṇṇāsakoti evaṃ majjhimanikāye
anya-e1102n0:305_39: parihīne matthakato paṭṭhāya dīghanikāyo parihāyati, paṭhamañhi pāthiyavaggo parihāyati
anya-e1102n0:305_40: tato mahāvaggo, tato khandhakavaggoti dīghanikāye parihīne suttantapiṭakaṃ parihīnaṃ
anya-e1102n0:305_41: nāma hoti. Vinayapiṭakena saddhiṃ jātakameva dhārenti. Vinayapiṭakaṃ lajjino dhārenti.
anya-e1102n0:305_42: Lābhakāmā pana suttante kathitepi sallakkhentā natthīti jātakameva dhārenti. Gacchante
anya-e1102n0:305_43: kāle jātakampi dhāretuṃ na sakkonti. Atha nesaṃ paṭhamaṃ vessantarajātakaṃ parihāyati.
anya-e1102n0:305_44: Tato paṭilomakkamena puṇṇakajākatakaṃ, mahānāradakassapajātakaṃ parihāyati. Vinayapiṭakameva
anya-e1102n0:305_45: dhārenti. Gacchante kāle tampi matthakato parihāyati paṭhamañhi parivāro parihāyati,
anya-e1102n0:305_46: tato khandhako bhikkhunīvibhaṅgo mahāvibhaṅgoti anukkamena uposathakkhandhakamattameva
anya-e1102n0:305_47: dhārenti, tadā pariyatti anantarahitāva hoti. Yāva pana manussesu catuppadikagāthāpi
anya-e1102n0:305_48: pavattati, tāva pariyatti anantarahitāva hoti. Yadā saddho pasanno rājā hatthikkhandhe
anya-e1102n0:305_49: suvaṇṇacaṅkoṭakamhi sahassatthavikaṃ ṭhapāpetvā “buddhehi kathitaṃ catuppadikaṃ gāthaṃ
anya-e1102n0:305_50: jānanto imaṃ sahassaṃ gaṇhatū”ti nagare bheriṃ carāpetvā gaṇhakaṃ alabhitvā ekavāraṃ
anya-e1102n0:305_51: carāpite na suṇantāpi honti asuṇantāpi, yāva tatiyaṃ carāpetvā gaṇhakaṃ alabhitvā
anya-e1102n0:305_52: rājapurisā sahassatthavikaṃ puna rājakulaṃ pavesenti, tadā pariyattiantarahitā nāma
anya-e1102n0:305_53: hoti. Evaṃ pariyattiyā antarahitāya paṭipattipi paṭivedhopi antarahitova hoti. Saddhammasavanassa
anya-e1102n0:305_54: dullabhabhāvo dhammasoṇḍakavatthunā dīpetabbo amhākaṃ kira sammāsambuddho kassapasammāsambuddhassa
anya-e1102n0:305_55: dhammarājassa sāsanantaradhānato nacireneva kālena bārāṇasirañño putto dhammasoṇḍakarājakumāro
anya-e1102n0:305_56: hutvā pituaccayena rajje patiṭṭhāya kassapadasabalena desitaṃ dhammaṃ sotukāmo hutvā
anya-e1102n0:305_57: māsamattaṃ rajjaṃ katvā amhākaṃ sammāsambuddho imasmiṃ yeva bhaddakappe rajjaṃ kāretvā
anya-e1102n0:305_58: devanagarasadise bārāṇasinagare cakkavattirajjasadisaṃ rajjaṃ karonto evaṃ cintesi…
anya-e1102n0:305_59: “mayhaṃ evarūpaṃ rajjaṃ kiṃ vilāsaṃ rajjānubhāvaṃ saddhammaviyogena, divākaravirahito
anya-e1102n0:305_60: ākāso viya, sasaṅkavirahitaratti viya, dāṭhāvirahitagajo viya, velantavirahitamahāsamuddo
anya-e1102n0:305_61: viya cakkhuvirahita susajjitavadanaṃ viya, sugandhavirahitapārichattapupphaṃ viya,
anya-e1102n0:305_62: catuakkharaniyamitadhammadesanāviyogena mayhaṃ idaṃ rajjaṃ na sobhatī”ti cintetvā
anya-e1102n0:305_63: suvaṇṇacaṅkoṭakena sahassatthavikaṃ bhaṇḍakaṃ susajjitaṃ maṅgalahatthikumbhe ṭhapetvā
anya-e1102n0:305_64: bārāṇasīnagare mahāvīthiyaṃ bheriṃ carāpeti “ekapadikaṃ vā dvipadikaṃ vā tipadikaṃ
anya-e1102n0:305_65: vā catuppadikaṃ vā dhammapadaṃ jānantassa dammī”ti evaṃ bheriṃ carāpetvā dhammajānanakaṃ
anya-e1102n0:305_66: alabhitvā punappunaṃ dvisahassaṃ tisahassaṃ yāva satasahassaṃ koṭi dve sahassakoṭi,
anya-e1102n0:305_68: alabhitvā attano suvaṇṇapīṭhakaṃ setacchattaṃ cajitvāpi dhammadesakaṃ alabhitvā rajjasiriṃ
anya-e1102n0:305_69: pahāya attānaṃ cajitvā “dhammadesakassa dāso hutvāpi dhammaṃ sossāmī”ti vatvā evampi
anya-e1102n0:305_70: dhamma desakaṃ alabhitvā vippaṭisārī hutvā “kiṃ me saddhammaviyogena rajjenāti amaccānaṃ
anya-e1102n0:305_71: rajjaṃ niyyātetvā saddhammagavesako hutvā dhammasoṇḍakamahārājā mahāvanaṃ pāvisi
anya-e1102n0:305_73: vejayantapāsādo saheva kiṇṇikāya kampo ahosi, paṇḍukambalasilāsanaṃ uṇhākāraṃ ahosi.
anya-e1102n0:305_74: Sakkodevarājā kenakāraṇena paṇḍukambalasilāsanaṃ uṇhākāraṃ ahosī”ti cintetvā attano
anya-e1102n0:305_75: sahassanettena devamanussesu vitthāretvā olokento dhammagavesako hutvā vanaṃ paviṭṭhaṃ
anya-e1102n0:305_76: dhammasoṇḍakamahārājānaṃ disvā cintesi… “ajja me attānampi jahāya rakkhasavesaṃ māpetvā
anya-e1102n0:305_77: etaṃ aniccaparidīpanaṃ jātijarābyādhimaraṇaṃ sakalasarīre dosaṃ dassetvā dhammaṃ
anya-e1102n0:305_78: desetvā etaṃ sakarajjeyeva patiṭṭhāpetabba”nti cintetvā sakko devarājā yakkhasarūpaṃ
anya-e1102n0:305_79: māpetvā bodhisattassa abhimukho avidūre attānaṃ dassesi. Taṃ disvā dhammasoṇḍakamahārājā
anya-e1102n0:305_80: evaṃ cintesi… “evaṃrūpo nāma rakkhaso dhammaṃ jāneyyā”ti, cintetvā avidūre ṭhāne
anya-e1102n0:305_81: ṭhatvā pucchāmīti rakkhasena saddhiṃ sallapanto āha “sāmipuññadevarāja imasmiṃ pana
anya-e1102n0:305_82: vanaghane vasanakadevarājā kiṃ nukho dhammaṃ jānāsī”ti, devatā “mahārāja dhammaṃ
anya-e1102n0:305_83: jānāmī”ti āha. “Yadi dhammaṃ jānāsi, mayhaṃ dhammakathaṃ kathethā”ti āha. “Ahaṃ tuyhaṃ
anya-e1102n0:305_84: dhammaṃ kathessāmi, tvaṃ mayhaṃ kīdisaṃ dhammakathikassa sakkāraṃ karissasī”ti āha.
anya-e1102n0:305_85: “Evaṃ sante mayhaṃ dhammaṃ kathetvā pacchā mayhaṃ sarīre maṃsaṃ khādissasī”ti āha.
anya-e1102n0:305_86: “Ahaṃ mahārāja chāto hutvā dhammaṃ kathetuṃ na sakkomī”ti āha. “Yadi tumhe paṭhamaṃ
anya-e1102n0:305_87: maṃsaṃ khādatha, dhammaṃ ko suṇissatī”ti āha. Puna so rakkhaso “nāhaṃ dhammaṃ desetuṃ
anya-e1102n0:305_88: sakkomī”ti. Puna rājā “mayhaṃ dhammapaṭilābhañca tumhākaṃ maṃsapaṭilābhañca tumhe
anya-e1102n0:305_89: jānitvā mayhaṃ dhammaṃ desethā”ti āha. Atha sakko devarājā “sādhu hothā”ti vatvā
anya-e1102n0:305_90: avidūre ṭhāne ubbedhena tigāvutamattaṃ mahantaṃ añjanapabbataṃ māpetvā evamāha… “sace
anya-e1102n0:305_91: mahārāja imaṃ pabbatamuddhaniṃ ārūyha ākāsā uppatitvā tvaṃ mama mukhe patissasi,
anya-e1102n0:305_92: ahaṃ te ākāsagatakāle dhammaṃ desessāmi, evaṃ sante tuyhañca dhammappalābho mayhañca
anya-e1102n0:305_93: maṃsapaṭilābho bhavissatī”ti āha. Tassa kathaṃ sutvā dhammasoṇḍakamahārājā “anamatagge
anya-e1102n0:305_94: saṃsāre puriso hutvā adhammasamaṅgī hutvā adhammasseva atthāya pāṇātipāto adinnādāno
anya-e1102n0:305_95: kāmesumicchācāro sūkariko orabbhiko sākuṇi ko coro paradāriko taṃ gahetvā sīsacchinnānaṃ
anya-e1102n0:305_96: lohitaṃ catūsu mahāsamuddesu udakatopi bahutaraṃ mātāpituādīnampi manāpānaṃ atthāya
anya-e1102n0:305_97: rodantānaṃ assu catūsumahāsamuddesu udakatopi bahutaraṃ, imaṃ pana sarīraṃ dhammassa
anya-e1102n0:305_98: atthāya vikkiṇāmi taṃ mahapphalañca manāpañcā”ti cintetvā “sādhu mārisa evaṃ karomī”ti
anya-e1102n0:305_99: pabbataṃ ārūyha pabbatagge ṭhito “mama rajjena saddhiṃ mayhaṃ sajīvasarīraṃ saddhammassatthāya
anya-e1102n0:305_100: dassāmī”ti somanasso hutvā “dhammaṃ kathethā”ti saddhammatthāya jīvitaṃ pariccajitvā
anya-e1102n0:305_101: ākāsato uppatitvā dhammaṃ kathethāti āha. Atha sakko devarājā sakattabhāvena sabbālaṅkārehi
anya-e1102n0:305_102: paṭimaṇḍito ativiya sotuṃ somanasso ākāsato patantaṃ dibbaphassena parāmasanto urena
anya-e1102n0:305_103: paṭiggaṇhitvā devalokaṃ netvā paṇḍukambalasilāsane nisīdāpetvā mālāgandhādīhi pūjetvā
anya-e1102n0:308_0: Evaṃ sakko dhammasoṇḍakamahārājassa dhammaṃ desetvā devalokasampattiṃ dassetvā devalokato
anya-e1102n0:308_1: ānetvā sakarajje patiṭṭhāpetvā appamādena ovaditvā devalokameva agamāsi evaṃ saddhammasavanassāpi
anya-e1102n0:308_2: dullabhabhāvo veditabbo. Evaṃ pariyattiantaradhānena paṭipatti paṭivedhāpi antaradhāyanti.
anya-e1102n0:308_3: Ettha ca tīṇi parinibbānāni veditabbāni katamāni tīṇi parinibbānāni. Kilesaparinibbānaṃ,
anya-e1102n0:308_5: hoti, bhagavā hi bodhimaṇḍeyeva vīriyapādehi sīlapathaviyaṃ patiṭṭhāya saddhāhatthena
anya-e1102n0:308_11: saṅkhepato vā pañca kilesaabhisaṅkhārakhandhamaccudevaputtamāre asesato hatā vihatā
anya-e1102n0:308_12: anabhāvaṃkatā tasmā sabbepi kilesā bodhimaṇḍeyeva nibbānaṃ nirodhaṃ gacchantīti kilesanibbānaṃ
anya-e1102n0:308_13: bodhimaṇḍeyeva hoti ettha ca bodhīti arahattamaggaññāṇaṃ adhippetaṃ tathā hi sabbesampi
anya-e1102n0:308_14: buddhapaccekabuddhaariyasāvakānaṃ arahattamaggakkhaṇeyeva sabbepi kilesā asesaṃ nirodhaṃ
anya-e1102n0:308_15: nibbānaṃ gacchanti tepi buddhā ugghaṭitaviññūvibhajjitaññūneyyavasena tividhā honti
anya-e1102n0:310: Tatiyo neyyo nāmena, bodhisatto tidhā mato.
anya-e1102n0:313: Mato neyyo saddhādhiko nāma, bodhisattā ime tayo;
anya-e1102n0:317: Aṭṭhame ca asaṅkhyeyye, kappe ca satasahasse;
anya-e1102n0:320: Neyyo tu bodhisatto ca, soḷase asaṅkhyeyye.
anya-e1102n0:323_1: asaṅkhyeyyāni kappasatasahassañca, majjhimaparicchedena aṭṭha asaṅkhyeyyāni kappasatasahassañca,
anya-e1102n0:323_3: veditabbāti vuttaṃ tesu paññādhiko cattāri asaṅkhyeyyāni kappasatasahassañca, saddhādhiko
anya-e1102n0:323_5: veditabbaṃ. Tattha paññādhiko yonigativiññāṇaṭṭhitisattāvāsesu saṃsarantopi paññābahullavasena
anya-e1102n0:323_6: sampannajjhāsaya sambhavato khippaññeva tassa sambodhi. Saddhādhiko pana mandapaññattā
anya-e1102n0:323_7: assaddahitabbepi saddahati, tasmā tassa mandaññeva sambodhi. Vīriyādhiko pana ubhayamando
anya-e1102n0:323_8: assaddahitabbampi saddahati, akattabbampi karoti, rājā passenadīkosalo yathā so hi
anya-e1102n0:323_9: sabbaññubuddhe dharamāneyeva agamanīyampi paradāraṃ gantuṃ cittaṃ uppādetvā paraṃ
anya-e1102n0:323_10: jīvitā voropetuṃ āraddho nerayikānaṃ viravantānaṃ du-sa-na-soti saddampi sutvā ativimūḷho
anya-e1102n0:323_11: sabbaññubuddhaṃ ṭhapetvā micchādiṭṭhibrāhmaṇaṃ pucchitvā tassa vacanena sabbajanānaṃ
anya-e1102n0:323_12: yaññatthāya dukkhaṃ uppādesi ko panavādo anuppanne buddhe, tathā hi esa kassapabhagavato
anya-e1102n0:323_13: sāsanantaradhānena andhabhūte loke bārāṇasiyaṃ rājā hutvāpi nigrodharukkhadevatāya
anya-e1102n0:323_14: yaññatthāya ekasatarājāno mahesīhi saddhiṃ māretuṃ āraddho. Evaṃ vīriyādhiko ubhayamando,
anya-e1102n0:323_15: tasmā tassa sambodhi atimandoti evaṃ paññādhikasaddhādhikavīriyādhikavasena kālassāpi
anya-e1102n0:323_16: rassadīghabhāvo veditabboti. Pacchimanayoeva pasaṃsitabboti ayamettha amhākaṃ attanomati.
anya-e1102n0:323_17: Khandhaparinibbānaṃ pana kusinārāya upavattane mallānaṃ sālavane yamakasālānamantare
anya-e1102n0:323_19: mahāvipākacittena abyākatena carimakaṃ katvā katthaci bhave paṭisandhiviññāṇassa
anya-e1102n0:323_20: anantarapaccayo hutvā kammataṇhākilesehi anupādāno sabbupadhipaṭinissaggo upādinnakakkhandhapariccāgo
anya-e1102n0:323_21: hotīti veditabbaṃ. Vitthāro pana dīghanikāye mahāvagge mahāparinibbānasuttavaṇṇanāyaṃ
anya-e1102n0:323_22: oloketabbo. Tattha videsaṃ gacchanto puriso sabbaṃ ñātijanaṃ āliṅgetvā sīse cumbitvā
anya-e1102n0:323_23: gacchati viya bhagavāpi nibbānapuraṃ pavisanto sabbepi catuvīsatikoṭisatasahassasamāpattiyo
anya-e1102n0:323_24: anavasesaṃ samāpajjitvā yāva saññāvedayitaṃ, tatopi vuṭṭhāya yāva nevasaññānāsaññāyatanaṃ
anya-e1102n0:323_25: samāpajjitvā vuṭṭhāya jhānaṅgāni paccavekkhitvā bhavaṅgacittena abyākatena dukkhasaccena
anya-e1102n0:323_26: parinibbāyi. Pāḷiyaṃ pana “catutthajjhānā vuṭṭhahitvā samanantarā bhagavā parinibbāyī”ti
anya-e1102n0:323_27: vuttaṃ tattha dve samanantarā jhānasamanantarā, paccavekkhaṇasamanantarāti. Tattha
anya-e1102n0:323_28: jhānā vuṭṭhāya bhavaṅgaṃ otiṇṇassa tattheva parinibbānaṃ jhānasamanantaraṃ nāma.
anya-e1102n0:323_29: Jhānā vuṭṭhahitvā puna jhānaṅgāni paccavekkhitvā bhavaṅgaṃ otiṇṇassa tattheva parinibbānaṃ
anya-e1102n0:323_30: paccavekkhaṇasamanantaraṃ nāma. Bhagavā pana jhānasamanantarā apari nibbāyittā paccavekkhaṇasamanantarameva
anya-e1102n0:323_31: parinibbāyīti veditabbaṃ, tenevāha “bhagavā pana jhānaṃ samāpajjitvā jhānā vuṭṭhāya
anya-e1102n0:323_32: jhānaṅgāni paccavekkhitvā bhavaṅgacittena abyākatena dukkhasaccena parinibbāyī”ti.
anya-e1102n0:323_33: Ettha bhagavato parinibbānacittassa kiṃ ārammaṇaṃ kammaṃ vā hoti, udāhu kammanimittagatinimittāni,
anya-e1102n0:328_0: Imissāgāthāya “yaṃ yo muni anejo santi nibbānaṃ ārabbha kālaṃ akarī”ti yojetvā bhagavato
anya-e1102n0:328_2: anārahattā “nibbānaṃ gotrabhussa vodānassa maggassa ārammaṇapaccayenapaccayo, nibbānaṃ
anya-e1102n0:328_3: phalassa āvajjanāyā”ti paṭṭhānapāḷiyā javanaāvajjanānameva adhippetattā tasmā ettha
anya-e1102n0:328_4: “yaṃ yo muni phalasamāpattiyā anejo anejasaṅkhāto taṇhārahito santiṃ nibbānaṃ ārabbha
anya-e1102n0:328_5: ārammaṇaṃ katvā kālaṃ asītivassaparimāṇaṃ akari atikkamī”ti yojanā kātabbā. Keci
anya-e1102n0:328_6: pana evaṃ vadanti… “katthaci pana anuppajjamānassa khīṇāsavassa yathopaṭṭhitaṃ nāmarūpadhammādikameva
anya-e1102n0:328_7: cutipariyosānānaṃ gocarabhāvaṃ gacchati, na kamma-kammanimittādayo”ti vuttattā kammanittagatinimittāni
anya-e1102n0:328_8: arahato cuticittassa ārammaṇabhāvaṃ na gacchantīti tampi ayuttameva ayañhetthattho
anya-e1102n0:328_9: katthaci pana bhave anuppajjamānassa khīṇāsavassa arahato yathā yathā yena yena pakārena
anya-e1102n0:328_11: gacchati, puna bhavābhinibbattiyā abhāvato. Kiṃ kāraṇaṃ bhūtāni kammakammanimittagatinimittāni
anya-e1102n0:328_12: gocarabhāvaṃ na gacchantīti. Cuticittassa pana paṭisandhicittena gahitaṃ atītārammaṇameva
anya-e1102n0:328_13: gocarabhāvaṃ gacchati. “Nāmarūpādikamevā ti ettha nāma”nti cittacetasikanibbānaṃ
anya-e1102n0:328_14: rūpanti aṭṭhārasavidhaṃ rūpaṃ saṅgaṇhāti. Nāmañca rūpañca nāmarūpā. Nāmarūpā ca te
anya-e1102n0:328_15: dhammā ceti tathā. Te ādi yesaṃ teti nāmarūpadhammādi tameva nāmarūpadhammādikaṃ.
anya-e1102n0:328_16: Ādisaddena cha paññattiyo saṅgaṇhāti, tena nibbānampi arahato maraṇāsannakāle kriyajavanassapi
anya-e1102n0:328_17: ārammaṇabhāvo bhaveyyāti amhākaṃ khanti vīmaṃsitvā pana gahetabbaṃ. Bhagavato nibbānacittassa
anya-e1102n0:328_18: pana tusitapurato cavitvā sirīmahāmāyāya kucchimhi vasitapaṭisandhicittena gahitārammaṇameva
anya-e1102n0:328_19: ārammaṇaṃ hotīti daṭṭhabbaṃ tañca kho gatinimittameva, na kammakammanimittāni. Yuttitopi
anya-e1102n0:328_20: āgamatopi gatinimittameva yujjati tathā hi tusitapureyeva setaketudevaputto hutvā
anya-e1102n0:328_22: ṭhatvā pariyosāne pañca pubbanimittāni disvā suddhāvāse arahantabrahmunā dasahi cakkavāḷasahassehi
anya-e1102n0:331_0: Yāciyamāno “kālaṃ dīpañca desañca, kulaṃ mātarameva cā”ti vuttāni pañca mahāvilokanāni
anya-e1102n0:331_1: viloketvā tusitapurato cavitvā āsāḷhīpuṇṇamāyaṃ uttarāsāḷhanakkhatteneva saddhiṃ
anya-e1102n0:331_3: sadisena mahāvipākacittena paṭisandhiṃ aggahesi. Tadārammaṇāsannavīthito pubbabhāge
anya-e1102n0:331_4: ālokitāni kāladīpadesakulamātaravasena imāni pañca paṭisandhicittassa gatinimittārammaṇabhāvena
anya-e1102n0:331_5: gocarabhāvaṃ gacchantīti amhākaṃ khanti tanninnatappoṇatappabbhāravasena bāhullappavattito
anya-e1102n0:331_7: abhimukhībhūtaṃ bhavantare paṭisandhijanakaṃ kammaṃ vā taṃ kammakaraṇakāle rūpādikamupaladdhapubbamupakaraṇabhūtañca
anya-e1102n0:331_8: kammanimittaṃ vā anantaramuppajjamānabhave upalabhitabbaṃ upabhogabhūtaṃ gatinimittaṃ
anya-e1102n0:331_9: vā kammabalena channaṃ dvārānamaññatarasmiṃ paccupaṭṭhāsi, tato paraṃ tameva tathopaṭṭhitamālambaṇaṃ
anya-e1102n0:331_10: ārabbha vipaccamānakakammānurūpaṃ parisuddhaṃ vā, upakkiliṭṭhaṃ vā upapajjitabbabhavānurūpaṃ
anya-e1102n0:331_11: tatthoṇataṃva cittasantānamabhiṇhaṃ pavattati bāhullena. Tameva vā pana janakabhūtaṃ
anya-e1102n0:331_12: kammaṃ abhinavakaraṇavasena dvārappattaṃ hoti. Paccāsannamaraṇassa pana tassa vīthicittāvasāne
anya-e1102n0:331_14: nirujjhati. Tasmiṃ niruddhāvasāne tassānantarameva tathā gahitamālambaṇamārabbha
anya-e1102n0:331_18: patiṭṭhāti bhavantare”ti vuttaṃ. Tattha “tatthoṇataṃva cittasantānamabhiṇhaṃ pavattati
anya-e1102n0:331_19: bāhullenā”ti iminā kammabalena upaṭṭhitaṃ gatinimittaṃ maraṇāsannavīthito pubbe ekāhadvīhādivasena
anya-e1102n0:331_20: sattāhampi, sattāhato uttaripi uppajjate vāti dasseti tathā hi parisuddhaṃ vā upakkiliṭṭhaṃ
anya-e1102n0:331_21: vā vipaccamānakakammānurūpaṃ gatinimittaṃ cirakālampi tiṭṭhati, ariyagālatissacoraghātakādayo
anya-e1102n0:331_22: viya tathā hi ariyagālatisso nāma upāsako sīhaḷadīpe attano bhariyāya sumanāya saddhiṃ
anya-e1102n0:331_23: yāvajīvaṃ dānādi puññakammāni katvā āyūhapariyosāne ariyagālatissassa maraṇamañce
anya-e1102n0:331_24: nipannassa chadevalokato rathaṃ ānetvā attano attano devalokaṃ vaṇṇesuṃ. Upāsako
anya-e1102n0:331_25: devatānaṃ kathaṃ sutvā tusitapurato āhaṭarathaṃ ṭhapetvā avasesarathe “gahetvā gacchathā”ti
anya-e1102n0:331_26: āha. Sumanā pana attano sāmikassa vacanaṃ sutvā “kiṃ tissa maraṇāsanne vilāpaṃ akāsī”ti
anya-e1102n0:331_27: āha. Tisso attano bhariyāya kathaṃ sutvā āha… “ahaṃ vilāpaṃ na karomi, devalokato
anya-e1102n0:331_28: devatā cha rathe ānesuṃ tāhi devatāhi saddhaṃ kathemī”ti. Taṃ napassāmi kuhi”nti
anya-e1102n0:331_29: vutte pupphadāmaṃ āharāpetvā ākāse khipāpesi. Sā taṃ pupphadāmaṃ rathasīse olambamānaṃ
anya-e1102n0:331_30: disvā gabbhaṃ pavisitvā sayane sayitvā nāsikavātaṃ sannirujjhitvā cavitvā pāturahosi.
anya-e1102n0:331_31: Sā attano sāmikassa sāsanaṃ pesesi… “ahaṃ pana paṭhamaṃ āgatomhi, tvaṃ kasmā cirāyasī”ti.
anya-e1102n0:331_32: Ubhopi rathe ṭhatvā sabbe olokentānaṃyeva tusitapuraṃ agamaṃsu. Imasmiñhi vatthusmiṃ
anya-e1102n0:331_33: sāmikassa upaṭṭhitagatinimittaṃ bhariyāya pākaṭaṃ hutvā puretaratusitapure nibbattitvā
anya-e1102n0:331_34: sāmikassa sāsanaṃ pesesi tena ariyagālatissassa cirakālaṃ gatinimittaṃ upaṭṭhātīti
anya-e1102n0:331_35: veditabbaṃ. Manussaloke hi cirakālaṃ tusitapure muhuttaṃva hoti. Evaṃ parisuddhaṃ
anya-e1102n0:331_36: vipaccamānakakammānurūpaṃ gatinimittaṃ cirakālaṃ pavattati iminā nayena duṭṭhagāmaṇiabhayadhammikaupsakādīnampi
anya-e1102n0:331_37: vatthu vitthāretabbaṃ. Coraghātakassa pana mahāniraye vipaccamānakakammānurūpaṃ nerayaggijālādikaṃ
anya-e1102n0:331_38: sattāhaṃ upaṭṭhāti. Sāvatthinagare kira pañcasatā corā bahinagare corakammaṃ karonti.
anya-e1102n0:331_39: Athekadivasaṃ janapadapuriso tesaṃ abbhantaro hutvā corakammaṃ akāsi, tadā te sabbepi
anya-e1102n0:331_40: rājapurisā aggahesuṃ. Rājā te disvā “tumhākaṃ antare ime sabbe māretuṃ samatthassa
anya-e1102n0:331_41: jīvitaṃ dammī”ti āha. Pañcasatā corā aññamaññaṃ sambandhā aññamaññaṃ sahāyakāti aññamaññaṃ
anya-e1102n0:331_42: māretuṃ na icchiṃsu, janapadamanusso pana “ahaṃ māremī”ti vatvā sabbe māresi. Rājā
anya-e1102n0:331_43: tassa tussitvā coraghātakakammaṃ adāsi. So pañcavīsativassāni coraghātakakammaṃ ākāsi.
anya-e1102n0:331_44: Rājā tassa mahallakoti vatvā aññassa coraghātaka kammaṃ dāpesi. So coraghātakakammā
anya-e1102n0:331_45: apanīto aññatarassa santike nāsikavātaṃ uggaṇhitvā hatthapādakaṇṇanāsādīhi chinditabbānaṃ
anya-e1102n0:331_46: ūrūthanakaṭṭhānaṃ bhindantamāretabbayuttānaṃ nāsikavātaṃ vissajjetvā māretabbaṃ mantaṃ
anya-e1102n0:331_47: labhi. So rājānaṃ ārocetvā nāsikavātena coraghātakakammaṃ karontasseva tiṃsa vassāni
anya-e1102n0:331_48: atikkami. So pacchā mahallako hutvā maraṇamañce nipajji “sattadivasena kālaṃ karissatī”ti.
anya-e1102n0:331_49: Maraṇakāle mahantaṃ vedanaṃ ahosi. So mahāniraye nibbatto viya mahāsaddaṃ katvā dukkhito
anya-e1102n0:331_50: hoti. Tassa saddena bhītā manussā ubhatopasse gehaṃ chaḍḍetvā palāyiṃsu. Tassa maraṇadivase
anya-e1102n0:331_51: sāriputtatthero dibbacakkhunā lokaṃ olokento etassa kālaṃ katvā mahāniraye nibbattamānaṃ
anya-e1102n0:331_52: disvā tassa anukampaṃ paṭicca gehadvāre pākaṭo ahosi. So kujjhitvā nāsikavātaṃ vissajjesi.
anya-e1102n0:331_53: Yāva tatiyaṃ vissajjamānopi vissajjāpetuṃ asakkonto theraṃ atirekena virocamānaṃ
anya-e1102n0:331_54: disvā cittaṃ pasādetvā pāyāsaṃ therassa dāpesi. Thero maṅgalaṃ vaḍḍhetvā agamāsi.
anya-e1102n0:331_55: Coraghātako therassa dinnadānaṃ anussaritvā cavitvā sagge nibbatti, nirayajālādayo
anya-e1102n0:331_56: antaradhāyanti. So anāgatepi paccekabuddho bhavissati. Evaṃ upakkiliṭṭhaṃ vā vipaccamāna
anya-e1102n0:331_57: kakammānurūpaṃ gatinimittampi sattāhaparamaṃ upaṭṭhāti. Atthikehi pana sahassavatthu
anya-e1102n0:331_58: sagāthāvaggesu oloketabbo. Bhagavato pana parisuddhaṃ mettāpubbabhāgassa somanassa
anya-e1102n0:331_59: ñāṇasampayuttakusalassa kammassa vegena kāladīpadesakulamātaravasena imāni pañcagatinimittāni
anya-e1102n0:331_60: cirakālaṃ hutvā upaṭṭhahanti. Cirakālanti manussaloke sattāhamattaṃ, tusitapuremuhuttameva,
anya-e1102n0:331_61: tathāpi manussaloke sattāhamatte kāle devatānaṃ pañcapubbanimittāni paññāyanti tañca
anya-e1102n0:331_62: kho puññavantānaṃyeva paññāyanti, na sabbesaṃ manussaloke puññavantānaṃ rājarājamahāmattādīnaṃ
anya-e1102n0:331_63: viya taṃ disvā mahesakkhā devatā jānanti, na appesakkhā, manussaloke nemittakā brāhmaṇapaṇḍitādayoviya.
anya-e1102n0:331_64: Mahesakkhā devatā taṃ pubbanimittaṃ disvā nandavanaṃ netvā “kālo devā”ti ādīhi yācanti.
anya-e1102n0:331_65: Mahāsakko tattheva nandavanuyyāne kāladīpadesakulamātaravasena pañca viloketvā cavitvā
anya-e1102n0:331_66: tamārammaṇaṃ katvā mahāmāyāya kucchimhi paṭisandhiṃ aggahesīti sanniṭṭhānamavagantabbaṃ.
anya-e1102n0:332_0: Tattha kālanti manussaloke ekūnatiṃsatime vasse vesākhapuṇṇamadivase buddho bhavissāmīti
anya-e1102n0:332_1: kālaṃ olokesi. Dīpanti jambudīpeyeva bhavissāmi, na aññadīpesūti dīpaṃ olokesi. Desanti
anya-e1102n0:332_2: majjhimadeseyeva, tañca kho mahābodhimaṇḍeyeva, na aññadeseti desaṃ olokesi. Kulanti
anya-e1102n0:332_3: dve kulāni khattiyakulabrāhmaṇakulavasena. Tattha yasmiṃ kāle khattiyakulaṃ loke
anya-e1102n0:332_4: seṭṭhabhāvena “ayameva loke aggo”ti sammannati, tadā khattiyakuleyeva buddhā uppajjanti.
anya-e1102n0:332_5: Yasmiṃ pana kāle brāhmaṇakulaṃ ayameva loke aggoti, tadā brāhmaṇakuleyeva buddhā
anya-e1102n0:332_6: uppajjanti. Idāni pana khattiyakulameva aggoti sammannanti. Khattiyakulepi sakyarājānova
anya-e1102n0:332_7: loke uttamā, asambhinnakhattiyakulattā tasmā sakyarājakuleyeva bhavissāmīti kulaṃ
anya-e1102n0:332_8: olokesi. Mātaranti mama mātaraṃ dasa māsāni satta ca divasāni ṭhassati, etthantare
anya-e1102n0:332_9: mama mātuyā arogo bhavissatīti mātarampi olokesi. Bodhisattamātā pana pacchimavaye
anya-e1102n0:332_10: ṭhitā. Evaṃ yuttitopi āgamatopi bhagavato nibbānacittassa paṭasandhicittena gahitanimittameva
anya-e1102n0:335_1: anāgate bhavissati sāsanassa hi osakkanakāle imasmiṃ tambapaṇṇidīpe dhātuyo sannipatitvā
anya-e1102n0:335_2: mahācetiyato nāgadīpe rājāyatanacetiyaṃ, tato mahābodhipallaṅkaṃ gamissanti. Nāgabhavanatopi
anya-e1102n0:335_3: devalokatopi dhātuyo mahābodhipallaṅkameva gamissanti sāsapamattāpi dhātuyo antarā
anya-e1102n0:335_4: na nassissanti, sabbā dhātuyo mahābodhipallaṅke rāsibhūtā suvaṇṇakkhandhā viya ekagghanā
anya-e1102n0:335_5: hutvā chabbaṇṇarasmiyo vissajjissanti, tā dasasahassalokadhātuṃ pharissanti. Tato
anya-e1102n0:335_6: dasasahassacakkavāḷesu devatā sannipatitvā ''ajja satthā parinibbāyati ajja sāsanaṃ
anya-e1102n0:335_7: osakkati pacchimadassanaṃ idaṃ amhāka”nti dasabalassa parinibbutadivasato mahantataraṃ
anya-e1102n0:335_8: kāruññaṃ karissanti ṭhapetvā anāgāmikhīṇāsave avasesā sakattabhāvena sandhāretuṃ
anya-e1102n0:335_9: nāsakkhiṃsu, dhātusarīrato tejodhātu uṭṭhahitvā yāva brahmalokā uggacchissati. Sāsapamattāyapi
anya-e1102n0:335_10: dhātuyā sati ekajālā bhavissati dhātūsu pariyādānaṃ gatāsu pacchijjissati. Evaṃ mahantaṃ
anya-e1102n0:335_11: ānubhāvaṃ dassetvā dhātūsu antarahitāsu sāsanaṃ antarahitaṃ nāma hoti. Yāva evaṃ
anya-e1102n0:335_12: na antaradhāyati, tāva anantaradhānameva sāsanaṃ. Parinibbānakālato paṭṭhāya yāva
anya-e1102n0:335_13: sāsapamattā dhātu tiṭṭhati, tāva buddhakālato pacchāti na veditabbaṃ dhātūsu hi ṭhitāsu
anya-e1102n0:335_14: buddhā ṭhitā va honti, tasmā etthantare aññassa buddhassa uppatti nivāritāva hoti. Teneva vadāma.
anya-e1102n0:339: Yo karoti samaṃ pūjaṃ, phalaṃ tāsa samaṃ siyā’ti.
anya-e1102n0:343_0: Idāni saṅgho ca dullabho loketi padassa vaṇṇanākkamo sampatto. Tattha saṅghoti paramatthasammutivasena
anya-e1102n0:343_1: duvidho hoti. Tesu paramatthasaṅgho cattāri purisayugāni, aṭṭhapurisapuggalā, cattālīsampi
anya-e1102n0:343_2: puggalā, aṭṭhasatampi purisapuggalāti catubbidho hoti. Tattha saṅkhepavasena sotāpattimaggaṭṭho
anya-e1102n0:343_3: phalaṭṭhoti ekaṃ yugaṃ, sakadāmimaggaṭṭho phalaṭṭhoti ekaṃ, anāgāmimaggaṭṭho phalaṭṭhoti
anya-e1102n0:343_4: ekaṃ, arahattamaggaṭṭho phalaṭṭhoti ekanti cattāri purisayugāni honti. Cattāro maggaṭṭhā
anya-e1102n0:343_5: cattāro phalaṭṭhāti aṭṭhapurisapuggalā honti. Cattālīsampi puggalāti sotāpattimaggaṭṭho
anya-e1102n0:343_6: paṭhamajhānikādivasena pañca, tathā sakadāgāmianāgāmiarahattamaggaṭṭhāpi pañca pañcāti
anya-e1102n0:343_7: vīsati maggaṭṭhapuggalā, tathā phalaṭṭhāpi sotapattiphalaṭṭhādivasena pañca pañcāti
anya-e1102n0:343_8: vīsati phalaṭṭhāti cattālīsapuggalā honti. Ettha ca maggassa ekacittakkhaṇikattā
anya-e1102n0:344_1: cattāropi maggaṭṭhā paṭhamajjhānikādivohāraṃ labhantā paccekaṃ pañcapañcadhā vibhajiyanti,
anya-e1102n0:344_2: tasmā vīsati maggaṭṭhā honti. Tattha paṭhamajjhānādīsu yaṃ yaṃ jhānaṃ samāpajjitvā
anya-e1102n0:344_3: tato vuṭṭhāya saṅkhāre sammasantassa vuṭṭhānagāminīvipassanā pavattā, taṃ pādakajjhānaṃ
anya-e1102n0:344_4: vuṭṭhānagāminivipassanāya padaṭṭhānabhāvato. Yaṃ yaṃ jhānaṃ sammasantassa sā pavattā,
anya-e1102n0:344_5: taṃ sammasitajjhānaṃ. “Aho vata me paṭhamajjhānasadiso maggo pañcaṅgiko, dutiyajjhānādīsu
anya-e1102n0:344_6: vā aññatarasadiso caturaṅgikādibhedo maggo bhaveyyā”ti evaṃ yogāvacarassa uppannajjhāsayo
anya-e1102n0:344_7: puggalajjhāsayo nāma. Tattha yena paṭhamajjhānādīsu aññataraṃ jhānaṃ samāpajjitvā
anya-e1102n0:344_8: tato vuṭṭhāya pakiṇṇakasaṅkhāre sammasitvā maggo uppādito hoti, tassa so maggo paṭhamajjhānādi
anya-e1102n0:344_9: taṃ taṃ pādakajjhānasadiso hoti. Sace pana vipassanāpādakaṃ kiñcijhānaṃ natthi, kevalaṃ
anya-e1102n0:344_10: paṭhamajjhānādīsu aññataraṃ jhānaṃ sammasitvā maggo uppādito hoti, tassa so sammasitajjhānasadiso
anya-e1102n0:344_11: hoti. Yadā panayaṃ kiñci jhānaṃ samāpajjitvā tato aññaṃ sammasitvā maggo uppādito
anya-e1102n0:344_12: hoti, tadā puggalajjhāsayavasena dvīsu aññatarasadiso hoti. Evaṃ samathayānikassa
anya-e1102n0:344_14: aññatarajhānasadisassa maggaṅgikassa pavattanato puggalabhedavasena vīsati maggaṭṭhā
anya-e1102n0:344_15: puggalā honti, tathā phalaṭṭhāpi vīsatīti cattālīsaariyapuggalā honti. Aparampi sace
anya-e1102n0:344_16: pana puggalassa tathā vidho ajjhāsayo natthi, anulomavasena heṭṭhimaheṭṭhimajhānato
anya-e1102n0:344_18: sammasitajjhānasadiso hoti. Paṭilomavasena uparūparijhānato vuṭṭhāya heṭṭhimaheṭṭhimajhānadhamme
anya-e1102n0:344_19: sammasitvā uppāditamaggo sammasitajjhānamanapekkhitvā pādakajjhānasadiso hoti, heṭṭhimaheṭṭhimajhānato
anya-e1102n0:344_20: hi uparūparijhānaṃ balavataranti, aṭṭhasatampi purisapuggalāti tattha ekabījī, kolaṃkolo,
anya-e1102n0:344_21: sattakkhattuparamoti tayo sotāpannā. Kāmarūpārūpabhavesu adhigataphalā tayo sakadāgāminoti
anya-e1102n0:344_22: te sabbepi dukkhapaṭipadā dandhābhiññaṃ, dukkhapaṭipadā khippābhiññaṃ, sukhāpaṭipadā
anya-e1102n0:344_23: dandhābhiññaṃ, sukhāpaṭipadā khippābhiññanti catunnaṃ paṭipadānaṃ vasena catuvīsati,
anya-e1102n0:344_25: uddhaṃsoto akaniṭṭhagāmīti avihāsu pañca anāmigāno, tathā atappāsudassāsudassīsupi
anya-e1102n0:344_26: pañca. Akaniṭṭhesu pana uddhaṃsotavajjā antarāparinibbāyī, upahaccaparinibbāyī, sasaṅkhāraparinibbāyī,
anya-e1102n0:344_27: asaṅkhāraparibbāyīti cattāroti catuvīsati anāgāmino. Sukkhavipassako, samathayānikoti
anya-e1102n0:344_28: dve arahanto, cattāro maggaṭṭhāti catupaññāsa te sabbepi saddhādhurapaññādhurānaṃvasena
anya-e1102n0:344_29: dveguṇe hutvā aṭṭhasataṃ ariyapuggalā honti. Te sabbepi “aṭṭhasataṃ vā”ti vitthāravasena
anya-e1102n0:344_30: uddiṭṭhā ariyapuggalā te saṅkhepato yugavasena sotāpatti maggaṭṭho phalaṭṭhoti ekaṃ
anya-e1102n0:344_31: yugantyādinā cattārova honti. Tenevāha ratanaparitte “ye puggalā aṭṭhasataṃ pasatthā,
anya-e1102n0:344_32: cattāri etāni yugāni hontī”ti ayaṃ pabhedomaggaṭṭhaphalaṭṭhesu missakavasena labbhati
anya-e1102n0:344_33: jhānikavipassakapabhedo pana phalaṭṭheyeva labbhati maggassa ekacittakkhatikattā
anya-e1102n0:344_34: maggaṭṭhesu na labbhati. Tattha sotāpattiphalaṭṭho jhānikasukkhavipassakavasena duvidho.
anya-e1102n0:344_35: Tesu jhāniko puggalo tasmiṃ bhave arahattappatto parinibbāyati. Appatto brahmalokagato
anya-e1102n0:344_36: hoti, so jhāniko nāma. Mūlaṭīkāyaṃ pana nikantiyā sati puthujjanādayo yathāladdhajjhānassa
anya-e1102n0:344_37: bhūmibhūte suddhāvāsavajjite yattha katthaci nibbattanti tathā kāmabhavepi kāmāvacarakammabalena
anya-e1102n0:344_38: “ijjhati hi bhikkhave sīlavato cetopaṇidhi visuddhattā”ti vuttaṃ. Anāgāmino pana
anya-e1102n0:344_39: kāmarāgassa sabbaso pahīnattā kāmabhavesu nikantiṃ na uppādentīti kāmalokavajjite
anya-e1102n0:344_40: yathāladdhassa bhūmi bhūte yattha katthaci nibbattantī’ti vuttaṃ tathā hi anāgāmisseva
anya-e1102n0:344_41: kāmabhave nikantiyā pahīnattā sotāpannasakadāgāmīnampi nikantiyā sati kāmabhave kāmāvacarakammabalena
anya-e1102n0:344_42: uppattibhāvo avāritova hotīti viññāyati tasmā “appatte brahmalokagato hoti, so jhāniko
anya-e1102n0:344_43: nāmāti idaṃ yebhuyyavasena vutta”nti daṭṭhabbaṃ. Sukkhavipassako pana tividho ekabījī,
anya-e1102n0:344_44: kolaṃkolo, sattakkhattuparamoti. Tattha eko manussaloke vā hotu chadevaloke vā, ekapaṭisandhiko
anya-e1102n0:344_45: hutvā arahattaṃ patvā parinibbāyati, ayaṃ ekabījī nāma eko manussaloke ekā paṭisandhi
anya-e1102n0:344_46: devaloke ekāti dvepaṭisandhiko vā, evaṃ ticatupañcachaparamo hutvā arahattaṃ patvā
anya-e1102n0:344_47: parinibbāyati, ayaṃ kolaṃkolo nāma. Eko manussaloke sotāpanno hutvā devaloke ekā
anya-e1102n0:344_48: paṭisandhi tato punāgantvā manussaloke ekāti evaṃ manussadevalokamissakavasena tattha
anya-e1102n0:344_49: cattāri idha tīṇityādinā tattha cha, idha ekoti yāva sattapaṭisandhiko hutvā parinibbāyati,
anya-e1102n0:344_50: ayaṃ sattakkhattuparamo nāma. Kevalaṃ pana manussaloke yeva satta devalokeyeva vā
anya-e1102n0:344_51: sattāti evaṃ amisso hutvā paṭisandhiko gahetabbo apare pana “ito satta, tato satta
anya-e1102n0:344_53: sattakkhattuparamaṃ vadanti. Taṃ ayuttaṃ kasmā “kiñcāpi te honti bhusaṃpamattā, na
anya-e1102n0:344_54: te bhavaṃ aṭṭhamamādiyantī”ti pāḷiyā virodhattā. Apica dvibhavaparicchinno sakadāgāmīpi
anya-e1102n0:344_55: dvikkhattuṃ manussalokaṃ āgato bhaveyya, tassapi tattha ekaṃ, idha ekanti vārassa
anya-e1102n0:344_56: labbhitabbato na panevaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ. Sakiṃ imaṃ manussalokaṃ āgacchatīti sakadāgāmī
anya-e1102n0:344_57: idha patvā idha parinibbāyī, tattha patvā tattha parinibbāyī, tattha patvā idha parinibbāyī,
anya-e1102n0:344_58: idha patvā tattha parinibbāyīti pañcasu sakadāgāmīsu pañcamako idha adhippeto. Yadi
anya-e1102n0:344_59: evaṃ idha patvā idha parinibbāyīti ādayo cattāro kathaṃ sakadāgāmīnāmāti. Te sakiṃ
anya-e1102n0:344_60: puna āgacchatīti vacanatthena sakadāgāmī nāma. Kāmataṇhāya sabbaso pahīnattā imaṃ
anya-e1102n0:344_61: kāmadhātuṃ anāgacchatīti anāgāmī, niccaṃ brahmalokeyeva paṭisandhi vasena āgacchatīti
anya-e1102n0:344_62: adhippāyo. Jhānikassa evaṃ hotu, sukkhavipassakassa kathanti sopi jhānikova hutvā
anya-e1102n0:344_63: gacchati tassa hi maggantare sīhabyagghādīhi hatassāpi lakkhaṇattayaṃ āropetvā jhāniko
anya-e1102n0:344_64: hutvāva maraṇaṃ hoti ayaṃ pana rūpārūpabhavena ekakkhattuparamo nāma. Sattakkhattuparamādayo
anya-e1102n0:344_66: nāma honti. Arahā pana pāpakaraṇe rahābhāvā dakkhiṇaṃ arahattā puna bhavā bhinibbattiyārahābhāvātyādinā
anya-e1102n0:344_67: vacanatthena arahā nāma. Sopi tividho jhānika sukkhavipassaka samasīsīvasena. Tattha
anya-e1102n0:344_68: jhāniko maggeneva āgato, so paṭisambhidāppatto nāma. Aparopi puthujjanasekkhasantāne
anya-e1102n0:344_69: jhāniko hutvā jhānaṃ pādakaṃ katvā maggaṃ uppādeti, sopi jhānikova. Sukkhavipassako
anya-e1102n0:344_70: pana kilesakkhayamattameva maggena saha anāgatajhānaṃ nāma natthi, taṃ pacchā parihāyatītipi
anya-e1102n0:344_71: vadanti. Samasīsī pana tividho hoti iriyāpathasamasīsī, rogasamasīsī, jīvitasamasīsīti.
anya-e1102n0:344_72: Tattha yo ṭhānādīsu iriyāpathesu yeneva iriyapathena samannāgato hutvā vipassanaṃ
anya-e1102n0:344_73: ārabhati, teneva iriyāpathena arahattaṃ patvā parinibbāyati ayaṃ iriyāpathasamasīsī
anya-e1102n0:344_74: nāma. Yo pana ekaṃ rogaṃ patvā antoroge eva vipassanaṃ paṭṭhapetvā arahattaṃ patvā
anya-e1102n0:344_75: teneva rogena parinibbāyati ayaṃ rogasamasīsi nāma. Yo pana terasasu sīsesu kilesasīsaṃ
anya-e1102n0:344_76: avijjaṃ arahattamaggo pariyādiyati, pavattisīsaṃ jīvitindriyaṃ cuticittaṃ pariyādiyati,
anya-e1102n0:344_77: ayaṃ jīvitasamasīsīnāma. Tattha terasa sīsāni katamāni terasa sīsāni. Palibodhasīsaṃ,
anya-e1102n0:344_81: Ettha ca avijjā pariyādāyakaṃ maggacittaṃ jīvitindriyaṃ pariyādātuṃ sakkoti, jīvitapariyādāyakaṃ
anya-e1102n0:344_82: cuticittaṃ avijjaṃ pariyādātuṃ na sakkoti, avijjā pariyādāyakaṃ cittaṃ aññaṃ, jīvitindriyapariyādāyakaṃ
anya-e1102n0:344_83: cittaṃ aññaṃ. Kathaṃ panidaṃ sīsaṃ samaṃ hotīti. Vārasamatāya, yasmiñhi vāre maggavuṭṭhānaṃ
anya-e1102n0:344_85: tathā sakadāmimagge pañca, anāgāmimagge pañca, arahattamagge sesakilesābhāvā cattārīti
anya-e1102n0:344_86: ekūnavīsatime paccavekkhaṇañāṇe patiṭṭhāya bhavaṅgaṃ otaritvā parinibbāyato imāya
anya-e1102n0:344_87: vārasamatāya idaṃ ubhayasīsa pariyādānampi samaṃ hoti nāma. Arahattamagge ca pavattisīsaṃ
anya-e1102n0:344_88: jīvitindriyaṃ pavattito vuṭṭhahanto maggo cutito uddhaṃ appavattikaraṇavasena yadipi
anya-e1102n0:344_89: pariyādiyati. Yāva pana cuti, tāva pavattisabhāvato pavattisīsaṃ jīvitindriyaṃ cuticittaṃ
anya-e1102n0:344_90: pariyādiyati nāma. Kilesapariyādānena maggacittena attano anantaraṃ viya nipphādetabbā
anya-e1102n0:344_91: paccavekkhaṇavārāva paripuṇṇā. Paripuṇṇavasena pahīnakilese paccavekkhaṇato kilesapariyādānasseva
anya-e1102n0:344_92: vārāti vattabbataṃ arahanti, teneva kilesasīsaṃ avijjāpariyādānañca pavattisīsaṃ
anya-e1102n0:344_93: jīvitindriyapariyādānañca samaṃ katvā imāya vārasamatāya kilesapariyādānaṃ jīvitapariyādānānaṃ
anya-e1102n0:344_94: apubbacarimatā veditabbāti vuttaṃ. Saṃyuttaṭhakathāyaṃ pana yassa puggalassa apubbaṃ
anya-e1102n0:344_95: acarimaṃ āsavapariyādānañca hoti jīvitapariyādānañca, ayaṃti puggalo samasīsī. Ettha
anya-e1102n0:344_96: ca pavattisīsaṃ kilesasīsanti dve sīsāni. Tattha pavattisīsaṃ nāma jīvitindriyaṃ.
anya-e1102n0:344_97: Kilesasīsaṃ nāma avijjā. Tesu jīvitindriyaṃ cuticittaṃ khepeti. Avijjaṃ maggacittaṃ.
anya-e1102n0:344_98: Dvinnaṃ cittānaṃ ekato uppādo natthi. Maggānantaraṃ pana phalaṃ, phalānantaraṃ bhavaṅgaṃ,
anya-e1102n0:344_99: bhavaṅgato vuṭṭhāya paccavekkhaṇaṃ paripuṇṇaṃ hoti, taṃ aparipuṇṇaṃ vāti. Tikhiṇena
anya-e1102n0:344_100: asinā sīse chindantepi hi eko vā dve vā paccavekkhaṇavārā avassaṃ uppajjantiyeva,
anya-e1102n0:344_101: cittānaṃ pana lahuparivattitāya āsavakkhayo ca jīvitapariyādānañca ekakkhaṇe viya
anya-e1102n0:344_102: sañjāyatī’ti vuttaṃ. Taṭṭīkāyañca “dvinnaṃ cittānanti cuticittamaggacittānaṃ. Tanti
anya-e1102n0:344_103: paccayavekallaṃ. Paripuṇṇaṃ javanacittānaṃ sattakkhattuṃ pavattiyā. Aparipuṇṇaṃ pañcakkhattuṃ
anya-e1102n0:344_104: pavattiyā. Kiñcāpi eko vā dve vā ti vuttaṃ, taṃ pana vacana siliṭṭhavasena vuttaṃ.
anya-e1102n0:344_105: Yāva ekaṃ vā dve vā tadārammaṇacittānīti heṭṭhimantena dve pavattantīti vadantī”ti
anya-e1102n0:344_106: vuttaṃ. Ettha ca “paripuṇṇaṃ javanacittānaṃ sattakkhattuṃ pavattiyā, aparipuṇṇaṃ
anya-e1102n0:344_107: pañchakkhattuṃ pavattiyā”ti iminā aṭṭhakathāṭīkāvacanena samasīsīnaṃ paccavekkhaṇāvasena
anya-e1102n0:344_109: kriyajavanāni javantīti sanniṭṭhānametthāva gantabbaṃ. “Asammūḷho kālaṃ karotī”ti
anya-e1102n0:344_110: vuttattā ca viññāyati sattakkhattuṃ paripuṇṇavasena maraṇāsannakāle javanapavatti.
anya-e1102n0:344_111: Evañca sati “mandappavattiyaṃ pana maraṇakālādīsu pañcavāramevā”ti ettha “mandappavattiya”nti
anya-e1102n0:344_112: visesanaṃ sātthakaṃ siyā. “Pañcavāramevā”ti ettha evakārena mandappavattikāle chasattakkhattuṃ
anya-e1102n0:344_113: nivatteti. Asammūḷhakāle pana chasattakkhattumpi anujānāti. Kāmāvacarajavanānañca
anya-e1102n0:344_115: sattakkhattuṃ chakkhattuṃ vā, mandappavattiyaṃ pana maraṇakālādīsu pañcavārameva.
anya-e1102n0:344_116: Bhagavato yamakapāṭihāriyakālādīsu lahukappavattiyaṃ cattāri pañcavā paccavekkhaṇajavanacittāni
anya-e1102n0:344_117: bhavantī”ti aniyamitappamāṇavasena uppattibhāvo āgato imasmiṃ samasīsiniddesavārepi
anya-e1102n0:344_118: maraṇāsannavīthicittassa visuṃ alabbhanato paccavekkhaṇanteyeva bhavaṅgacittena parinibbānato
anya-e1102n0:344_119: paripuṇṇavasena satta javanacittāni pāṭikaṅkhitabbānīti amhākaṃ khanti vīmaṃsitvā
anya-e1102n0:344_120: gahetabbo ito yuttataro vā pakāro labbhamāno gavesitabbo. Evaṃ paramatthasaṅghavasena
anya-e1102n0:344_121: cattāri purisayugāni, aṭṭha purisapuggalā, cattālīsampipuggalā aṭṭhasatampi purisapuggalāti
anya-e1102n0:344_122: sabbaṃ samodhānetvā imasmiṃ loke saṅghopi dullabhoti veditabbo tathā hi ariyapuggalā
anya-e1102n0:344_123: atidullabhāva sāsanassa vijjamānakālepi idāni sotāpannassāpi avijjamānato ayaṃ paramatthasaṅghavicāraṇā.
anya-e1102n0:344_124: Sammutisaṅgho pana ñatticatutthena upasampanno puthujjanasaṅghova, sopi dullabhoyeva.
anya-e1102n0:344_125: Kasmā buddhuppādakāleyeva labbhanato tathā hi anuppanne buddhe paccekabuddhānaṃ satasahassādigaṇane
anya-e1102n0:344_126: uppajjamānepi tesaṃ santike upasampadābhāvassa alabbhamānato paccekabuddhānañhi santike
anya-e1102n0:344_127: pabbajitānaṃ kulaputtānaṃ saraṇagamanakammaṭṭhānassāpi dātuṃ asakkuṇeyyattā. Paccekabuddhā
anya-e1102n0:344_128: ca nāma mūgassa supinadassanaṃ viya attanā paṭiladdhasaccadhamme paresaṃ ācikkhituṃ
anya-e1102n0:344_129: na sakkonti, tasmā te pabbājetvā kammaṭṭhāne niyojetuṃ asamatthā “evaṃ te nivāsetabbaṃ,
anya-e1102n0:344_130: evaṃ te pārupitabba”nti ādinānayena abhisamācārikameva sikkhāpesuṃ tasmā buddhuppādakāleyeva
anya-e1102n0:344_131: sammutisaṅgho labbhati. Apica na te dullabhāyeva honti, atha kho tasmiṃ uddissa appamattakassāpi
anya-e1102n0:344_132: katākārassa asaṅkhyeyyaphalāpi honti vuttañhetaṃ bhagavatā “bhavissanti kho panānanda
anya-e1102n0:344_133: anāgatamaddhānaṃ gotrabhuno kāsāvakaṇṭhā dussīlā pāpadhammā tesu dussīlesu saṅghaṃ
anya-e1102n0:344_134: uddissa dānaṃ dassanti, tadā pāhaṃ ānanda saṅghagataṃ dakkhiṇaṃ asaṅkhyeyyaṃ appameyyaṃ
anya-e1102n0:344_135: vadāmi na tvevāhaṃ ānanda kenaci pariyāyena saṅghagatā dakkhiṇā pāṭipuggalikaṃ dakkhiṇaṃ
anya-e1102n0:344_136: mahapphalanti vadāmī”ti. Tathā hi uparipaṇṇāsake dakkhiṇavibhaṅgavaṇṇanāyaṃ “kāsāvakaṇṭhānaṃ
anya-e1102n0:344_137: saṅghe dinne dakkhiṇāpi guṇāsaṅkhyāya asaṅkhyeyyā”ti vuttaṃ. Saṅghagatadakkhiṇā hi
anya-e1102n0:344_138: saṅghe cittīkāraṃ kātuṃ sakkontassa hoti. Saṅghe pana cittīkāro dukkaro yo hi “saṅghagataṃ
anya-e1102n0:344_139: dakkhiṇaṃ dassāmī”ti deyyadhammaṃ paṭiyādetvā vihāraṃ gantvā bhante saṅghaṃ uddissa
anya-e1102n0:344_140: ekaṃ theraṃ dethā’ti vadati, atha saṅghato sāmaṇeraṃ labhitvā “sāmaṇero me laddho”ti
anya-e1102n0:344_141: aññathattaṃ āpajjati, tassa dakkhiṇā saṅghagatā na hoti. Mahātheraṃ labhitvā pi “mahāthero
anya-e1102n0:344_142: me laddho”ti somanassaṃ uppādentassāpi na hotiyeva. Tassa dakkhiṇā saṅghagatā na
anya-e1102n0:344_143: hoti. Yo pana sāmaṇeraṃ upasampannaṃ vā daharaṃ vā theraṃ vā bālaṃ vā paṇḍitaṃ vā
anya-e1102n0:344_144: yaṃkiñci saṅghato labhitvā nibbematiko hutvā “saṅghassa dammī”ti saṅghe cittīkāraṃ
anya-e1102n0:344_145: kātuṃ sakkoti, tassa dakkhiṇā saṅghagatā nāma hoti. Parasamuddavāsino kira evaṃ karonti
anya-e1102n0:344_146: tattha hi eko vihārassāmikuṭumbiko “saṅghagataṃ dakkhiṇaṃ dassāmī”ti saṅghato uddisitvā
anya-e1102n0:344_147: “ekaṃ bhikkhuṃ dethā”ti yācitvā so ekaṃ dussīlabhikkhuṃ labhitvā nisīdanaṭṭhānaṃ
anya-e1102n0:344_148: opuñjāpetvā āsanaṃ paññapetvā upari vitānaṃ bandhitvā gandhadhūmapupphehi pūjetvā
anya-e1102n0:344_149: pāde dhovitvā makkhetvā buddhassa nipaccakāraṃ karonto viya saṅghe cittīkārena deyyadhammaṃ
anya-e1102n0:344_150: adāsi so bhikkhu pacchābhattaṃ vihāraṃ jagganatthāya “kudālakaṃ dethā”ti gharadvāraṃ
anya-e1102n0:344_151: āgato upāsako nisinnova kudālaṃ pādena khipitvā “gaṇhā”ti adāsi tamenaṃ manussā āhaṃsu
anya-e1102n0:344_152: “tumhehi pātova etassa katasakkāro vattuṃ na sakkā, idāni apacayamattakampi natthi,
anya-e1102n0:344_153: kiṃ nāmeta”nti. Upāsako “saṅghassa so ayyo cittīkāro, na etassā”ti āha. Kāsāvakaṇṭhasaṅghadinnadakkhiṇaṃ
anya-e1102n0:344_154: pana ko sodheti, sāriputtamoggalānādayo asītimahātherā sodhenti api ca therā ciraparinibbutā,
anya-e1102n0:344_155: there ādiṃ katvā yāvajjatanā dharamānakhīṇāsavā sodhentiyeva, tathā hi dāyakato paṭiggāhatopi
anya-e1102n0:344_156: mahapphalaṃ hoti dānaṃ. Dāyakato vessantarajātakaṃ kathetabbaṃ vessantaro hi dussīlassa
anya-e1102n0:344_157: jūjakābrāhmaṇassa nayanasadise dve jālīkaṇhājine putte datvā pathaviṃ kampesi. Sabbaññutaññāṇaṃ
anya-e1102n0:344_158: ārabbha pavattacetanāya mahantabhāvena pathaviṃ kampesi. Evaṃ dāyakatopi mahapphalaṃ
anya-e1102n0:344_159: hoti. Paṭiggāhakato pana sāriputtattherassa dinnacoraghātakavatthu kathetabbaṃ coraghātako
anya-e1102n0:344_160: nāma hi sāvatthiyaṃ eko janapadapuriso pañcavīsati vassāni coraghātakakammaṃ katvā
anya-e1102n0:344_161: mahallakakālepi tiṃsa vassāni nāsikavāteneva kaṇṇanāsādīni chinditvā coraghātakakammaṃ
anya-e1102n0:344_162: karontasseva pañcapaññāsa vassāni vītivattāni. So maraṇa mañce nipannova attano kammabalena
anya-e1102n0:344_163: mahāniraye nibbatto viya mahāsaddaṃ katvā dukkhito hoti, tassa saddena bhītā manussā
anya-e1102n0:344_164: ubhato passe gehaṃ chaḍḍetvā palāyiṃsu. Tadā sāriputtatthero dibbacakkhu nā lokaṃ
anya-e1102n0:344_165: volokento taṃ disvā tassa anukampaṃ paṭicca tassa gehadvāre aṭṭhāsi. So kujjhitvā
anya-e1102n0:344_166: tikkhattuṃ nāsikavātena vissajjamānopi vissajjituṃ asakkonto ativirocamānaṃ theraṃ
anya-e1102n0:344_167: disvā ativiya pasīditvā attano atthāya sampāditaṃ pāyāsaṃ adāsi. Theropi maṅgalaṃ
anya-e1102n0:344_168: vaḍḍhetvā pakkami. Coraghātako therassa dinnadānaṃ anussaritvā sagge nibbatti, evaṃ
anya-e1102n0:344_169: paṭiggāhakatopi mahapphalaṃ hoti. Ubhayatopi mahapphalaṃ, anāthapiṇḍikavisākhādayo
anya-e1102n0:347: Natthi citte pasannamhi, appakā nāma dakkhiṇā.
anya-e1102n0:350_0: Evaṃ ubhayavasena mahapphalabhāvo veditabbo. Dāyakatopi paṭiggāhakatopi nipphalameva.
anya-e1102n0:352: Na so saṅkhatadhammānaṃ, kalaṃ nāgghati soḷasi”nti.
anya-e1102n0:353: Tenevāha bhagavā cattārimāni ānanda dakkhiṇavisuddhiyo”ti. Imāni tīṇi buddhadhammasaṅgharatanāni sādhūnaṃ ratijananatthena ratanāni nāma.
anya-e1102n0:357_0: Ratanañca nāma duvidhaṃ saviññāṇakāviññāṇakavasena. Tattha aviññāṇakaṃ cakkaratanaṃ,
anya-e1102n0:357_1: maṇiratanaṃ yaṃ vā panaññampi anindriyabaddhasuvaṇṇarajatādi. Saviññāṇakaṃ hatthiassaratanādipariṇāyakaratanapariyosānaṃ,
anya-e1102n0:357_2: yaṃ vā panaññampi indriyabaddhaṃ. Evaṃ duvidhe cettha saviññāṇakaratanaṃ aggamakkhāyati,
anya-e1102n0:357_3: kasmā yasmā aviññāṇakaṃ suvaṇṇarajatamaṇimuttādiratanaṃ saviññāṇakānaṃ hattiratanādīnaṃ
anya-e1102n0:357_4: alaṅkāratthāya upanīyati. Saviññāṇakaratanampi duvidhaṃ tiracchānagataratanaṃ manussaratanañca.
anya-e1102n0:357_5: Tattha manussaratanaṃ aggamakkhāyati. Kasmā yasmā tiracchānagataratanaṃ manussaratanassa
anya-e1102n0:357_6: opavayhaṃ hoti. Manussaratanampi duvidhaṃ itthiratanaṃ purisaratanañca. Tattha purisaratanaṃ
anya-e1102n0:357_7: aggamakkhāyati. Kasmā yasmā itthiratanaṃ purisaratanassa paricārikattaṃ āpajjati.
anya-e1102n0:357_8: Purisaratanampi duvidhaṃ agārikaratanaṃ anagārikaratanañca tattha anagārikaratanaṃ
anya-e1102n0:357_9: aggamakkhāyati. Kasmā yasmā agārikaratanesu aggo cakkavattīpi sīlādiguṇayuttaṃ anagārikaratanaṃ
anya-e1102n0:357_10: pañcapatiṭṭhitena vanditvā upaṭṭhahitvā payirupāsitvā dibbamānussikā sampattiyo pāpuṇitvā
anya-e1102n0:357_11: ante nibbānasampattiṃ pāpuṇāti. Anagārikaratanampi duvidhaṃ ariyaputhujjanavasena.
anya-e1102n0:357_12: Ariyaratanampi duvidhaṃ sekkhāsekkhavasena. Asekkharatanampi duvidhaṃ sukkhavipassakasamathayānikavasena.
anya-e1102n0:357_15: aggamakkhāyati. Kasmā guṇamahattatāya. Sāriputtamoggalānasadisāpi hi anekasatā sāvakā
anya-e1102n0:357_16: paccekabuddhassa guṇānaṃ satabhāgampi na upanenti. Paccekabuddhato sambuddharatanaṃ
anya-e1102n0:357_17: aggamakkhāyati. Kasmā guṇamahattatāya sakalampi jambudīpaṃ pallaṅke na pallaṅkaṃ
anya-e1102n0:357_18: ghaṭṭento nisinnā paccekasambuddhā ekassa guṇānaṃ neva saṅkhyaṃ kalaṃ gaṇanabhāgaṃ
anya-e1102n0:357_19: upanenti, vuttañhetaṃ bhagavatā “yāvatā bhikkhave sattā apadā vā…pe… tathāgato tesaṃ
anya-e1102n0:357_20: aggamakkhāyatī”ti ādi. Evaṃ “buddho ca dullabho loke, saddhammasavanampi ca, saṅgho
anya-e1102n0:357_21: ca dullabho loke”ti imesaṃ tiṇṇaṃ padānaṃ atthuddhāravasena sabbaso attho vuttoyeva hoti.
anya-e1102n0:361_0: Idāni sappurisāti dullabhāti imassa saṃvaṇṇanākkamo sampatto tathā hi loke sappurisāpi
anya-e1102n0:361_1: atidullabhāyeva. Sappurisāti kalyāṇaguṇasampannā uttamapurisā. Te nissāya jātidhammā
anya-e1102n0:361_2: sattā jātiyā, maraṇadhammā sattā maraṇato muccanti vuttañhetaṃ bhagavatā “mamañhi
anya-e1102n0:361_3: ānanda kalyāṇamittaṃ āgamma jātiyā parimuccanti, jarādhammā sattā jarāya muccantī”ti
anya-e1102n0:361_4: ādi vacanato pana sammāsambuddhoyeva sabbākārasampanno kalyāṇamitto nāma. Taṃ alabhantena
anya-e1102n0:361_5: sāriputtamoggalānādayo ariyapuggalā vā. Tepi alabhantena ekantajahitaṃ sivaṭṭhikaṃ
anya-e1102n0:364_0: Evamādiguṇasamannāgato vaḍḍhipakkhe ṭhitapaṇḍitapuggalo loke dullabhova. Katamo paṇḍitapuggalo
anya-e1102n0:364_1: buddhapaccekabuddhā asīti ca mahāsāvakā aññe ca tathāgatassa sāvakā sunettamahāgovindavidhurasarabhaṅgamahosadhasutasomanimirājaayogharakumāraka
anya-e1102n0:364_2: akattipaṇḍitādayo ca paṇḍitāti veditabbā. Te bhaye viya rakkhā, andhakāre viya padīpā,
anya-e1102n0:364_4: honti tathā hi tathāgataṃ āgamma asaṅkhyeyyā aparimāṇā devamanussā āsavakkhayaṃ pattā
anya-e1102n0:364_5: brahmaloke patiṭṭhitā, devaloke uppannā. Sāriputtatthere cittaṃ pasādetvā catūhi
anya-e1102n0:364_6: ca paccayehi theraṃ upaṭṭhahitvā asīti kusalahassāni sagge nibbattāni, tathā mahāmoggalānamahākassapapabhuti
anya-e1102n0:364_7: sunettassa satthuno sāvakā appekacce brahmaloke upapajjiṃsu, appekacce paranimmitavasavattīnaṃ
anya-e1102n0:364_8: devānaṃ sahabyataṃ…pe… appekacce gahapatimahāsālakulānaṃ sahabyataṃ upapajjiṃsu,
anya-e1102n0:364_9: vuttañhetaṃ “natthi bhikkhave paṇḍitato bhayaṃ, natthi paṇḍitato upaddavo, natthi
anya-e1102n0:367: Akittipaṇḍito sakkena devānamindena vare diyyamāne evamāha
anya-e1102n0:368: “Dhīraṃ passe suṇe dhīraṃ, dhīrena saha saṃvase;
anya-e1102n0:370: Kiṃ nu te akaraṃ dhīro, vada kassapa kāraṇaṃ;
anya-e1102n0:372: Nayaṃ nayati medhāvī, adurāyaṃ na yuñjati;
anya-e1102n0:373: Sanaro seyyaso hoti, sammā vutto na kuppati;
anya-e1102n0:374: Vinayaṃ so pajānāti, sādhu tena samāgamo”ti.
anya-e1102n0:375: Apica tepi sappurise saṅgamma assutapubbampi ubhayalokahitāvahaṃ vācaṃ suyyateva, vuttampi cetaṃ.
anya-e1102n0:376: “Subhāsitaṃ uttamamāhu santo, dhammaṃ bhaṇe nādhammaṃ taṃ dutiyaṃ;
anya-e1102n0:377: Piyaṃ bhaṇe nāppiyaṃ taṃ tatiyaṃ, saccaṃ bhaṇe nālīkaṃ taṃ catuttha”nti ca.
anya-e1102n0:380_1: vuttañhetaṃ “apica nerayikādidukkhaparittāṇato puññāni eva pāṇīnaṃ bahūpakārāni,
anya-e1102n0:380_3: honti vuttañhetaṃ bhagavatā, “dve me bhikkhave puggalā dullabhā lokasmiṃ, katame
anya-e1102n0:380_4: dve, yo ca pubbakārī, yo ca kataññu katavedī”ti. Apica vidhuramahosadhajātakādikālepi
anya-e1102n0:380_5: idhalokaparalokasampattiatthameva attano vacanakare sammā yojenti. Anākulakammantādhiṭṭhānena
anya-e1102n0:380_7: akusalādīhi rahitakasigorakkhavāṇijjādayo kammantā, ete attano vā puttadārassa vā
anya-e1102n0:380_8: dāsakammakarānaṃ vā byattatāya evaṃ payojitā diṭṭheva dhamme dhanadhaññavitti paṭilābhahetū
anya-e1102n0:381: Patirūpakārīri dhuravā, uṭṭhānatā vindate dhananti ca;
anya-e1102n0:386: Yo ca sītañca uṇhañca; Tiṇāni yo na maññati;
anya-e1102n0:387: Sappurisakiccāni, so sukhaṃ na vihāyatī”ti ca.
anya-e1102n0:390_0: Evamādippabhedā sappurisā loke atidullabhāva. Tabbigamena duppurisā bālajanā agavesantopi
anya-e1102n0:390_1: labbhanteva te bālā attānaṃ sevamāne parajane saṃsāradukkheyeva osīdenti bhavato
anya-e1102n0:390_2: vuṭṭhānaṃ na denti tathā hi pūraṇakassapādayo chasatthārā devadattakokālika-modakatissa
anya-e1102n0:390_4: ime aññe ca evarūpā sattā bālā aggipadittamiva agāraṃ attanā duggahitena attānañca
anya-e1102n0:390_5: attano vacanakārake ca vināsenti tathā hi devadattamāgamma rājā ajātasattu-kokālikādayo
anya-e1102n0:390_6: tadaññepi puggalā apāye nibbattanti. Rājā ajātasattu sāmaññaphalasuttantasavanakāle
anya-e1102n0:390_7: yadi pitaraṃ aghāteyya, sotāpanno bhaveyya pitaraṃ ghātitattā maggaphalampi appatvā
anya-e1102n0:390_8: lohakumbhiyaṃ saṭṭhivassasahassāni paccitvā muccissati anāgatepi paccekabuddho bhavissati.
anya-e1102n0:390_9: Kokālikopi sāriputtamoggalānatthere anapacāyitvā mahāniraye padumagaṇanāya paccanokāse
anya-e1102n0:390_10: nirayapadese padumaniraye…pe… padumaṃ kho pana aññataro bhikkhu nirayaṃ kokāliko
anya-e1102n0:390_11: bhikkhu upapanno sāriputtamoggalānesu cittaṃ āghātetvā”ti āha. Tattha aññataro bhikkhūti
anya-e1102n0:390_12: nāmagottena apākaṭaṃ “kiṃ va dīghaṃ nukho bhante padume niraye āyuppamāṇa”nti pañhaṃ
anya-e1102n0:390_13: pucchitvā nisinnaṃ ekaṃ bhikkhuṃ evamāha “dīghaṃ kho bhikkhu niraye āyuppamāṇaṃ,
anya-e1102n0:390_14: taṃ na sukaraṃ saṅkhātuṃ ettakāni vassānīti vā ettakāni vassasatānīti vā ettakāni
anya-e1102n0:390_15: vassasahassānīti vā ettakāni vassasatasahassānī”ti vā sakkā pana bhante upamaṃ kātunti.
anya-e1102n0:390_16: “Sakkā bhikkhū”ti bhagavā avoca. Seyyathāpi bhikkhu vīsatikhāriko kosalako tilavāho
anya-e1102n0:390_17: hoti, tato puriso vassasatassa vassasahassassa accayena ekamekaṃ tilaṃ uddhareyya,
anya-e1102n0:390_18: khippataraṃ kho so bhikkhu vīsatikhāriko kosalako tilavāho iminā upakkamena parikkhayaṃ
anya-e1102n0:390_19: pariyādānaṃ gaccheyya, na tveva eko abbudo nirayo. Seyyathāpi bhikkhu vīsa abbudo
anya-e1102n0:390_20: nirayo, evameko nirabbudo nirayo”ti ādi. Vīsatikhāriko ti māgadhikena patthena cattāro
anya-e1102n0:390_21: patthā kosalaraṭṭhe eko pattho hoti. Tena patthena cattāro patthā āḷhakaṃ. Cattāri
anya-e1102n0:390_22: āḷhakāni doṇaṃ. Catudoṇā mānikā. Catumānikā khārī. Tāyakhāriyā vīsatikhāriko tilavāho.
anya-e1102n0:390_23: Tilavāhoti tilasakaṭaṃ. Abbudo nirayoti abbudo nāma eko paccekanirayo natthi, avīcimhi
anya-e1102n0:390_24: eva pana abbudagaṇanāya paccanokāso “abbudo nirayo”ti vutto. Esa nayo nirabbudādīsupi.
anya-e1102n0:390_25: Tattha vassagaṇanāpi evaṃ veditabbā yathāha “sataṃsatasahassāni koṭi hoti evaṃ sataṃsahassakoṭiyo
anya-e1102n0:390_26: pakoṭi nāma. Sataṃsatasahassapakoṭiyo koṭipakoṭi nāma. Sataṃ satasahassakoṭipakoṭiyo
anya-e1102n0:390_27: nahutaṃ. Sataṃsatasahassanahutāni ninnahutaṃ. Sataṃsatasahassaninnahutāni eko abbudo.
anya-e1102n0:390_28: Tato vīsatiguṇo nirabbudo. Esa nayo sabbattha ayañca gaṇanā aparicitānaṃ dukkarā”ti
anya-e1102n0:390_29: vuttaṃ taṃ na sukaraṃ saṅkhātu’nti keci pana tattha paridevanānattenapi kammakaraṇanānattenapi
anya-e1102n0:390_30: imāni nāmāni laddhānīti vadanti. Aparepi vānakāraṇehīti ṭīkānetti. Yathā ca dīghavidassaāghātā
anya-e1102n0:390_31: ca buddhantaraṃ saṭṭhiyojanamattena attabhāvena uttāno patito mahāniraye paccati
anya-e1102n0:390_32: yathā ca, tassa diṭṭhiabhirucitāni pañca kulasatāni tasseva sahabyataṃ uppannāni
anya-e1102n0:390_33: mahāniraye paccanti. Vuttañcetaṃ bhagavatā “seyyathāpi bhikkhave naḷāgāraṃ vā tiṇāgāraṃ
anya-e1102n0:390_34: vā aggiphuṭṭho kūṭāgārāni dahati ullittāvalittāni nivātāni phusitaggaḷāni pihita
anya-e1102n0:390_35: vātapānāni evameva kho bhikkhave yānikānici bhayāni uppajjanti, sabbāni bālato uppajjanti,
anya-e1102n0:390_36: no paṇḍitato yekeci upaddavā uppajjanti, no paṇḍitato, yekeci upasaggā…pe… no paṇḍitato.
anya-e1102n0:390_37: Iti kho bhikkhave sappaṭibhayo bālo appaṭibhayo paṇḍito saupaddavo bālo anupaddavo
anya-e1102n0:390_38: paṇḍito, saupasaggo bālo anupasaggo paṇḍitoti. Api ca pūtimacchasadiso bālo, pūtimacchabaddhapatta
anya-e1102n0:390_39: putisadiso hoti tadupasevī. Chaḍḍanīyataṃ jigucchanīyatañca āpajjati viññūnaṃ vuttampi cetaṃ nāradajātake.
anya-e1102n0:393: Akattipaṇḍitocāpi sakkena devānamindena vare diyyamāne evamāha
anya-e1102n0:394: “Bālaṃ na passe na suṇe, na ca bālena saṃvase;
anya-e1102n0:395: Bālenā’llāpasallāpaṃ, na kare na ca rocaye.
anya-e1102n0:396: Kiṃnu te akaraṃ bālo, vada kassapa kāraṇaṃ;
anya-e1102n0:399: Dunnayo seyyaso hoti, sammā vutto pakuppati;
anya-e1102n0:400: Vinayaṃ so na jānāti, sādhu tassa adassana”nti.
anya-e1102n0:401: Evaṃ bāladujjanasaṃsaggavaseneva sabbāni bhayupaddavāni uppajjanti, no paṇḍitasevanavasenātisabbaso sappurisā atidullabhāva.
anya-e1102n0:405_0: Imissā gāthāya vaṇṇanākkamo sampatto. Tattha dullabhañca manussattanti manussabhāvopi
anya-e1102n0:405_1: dullabhoyeva manussassa dullabhabhāvo kāṇakacchapopamādīhi veditabbo eko kira kassako
anya-e1102n0:405_2: gaṅgātīre tīṇi saṃvaccharāni kasitvā kiñcimattampi alabhitvā naṅgalaphālaṃ dvedhā
anya-e1102n0:405_3: bhinditvā gaṅgāyaṃ khipi tena gaṅgānadiyā vāhena eko uddhaṃ eko heṭṭhāti evaṃ dve
anya-e1102n0:405_4: naṅgalaphālakā gaṅgāyaṃ vuyhantā cirena eko uddhaṃ eko heṭṭhāti dve ekato hutvā pākatikā
anya-e1102n0:405_5: yujjanti tasmiṃ khaṇe vassasatavassasahassaccayena ekavāraṃ ummujjamāno kāṇakacchapo
anya-e1102n0:405_6: ummujjamānakkhaṇe tassa gīvā dvinnaṃ naṅgalaphālānamantare hoti ayaṃ kālo dullabhova
anya-e1102n0:405_7: evameva manussattabhāvopi dullabhoyeva tathāhi manussattabhāvaṃ alabhitvāva nirayapetaasurakāyatiracchānabhūmīsuyeva
anya-e1102n0:405_8: saṃsaritvā sīsampi ukkhipituṃ alabhantā ekabuddhantarā dve buddhantarā tayo buddhantarā
anya-e1102n0:405_9: cattāro buddhantarā ekāsaṅkhyeyyavasena niraye paccanakasattānaṃ gaṇanapathaṃ vītivattā,
anya-e1102n0:405_12: nisinnānaṃ atikhuddakasattānaṃ gaṇanapathampi vītivattā te hi gaṇituṃ iddhimantapuggale
anya-e1102n0:405_13: ṭhapetvā añño ko nāma sakkhissati tehi mohandhabhāvena kaṇhasukkapakkhampi ajānantā
anya-e1102n0:405_14: anekesu buddhasatesu vā buddhasahassesu vā uppajjamānesupi buddhotisaddaṃ asutvā
anya-e1102n0:405_15: vītivattā, evaṃ manussattabhāvopi dullabhoyeva. Manussattabhāve labhamānepi buddhuppādakālo
anya-e1102n0:405_16: atidullabhova. Buddhuppādakālepi sammādiṭṭhi hutvā kusalūpapattisaṅkhātā khaṇasampatti
anya-e1102n0:405_17: dullabhāva, saddhammadesakassāpi dullabhattā, tasmimpi sati aṅgavikalabhāvena saddhammasavanassāpi
anya-e1102n0:405_18: dullabhattāti evamādippabhedā manussattabhāvādikā khaṇasampattiyo dullabhāti veditabbā.
anya-e1102n0:405_19: Dullabhā khaṇasampattīti kusalūpapattisaṅkhātā khaṇasampatti dullabhāyeva tathā hi
anya-e1102n0:405_21: paripuṇṇaaṅgabhāvepi micchādiṭṭhibhūtā vā kusalūpapattisaṅkhātā khaṇā na honti paccantavisaye
anya-e1102n0:405_22: hi pavattā janā pāṇātipātādidasaakusalakammapatheyeva ramanti abhiramanti, caṇḍasabhāvā
anya-e1102n0:405_23: ca te honti, ratanattayaguṇampi na jānanti. Arūpinopi puggalā paratoghosavirahitattā
anya-e1102n0:405_24: sotāpattimaggapaṭilābhopi tesaṃ natthi, buddhadassanādīnipi na labhanti. Asaññasattatiracchānapetanerayikakālesu
anya-e1102n0:405_25: pana pageva pūritapāramīnaṃ sattānaṃ pavattanampi abbohārikaṃ, sammādiṭṭhikule jāyamānāpi
anya-e1102n0:405_26: cakkhuvikalena buddhasaṅgharatanānaṃ adassanaṃ, sotavikalena dhammasavanatopi hāyati
anya-e1102n0:405_27: eḷamūgādibhāvena kusalasamādānā na honti. Aṅgasampannepi micchādiṭṭhibhāvena dvattiṃsamahāpurisalakkhaṇaasītianubyañjanabyāmappabhāparikkhittaṃ
anya-e1102n0:405_28: sabbajanānaṃ nayanarasāyatanabhūtaṃ sabbaññubuddhampi disvā pasādasommena cakkhunā
anya-e1102n0:405_29: oloketabbampi na maññanti manopadosavaseneva yugaggāhā hutvā yamakapāṭihāriyakālādīsu
anya-e1102n0:405_30: anekepi micchādiṭṭhino mahāniraye uppajjanti. Evaṃ kusalūpapattikhaṇasampattipi dullabhāyeva.
anya-e1102n0:411_0: Evaṃ satthuparinibbānato vassasataccayena patiṭṭhite isinā kāritattā’ isinagara’nti
anya-e1102n0:411_1: laddhanāme dvattapādibhūpālānaṃ nivāsaṭṭhānabhūte sīrikhettanagare erāvatiyā nadiyā
anya-e1102n0:411_2: pārimatīrabhūte pabbatasānumhi patiṭṭhitassa kañcanavaramahāthūpassa dāyakassa satvivamahādhammarañño
anya-e1102n0:411_3: kāle sāsanassa dvisahassasatādhikaekatiṃsatime vasse sāsane paṭiladdhasaddhānaṃ kulaputtānaṃ
anya-e1102n0:411_5: avicinitvā nadiyā udakukkhepaṃ akatvā upasampadā kammassa kāritattā sāsane parājayamāpanne
anya-e1102n0:411_6: kulaputte upārambhakaraṇavasena sīmavipattihārako sīmasampattippakāsako gantho pavattati.
anya-e1102n0:412_1: tipiṭakadharena’saddhammakovido’ti pākaṭa nāmadheyyena mahātherena upajjhāyo hutvā
anya-e1102n0:412_3: vinayadharena mahāsāminā ca, rājagurunā tipiṭakanāgattherena ca ācariyo hutvā vejjakammajaṅghapesanakammādivasena
anya-e1102n0:412_4: anesanaṃ pahāya sammā ājīvena visuddhājīvehi saṅghagaṇehi kārakasaṅghā hutvā sirikhettanagarassa
anya-e1102n0:412_5: dakkhiṇadisābhāge dīghapabbatasānumhi erāvatiyā nadiyā tīre vālikapuḷine sīmāpekkhāya
anya-e1102n0:412_6: saha udakukkhepaṃ katvā pavattāya udakukkhepasīmāya dasadhā byañjanavipattiṃ akatvā
anya-e1102n0:412_7: ṭhānārahena ñatticatutthena kammena upasampadāya vīsativassena sāgarabuddhīti garūhi
anya-e1102n0:412_8: gahitanāmadheyyena bhikkhunā racito sāsanavipattihārako sīmavisodhanī nāma gantho samatto.
anya-e1102n0:420: Evaṃ pāṇinaṃ sabbe, sīghaṃ sijjhantu saṅkappā.
anya-e1102n0:422: Tāva tiṭṭhatu yaṃ gantho, sāsane hārayaṃ tamaṃ.
anya-e1102n0:423: Uddhaṃ yāva bhavaggā ca, adho yāva avīcito;
anya-e1102n0:426: Ciraṃ jīvatu no rājā, sāsanassa ujjotako.
